original: viśeṣato me paramākhyavidyāvyākhyāṃ karomyanvapi cāhameva // MAnuv_1,1.2 //

original: sattraividhyaṃ ca mānena siddhayet keneti pṛcchyate // MAnuv_1,1.22 //

original: asataścāpi viśvasya tenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.24 //

original: avidyādurghaṭatvaṃ cet syādātmāpi hi tādṛśaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.33 //

original: etat sarvaṃ tarkaśāstre brahmatarke hi vistarāt /

original: sa viṣṇurāha hīyante devaśāstrasya tena hi /

original: ādyantaṃ devaśāstrasya svayaṃ bhagavatā kṛtam // MAnuv_1,1.81 //

original: guṇā nārā iti jñeyastadvān nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.83 //

original: āpo nārā iti hyāha sa evāpsvantarīritaḥ /

original: yasmin devā adhītyuktavā samudraṃ sthānameva ca // MAnuv_1,1.87 //

original: bandhamokṣāvapi hyāsu śrutiṣūktā hareḥ sadā // MAnuv_1,1.90 //

original: yaṃ nāmāni viśantyaddhā yo devānāmiti hyapi /

original: ato na mukhyato nāma tadanyasya hi kasyacit /

original: na sarvanāmatānyeṣāṃ śrutāvuktā hi kutracit // MAnuv_1,1.95 //

adoṣa vacanāt ca eva niyamena hareḥ śrutau

original: ajñānaṃ pāratantryaṃ ca praḷaye 'bhāva eva ca // MAnuv_1,1.96 //
analyzed: ajñānam pāratantryam ca praḷaye bhāvaḥ eva ca
aśaktiḥ coditā anyeṣām sarveṣām api ca śrutau
janma ādyasya iti tena etat viṣṇoḥ eva sva lakṣaṇam
asya udbhava ādi hetu tvam sākṣāt eva sva lakṣaṇam
kṛṣṇaddha yāna chalena eva svayam bhāgavate bravīt
atas jīva aikyam api sa nirācakre jagadguruḥ

original: na hi janmādihetutvaṃ jīvasya jagato bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.99 //
analyzed: na hi janma ādi hetu tvam jīvasya jagataḥ bhavet
hita akriyā ādi doṣam ca vakṣyati eva svayam prabhuḥ

original: nirguṇatvaṃ ca tenaiva niṣiddhaṃ prabhuṇā svayam // MAnuv_1,1.100 //
analyzed: nirguṇa tvam ca tena eva niṣiddham prabhuṇā svayam
bhedena eva tu mukhya artha sambhave lakṣaṇā kutas
katham nitya guṇasya asya syāt aikyam guṇa hānataḥ
sadā eva guṇavat tve bhinnam syāt nirguṇam sadā

original: na ca mithyāguṇatvaṃ syādanirvācyasya dūṣaṇāt // MAnuv_1,1.102 //
analyzed: na ca mithyā guṇa tvam syāt anirvācyasya dūṣaṇāt
nirguṇa tvam tadā ca syāt āsura tvam na ca anyathā
lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ bhedaḥ bhedaḥ vā yadi vā ubhayam

original: iti pṛṣṭe tadaikyasya gatireva na vidyate /
analyzed: iti pṛṣṭe tad aikyasya gatiḥ eva na vidyate

original: aikyābhede na śāstreṇa jñeyaṃ tat svaprakāśataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.104 //
analyzed: aikya abhede na śāstreṇa jñeyam tat sva prakāśataḥ
bhede mithyātvataḥ bheda satya tvam syāt balāt api

original: bhedābhedau yadi tadā syādeva hyanavasthitiḥ // MAnuv_1,1.105 //
analyzed: bheda abhedau yadi tadā syāt eva hi anavasthitiḥ
sva nirvāhaka tā ced syāt bāhyam bāhakam iti api

original: paryāyo bhedavān vā syādanavasthobhayatra ca // MAnuv_1,1.106 //
analyzed: paryāyaḥ bhedavān vā syāt anavasthā ubhayatra ca
satya jñāna ādike pi eva na vyāvṛttyā prayojanam
vyāvṛttasya aviśeṣa tve tat akhaṇḍam ca khaṇḍitam
nirviśeṣa tvam etena mūkaḥ ham iti vat bhavet
abhinne pi viśeṣaḥ yam balāt āpatati hi atas
viśeṣa tadvatoḥ ca eva sva nirvāhaka tā bhavet
bheda hīne tu aparyāya śabda antara niyāmakaḥ

original: viśeṣo nāma kathitaḥ so 'sti vastuṣvaśeṣataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.109 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ nāma kathitaḥ saḥ sti vastuṣu aśeṣatas
viśeṣāḥ te pi anantāḥ ca paraspara viśeṣiṇaḥ
sva nirvāhaka tā yuktāḥ santi vastuṣu aśeṣatas
atas nanta guṇam brahma nirbhedam api bhaṇyate
evam dharmān iti śrutyā tat abhedaḥ u pi udīryate
śaiva ādi āgama samprāpta dṛṣṭa gena phalena tu
tad vākya upamayā anyat ca pramāṇa tve numīyate
īśa vākyatvataḥ iti ced tat gavyabhicāriṇā

original: aprāmāṇyānumā ca syānna pṛthak cānumeśvare // MAnuv_1,1.113 //
analyzed: a prāmāṇya anumā ca syāt na pṛthak ca anumā īśvare
puṃstva hetu balāt eva pūrva uktena eva vartmanā
śāstra yoni tvam etena kāraṇasya balāt bhavet
na a veda vid na tarkeṇa matiḥ ityādi vākyataḥ

original: tarko jñāpayituṃ śakto neśitāraṃ kathañcana // MAnuv_1,1.115 //
analyzed: tarkaḥ jñāpayitum śaktaḥ na īśitāram kathañcana
vanakṛt tva ādi rūpeṇa pakṣa bhūtasya ca īśituḥ

original: kiñcijjñānaṃ hi puṃstvena śakyaṃ sādhayituṃ sukham // MAnuv_1,1.116 //
analyzed: kiñcid jñānam hi puṃstvena śakyam sādhayitum sukham
vṛkṣa kṛt na akhilam vṛkṣam vetti puṃstvāt hi caitra vat
ityādi anumayā spardhi na anumānam para īśituḥ
śaktam vijñāpane ca atiprasaṅgaḥ numayā īdṛśā

original: vastutvāt turagaḥ śṛṅgī puṣpavat khaṃ sutairyutā /
analyzed: vastu tvāt turagaḥ śṛṅgī puṣpa vat kham sutaiḥ yutā

original: citriṇī ca rasaḥ ṣaṣṭho rasatvāt sottaro bhavet /
analyzed: citriṇī ca rasaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ rasa tvāt sa uttaraḥ bhavet
upakrama ādi liṅgebhyaḥ na anyā āsyāt anumā tatas
te eva anvaya nāmānaḥ taiḥ samyak pravicārite

original: mukhyārtho bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvaśāstrasya nāparaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.119 //
analyzed: mukhya arthaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarva śāstrasya na aparaḥ
īkṣaṇīya tvataḥ viṣṇuḥ vācyaḥ eva na ca anyathā

original: lakṣyatvaṃ kvāpi dṛṣṭaṃ hi kiṃ tadityanavasthitiḥ // MAnuv_1,1.120 //
analyzed: lakṣya tvam kvāpi dṛṣṭam hi kim tat iti anavasthitiḥ
mādhurya ādi viśeṣāḥ ca tad śabdaiḥ uditāḥ sadā
vākya arthaḥ hi vākya artha śabdena eva uditaḥ bhavet

original: nāvācyaṃ tena kiñcit syād yata ityādikairvadan /
analyzed: na avācyam tena kiñcid syāt yatas iti ādikaiḥ vadan
avācya tvam katham brūyāt mūkaḥ ham iti vat sudhīḥ
yena lakṣyam iti proktam lakṣya śabdena saḥ vadat

original: ekasyāpi hi śabdasya gauṇārthasvīkṛtau satām // MAnuv_1,1.123 //
analyzed: ekasya api hi śabdasya gauṇa artha svīkṛtau satām

original: mahatī jāyate lajjā yatra tatrākhilā ravāḥ /
analyzed: mahatī jāyate lajjā yatra tatra akhilāḥ ravāḥ
amukhya arthāḥ iti vadan yaḥ tad mārga anuvartinām

original: kathaṃ na jāyate lajjā vaktuṃ śābdatvamātmanaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.124 //
analyzed: katham na jāyate lajjā vaktum śābda tvam ātmanaḥ
ātma brahma ādayaḥ śabdāḥ sākṣāt pūrṇa abhidhāyinaḥ

original: janmādikāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣitaṃ ca yadā tadā // MAnuv_1,1.125 //
analyzed: janma ādi kāraṇam brahma lakṣitam ca yadā tadā
vandhyāputra upamam māyā śabalam vācyam iti api

original: kalpayitvā vinā mānaṃ lakṣyaṃ śuddhaṃ vadan padaiḥ // MAnuv_1,1.126 //
analyzed: kalpayitvā vinā mānam lakṣyam śuddham vadan padaiḥ
ātma śabda uditasya eva jñānam muktau asādhanam
āha śruta parityāgaḥ syāt ca asya aśruta kalpanam

original: syāt sarvatra ca yatraikamapi loko jugupsate /
analyzed: syāt sarvatra ca yatra ekam api lokaḥ jugupsate
niyamena ubhayam syāt hi yasya sva parayoḥ mate
alaṅkṛtaḥ sadā eva ayam durghaṭaiḥ eva bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: andhantamo nityuduḥkhaṃ tasya syād vasanadvayam // MAnuv_1,1.129 //
analyzed: andhantamaḥ nityu duḥkham tasya syāt vasana dvayam

original: anandā nāma te lokā andhena tamasā'vṛtāḥ /
analyzed: anandāḥ nāma te lokāḥ andhena tamasā āvṛtāḥ
tān te pretya abhigacchanti avidvāṃsaḥ budhaḥ janāḥ

original: asuryā nāma te lokā andhena tamasā'vṛtāḥ /
analyzed: asuryāḥ nāma te lokāḥ andhena tamasā āvṛtāḥ

original: tāṃste pretyābhigacchanti ye kecātmahano janāḥ // MAnuv_1,1.131 //
analyzed: tān te pretya abhigacchanti ye ke ca ātma hanaḥ janāḥ
ityādi śrutayaḥ mānam samantataḥ

original: heyatvāvacanāccaiva nātmā gauṇaḥ śrutau śrutaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.132 //
analyzed: heya tva avacanāt ca eva na ātmā gauṇaḥ śrutau śrutaḥ

original: tamevaikaṃ jānathānyā vāco muñcatha ceti ha /
analyzed: tam eva ekam jānatha anyāḥ vācaḥ muñcatha ca iti ha

original: ukta ātmā kathaṃ gauṇo heyapakṣe hyasau śrutaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.133 //
analyzed: uktaḥ ātmā katham gauṇaḥ heya pakṣe hi asau śrutaḥ
parivāra tayā grāhyāḥ api heyāḥ pradhānataḥ
pūrṇasya pūrṇam ādāya pūrṇam eva avaśiṣyate
iti svasya eva pūrṇasya pūrṇe pyayaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: kathaṃ māyāvyavacchinnaḥ pūrṇo mukhyatayā bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.135 //
analyzed: katham māyā vyavacchinnaḥ pūrṇaḥ mukhya tayā bhavet

original: padaṃ ca nirguṇa iti kathaṃ gauṇaṃ vadiṣyati /
analyzed: padam ca nirguṇaḥ iti katham gauṇam vadiṣyati

original: guṇābhāvopalakṣyaṃ cet padaṃ tadapi vācakam // MAnuv_1,1.136 //
analyzed: guṇa abhāva upalakṣyam ced padam tat api vācakam
atas nava sthiti mukha sarva doṣa mahā āspadam
katham etat matam sadbhiḥ ādriyeta vicakṣaṇaiḥ
na ca sāṅkhaya nirākṛtyai sūtrāṇi etāni acīkḷpat
bhagavān na hi aśabda tvam pradhāne ṅgīkaroti asau
samanvaye pratijñāte śabda gocara tā eva hi
prathama pratipādyā syāt tad abhāve kutas nvayaḥ
katham ca lakṣaṇā vādī brūyāt brahma samanvayam

original: yo 'sau śabdasya mukhyārthastatraiva syāt samanvayaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.140 //
analyzed: śabdasya mukhya arthaḥ tatra eva syāt samanvayaḥ

original: uktaṃ tadeva jijñāsyaṃ kvāvakāśo 'tra nirguṇe // MAnuv_1,1.141 //
analyzed: uktam tat eva jijñāsyam nirguṇe
kathañca asambhavaḥ tasya mukhya arthasya nirākṛtau

original: ameyaṃ cenna śāstrasya tatra vṛttiḥ kathañcana /
analyzed: ameyam ced na śāstrasya tatra vṛttiḥ kathañcana
tasmāt śāstreṇa jijñāsyam asmadīyam guṇa arṇavam
vāsudeva ākhyam advandvam param brahma akhila uttamam

original: nirgataṃ manaso vāco yadi tat syādagocaram /
analyzed: nirgatam manasaḥ vācaḥ yadi tat syāt agocaram

original: astu tanmā vaded vādī nacāsmacchāstragaṃ tu tat // MAnuv_1,1.145 //
analyzed: astu tat mā vadet vādī na ca asmad śāstra gam tu tat
avācyam vācyam iti uktavā kim iti unmatta vat mṛṣā
asmad śāstrasya cauryāya yatate sva ukti dūṣakaḥ
janma ādi kāraṇam yat tat sākṣāt nārāyaṇa abhidham

original: vadantu śrutayo brahma śāstraṃ caitat tadarthataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.147 //
analyzed: vadantu śrutayaḥ brahma śāstram ca etat tad arthataḥ
sva prakāśa tvam api tu yaiḥ jñānasya nivāritam

original: kathaṃ sarvajñatā tasya svajñānādhigamaṃ vinā // MAnuv_1,1.148//
analyzed: katham sarvajña tā tasya sva jñāna adhigamam vinā
pravṛttam astu avācyam te mā eva brūyāḥ kathañcana
sarva śabdaiḥ avācyam tat uktavā tad viṣayam punar
vayam tvām śruti yuktibhyām baddhvā asmad śāstram añjasā
vicārayāmaḥ śrutibhiḥ yuktibhiḥ ca eva sādaram
adbhuta tvāt avācyam tat atarkya ajñeyam eva ca
ananta guṇa pūrṇa tvāt iti ūde paiṅginām śrutiḥ
avācyam iti loke bhuvi
evam śāstra avagamya tve vibhāgena samanvayam
ānanda mayaḥ ityādinā adhyāyena vadati ajaḥ
tatra anyatra prasiddhānām viṣṇau eva samanvayam
śabdānām prathame pāde guṇi sāmānya vācinām
guṇa vācinām ca prathamam āha devaḥ samanvayam
samudra śāyinam sarva prasūti prasavam śrutiḥ
tat eva brahma paramam iti sa avadhṛtiḥ jagau
brahma śabdasya tatra eva niyata tvataḥ
yaḥ nnam brahma ityādi rūpāt abhyāsāt taittirīyake
anyāsu ca etad rūpāsu śākhāsu api sahasraśas
ānanda mayaḥ ityādyaiḥ śabdaiḥ vācyaḥ hariḥ svayam
upalakṣaṇa tvam śabdānām ānanda maya pūrviṇām
sūtrasya alpa akṣara tvena sarva śākhā vinirṇaye
punar ca prāpakāt hetoḥ tatra adhikaraṇa antaram

original: sarve vedā āmananti yat padaṃ tviti hi śrutiḥ /
analyzed: sarve vedāḥ āmananti yat padam tu iti hi śrutiḥ
ānanda maya rūpe tu brahmaṇaḥ puccha tā uktitaḥ
samasta a brahma tā prāpteḥ ānanda maya nāma hi
brahma śabdasya ca abhyāsāt pañca rūpa ādiṣu sphuṭam
brahmatā avayave pi syāt tathā avayavini svatas
yathā eva kṛṣṇa keśasya kṛṣṇasya brahma tā akhilā

original: darśitā caiva pārthāya niḥsīmāḥ śaktayo 'sya hi /
analyzed: darśitā ca eva pārthāya niḥsīmāḥ śaktayaḥ hi

original: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalam // MAnuv_1,1.162 //
analyzed: ṛtam satyam param brahma puruṣam kṛṣṇa piṅgalam
viṣṇu ākhyam uktam anyatra hi ūrdhvaretam ca tat prati
virūpākṣa ākhyam avaram brahmā uktam tad vrate sthitam
samāna adhikṛta tvam ced uttaram nīlalohitam
kṛṣṇa piṅgala rūpeṇa punar uktam bhaviṣyati
brahmā adhipatiḥ iti atra tāpanīya śrutau puras
svarita brahma śabda antam bahuvrīhi tvam eṣyati
svāhā indra śatru vardhasva yat bahuvrīhi tām agāt
mahāvyākaraṇe sūtram iti svara vinirṇaye
pūrva anta svarite puṃsoḥ bahuvrīhi tvam eṣyati
mahāvyākaraṇe sūtram iti svara vinirṇaye
ṛtam satyam param brahma ityādi uddeśya dvitīyakā
vibhaktiḥ ūrdhvaretā ādiḥ prathamā rudra gocarā

original: tasmād viṣṇuṃ paraṃ brahma prati rudro vrate sthitaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt viṣṇum param brahma prati rudraḥ vrate sthitaḥ

original: ūrdhvaretā iti hyeva śrutyartho 'vasito bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.169 //
analyzed: ūrdhvaretāḥ iti hi eva śruti arthaḥ vasitaḥ bhavet

original: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma prati viṣṇuṃ sadāśivaḥ /
analyzed: ṛtam satyam param brahma prati viṣṇum sadāśivaḥ

original: ūrdhvaretā dhyāyati ha śaṅkaro nīlalohitaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.170 //
analyzed: ūrdhvaretāḥ dhyāyati ha śaṅkaraḥ nīlalohitaḥ
iti artham etam eva āha nīlagrīva śrutiḥ parā

original: ārtharvaṇī paraṃ brahma tasmādeko hariḥ śrutau // MAnuv_1,1.171 //
analyzed: ārtharvaṇī param brahma tasmāt ekaḥ hariḥ śrutau
tat eva ṛtam iti prāha katham eva anyathā śrutiḥ
avadhārayantī tasya eva hi ṛta tva ādikam añjasā

original: eko nārāyaṇa āsīnna brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ āsīt na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ

original: vāsudevo 'gra evāsīnna brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ // MAnuv_1,1.173 //
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ gre eva āsīt na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ

original: nendrasūryau na ca guho na somo na vināyakaḥ /
analyzed: na indra sūryau na ca guhaḥ na somaḥ na vināyakaḥ
ityādi vākyataḥ viṣṇoḥ utpattiḥ avatāra gā
mukhyam brahma hariḥ tasmāt prastāvaḥ param iti api

original: mukhyabrahmagrahe yukte nāmukhyaṃ yujyate kvacit // MAnuv_1,1.175 //
analyzed: mukhya brahma grahe yukte na amukhyam yujyate kvacid
asambhave hi mukhyasya gauṇa artha aṅgīkṛtiḥ bhavet
prācurya arthāḥ ca mayaṭaḥ sarve pratipāditāḥ
bhogya tvam atra ca ādya tvam upajīvya tayā hareḥ
mahā bhoktā mahā bhogyaḥ iti arthaḥ nna maye bhavet
mahā prāṇaḥ mahā bodhaḥ mahā vijñānavān api
viśeṣa sāmānya tayā vijñānam manaḥ iti api
ekasya jñāna rūpasya hareḥ uktiḥ vibhāgataḥ
abhede pi viśeṣeṇa eva anyaḥ iti uditaḥ hariḥ
bheda śabdāḥ viśeṣam tu harau anyatra bhinna tvāt
brūyuḥ hareḥ jīva jaḍaiḥ api bhedam hi mukhyatas
brahmatarka vacaḥ pi evam atas ekaḥ sa pañcadhā
uktaḥ nna mayaḥ ityādi bhṛgoḥ ca etat vadiṣyati
prāpya tvena mayaṭ prokteḥ na tatra api anyat ucyate
pracura anna ādiḥ eva atas hi annam anna maya iti api
ucyate hi aviśeṣeṇa na anyat kiñcid iha ucyate

original: mahānandatva evāsya hetuḥ ko 'nyāditi sphuṭam // MAnuv_1,1.183 //
analyzed: mahānanda tve eva asya hetuḥ kaḥ sphuṭam

original: uktaḥ śrutyantare yasmāt sukhaṃ labdhvā karotyayam /
analyzed: uktaḥ śruti antare yasmāt sukham labdhvā karoti ayam

original: karoti nāsukhī bhūmā sukhaṃ nālpe sukhaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.184 //
analyzed: karoti na asukhī bhūmā sukham na alpe sukham bhavet
iti uktam yat pravṛttiḥ ca nṛtta gāna ādikā sukhāt

original: duḥkhād rodādikā caiva sarvakartṛtvato 'sya ca // MAnuv_1,1.185 //
analyzed: duḥkhāt ca eva sarva kartṛ tvataḥ ca
sarva śakteḥ na duḥkham syāt atas kevala līlayā

original: pravartako na cedeṣa prāṇyādanyācca kaḥ pumān // MAnuv_1,1.186 //
analyzed: pravartakaḥ na ced eṣa prāṇyāt anyāt ca kaḥ pumān
brahma vid param āpnoti iti yat prathama sūcitam
tat eva mantra varṇena satyam jñānam ananta vat
lakṣitam tatra satya tvam sṛṣṭayā anna prāṇayoḥ api

original: uktaṃ jñānaṃ tu manasā vijñānenāpyudīritam // MAnuv_1,1.188 //
analyzed: uktam jñānam tu manasā vijñānena api udīritam
ananta tvam tathā ānanda maya vācā api udāhṛtam

original: sadbhāvaṃ yāpayed yasmāt satyaṃ tat tena kathyate // MAnuv_1,1.189 //
analyzed: sadbhāvam yāpayet yasmāt satyam tat tena kathyate
iti sṛṣṭiḥ iha proktā jagat sadbhāva yāpakam

original: brahmeti sthāpanāyaiva sattvaṃ jīvanameva ca // MAnuv_1,1.190 //
analyzed: brahma iti sthāpanāya eva sattvam jīvanam eva ca

original: viśīrṇatā ca sattvaṃ syāt sannamityāhureva yat /

satya śabda arthaḥ eva hi

original: prāṇaṃ devā anuprāṇanti manuṣyāḥ paśavaśca ye /
analyzed: prāṇam devāḥ anuprāṇanti manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ ca ye

original: āyuḥ prāṇo hi bhūtānāmiti yad gatijīvane // MAnuv_1,1.192 //
analyzed: āyuḥ prāṇaḥ hi bhūtānām iti yat gati jīvane
ukte sat iti dhātvarthaḥ gatiḥ ca atas hi satyatā
prāṇa tvam avabodha arthaḥ manudhātuḥ prakīrtitaḥ
na alpe sukham iti proktayā eva ānanda maya tā uktitaḥ

original: anantatvaṃ sunirṇītaṃ pūrṇānando hi nālpake // MAnuv_1,1.194 //
analyzed: ananta tvam su nirṇītam pūrṇānandaḥ hi na alpake
atas hi mantra varṇa ukta vistṛtiḥ tu samastayā

original: kriyate parayā yasmāditaro 'tra na kathyate // MAnuv_1,1.195 //
analyzed: kriyate parayā yasmāt itaraḥ tra na kathyate

original: puruṣaṃ vetti yo mucyennānyaḥ panthā hi vidyate /
analyzed: puruṣam vetti yaḥ mucyet na anyaḥ panthāḥ hi vidyate

original: iti śruteranyavedī kathaṃ muktiṃ prayāsyati // MAnuv_1,1.196 //
analyzed: iti śruteḥ anya vedī katham muktim prayāsyati

original: puruṣaḥ para ātmājo brahma nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ paraḥ ātmā ajaḥ brahma nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ

original: mahānānanda ud viṣṇurbharga oma itīryate // MAnuv_1,1.197 //
analyzed: mahān ānandaḥ ud viṣṇuḥ bhargaḥ omaḥ iti īryate
svayam nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ na anyasya etāni kasyacid
tasmāt om iti udāhṛtya yajña dāna ādi kurvate
sūktena pauruṣeṇa enam yajanti adhyātma kovidāḥ
iti paiṅgi śrutiḥ tena na anya jñānāt vimucyate
brahma śabda udite tasmin ātma śabdam prayujya ca
tasmāt ākāśa sṛṣṭim ca provāca atra catuvirdhām
bhūtam bhūta abhimānī ca tad dehaḥ ntar niyāmakaḥ
hariḥ ca ākāśa śabda uktaḥ mukhyatas hariḥ eva ca

original: ā samantāt kāśate yadākāśo mukhyato hariḥ /
analyzed: ā samantāt kāśate yat ākāśaḥ mukhyatas hariḥ
bala jñāna sva rūpa tvāt vāyuḥ agniḥ agam nayan
āpaḥ āpālanāt ca eva pṛthivī prathitaḥ yatas
uṣyā āśraya tvena saḥ eva oṣadhi nāmakaḥ
oṣadhīṣu sthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ kṣudhitaiḥ āśritaḥ bhavet

original: puri śete yataḥ so 'tha puruṣaśceti gīyate // MAnuv_1,1.204 //
analyzed: puri śete yatas saḥ tha puruṣaḥ ca iti gīyate
kriyā pravartaka tvena prādurbhāvaḥ hareḥ janiḥ
ākāśa ādiṣu na anyā asti hi abhimānaḥ bhimāninaḥ
abhimāni śarīrasya sākṣāt bhūtasya ca udbhavaḥ
evam deha ādi paryantam āgatam harim eva tu
parāmṛśati tasya eva pañca rūpa tva vittaye

original: tyaktavā bhūtādikaṃ sarvaṃ sa vā eṣa iti śrutiḥ // MAnuv_1,1.207 //
analyzed: tyaktavā bhūta ādikam sarvam sa vai eṣaḥ iti śrutiḥ
saḥ iti ātma pada uddiṣṭaḥ eṣa jīva śarīra gaḥ

original: sārānnamaya evāyaṃ na lokānnamayaḥ prabhuḥ // MAnuv_1,1.208 //
analyzed: sāra anna mayaḥ eva ayam na loka anna mayaḥ prabhuḥ
iti tam rasa śabdena viśinaṣṭi śarīra gam
idam iti eva nirdeśaḥ vastra prāvṛta vat vibhoḥ
śiraḥ ādeḥ bhavet jīvaśiraḥ ādau vyavasthiteḥ

original: taṃ viditvāsya muktiḥ syānnānyajñānāt kathañcana // MAnuv_1,1.210 //
analyzed: tam viditvā asya muktiḥ syāt na anya jñānāt kathañcana
āditye puruṣe ca ayam iti bheda upadeśataḥ
na asya abhedaḥ sti jīvena na anumā kāma cāriṇī
vimatāni śarīrāṇi mad bhoga āyatanāni yat
śarīrāṇi iti ādikā tu tattva jñāne hi apekṣyate
pratyakṣa ādi viruddha tvāt akṣa āgama bhaya ujkhitā

original: anumā kāmavṛttā hi kutra nāvasaraṃ vrajet // MAnuv_1,1.213 //
analyzed: anumā kāma vṛttā hi kutra na avasaram vrajet
jaḍaḥ ātmā eva vastu tvāt prameya tvāt jaḍam citiḥ

original: ghana ākāśa ityādyā vāryante kena hetunā // MAnuv_1,1.214 //
analyzed: ghanaḥ ākāśaḥ ityādyāḥ vāryante kena hetunā
na jīva bheda sūtrāṇām śaṅkayā atra punar ukta tā
vākya antara dyotaka tvāt pṛthak iti atra pūrṇa tā
yogam anna maya ādyaiḥ yat phala tvena asya śaṃsati
sthāna dvaye kośāḥ ete iti ati sāhasam
upasaṅkramaṇam ca eva dvitīya uddeśitam prati
atikramam vadantam tam upaśabdaḥ nivārayet
a śrutasya ati śabdasya sthānam dadyāt katham punar
śruta aśruta parityāga kalpane vigata hriyām
mṛtau eva parityāgaḥ kṛtaḥ hi anna mayasya ca
ye brahma ityādi upāsām sāmānādhikaraṇyataḥ
uktavā pañca svarūpāṇām punar tad prāpti vādinī
sthāna dvaya gatā veda vāṇī tad apalāpinām
tamasaḥ nyatra saṃsthānam katham eva saheta sā
adhīhi bhagavaḥ brahma iti uktaḥ nna prāṇa pūrvakam

original: āha brahma kathaṃ tanna dvāraṃ taditi vādinaḥ /
analyzed: āha brahma katham tat na dvāram tat iti vādinaḥ

original: upasattiṃ kathaṃ vidyurupasannāya hi triśaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.221 //
analyzed: upasattim katham vidyuḥ upasannāya hi triśas
vaktavyam brahma guruṇā catur vāram atha api vā

original: sakṛd vetyāgamā brūyuḥ sampradāyavido 'pi ca // MAnuv_1,1.222 //
analyzed: sakṛt vā iti āgamāḥ brūyuḥ sampradāya vidaḥ pi ca
tat yat kiñcid katham brūyāt upasannāya dikpatiḥ

original: na vaded brahma ca kathaṃ māyāvī na hi vārirāṭ // MAnuv_1,1.223 //
analyzed: na vadet brahma ca katham māyāvī na hi vārirāj
caṣṭe iti eva tat cakṣuḥ śravaṇāt śrotram ucyate
vacanāt eva vāc brahma sṛṣṭi sthiti ādi kāraṇam
tat ca vāghūla śākhāyām aṣṭa rūpam udāhṛtam
vijñāna ānanda sahitam pṛthak sṛṣṭayā ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: āvāpodvāpataṣa śākhā yata āhuḥ paraṃ padam /
analyzed: āvāpa udvāpa taṣa śākhāḥ yatas āhuḥ param padam

original: yato bhūtāni jāyanta ityādyairlakṣaṇaiḥ svayam // MAnuv_1,1.226 //
analyzed: yatas bhūtāni jāyante ityādyaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ svayam
lakṣitam guruṇā paścāt tapasā eva aparokṣataḥ
dṛṣṭvā ekaikam sva rūpam tu samasta ukta anudarśanam
icchatā ājñām guroḥ prāpya tapasā eva ārokṣitam
abrahma iti eva vadatām śruta hāni a śruta grahau
sākṣāt lakṣaṇa tām prāptau iti lajjā tad uktiṣu
samīpe sahabhogasya mukti tvena uktitaḥ sakṛt
bhedaḥ jīva īśayoḥ mithyā iti eva mithyā svayam bhavet
etena mayaṭaḥ ca eva dvaividhyena artha kalpanāt

original: tadanyeṣāṃ matamapi satsaṃsatsu na bhāsate // MAnuv_1,1.230 //
analyzed: tat anyeṣām matam api sat saṃsatsu na bhāsate
atas nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ niḥśeṣa guṇa vācakaiḥ
guṇi sāmānya vacanaiḥ api mukhya tayā uditaḥ
adhyātma gaiḥ ca prāṇa ādyaiḥ tathā eva hi adhibhūta gaiḥ
anna ādi śabdaiḥ bhagavān ekaḥ mukhya tayā uditaḥ
janma ādyasya iti sūtreṇa guṇa sarva sva siddhaye

original: brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ śāstramūlaṃ yatastataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.233 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇam proktam śāstra mūlam yatas tatas
anvayaḥ sarva śabdānām guṇa sarva sva vedakaḥ
śabda pravṛtti hetūnām tasmin mukhya samanvayāt
anya artheṣu alpa tā hetoḥ tad nimitta tvataḥ tathā
tad vācaka tvam śabdānām bahula atiprayogataḥ

original: rūḍhamityeva sādhyaṃ syād rūḍhirhi dvividhā matā /
analyzed: rūḍham iti eva sādhyam syāt rūḍhiḥ hi dvividhā matā

original: avidvadvidvadāptyaiva mukhyā hi viduṣāṃ tu sā // MAnuv_1,1.236 //
analyzed: a vidvat vidvat āptyā eva mukhyā hi viduṣām tu sā
vidvat rūḍhiḥ vaidikā syāt sā yogāt eva labhyate

original: tasmānmukhyārthatā viṣṇoriti kṛtvā hṛdi prabhuḥ // MAnuv_1,1.237 //
analyzed: tasmāt mukhya artha tā viṣṇoḥ iti kṛtvā hṛdi prabhuḥ
samanvayam sādhayati devānām tatra śakta tām

original: āśaṅkaya tatra rūḍhiṃ ca tacchabdānāmapi svayam // MAnuv_1,1.238 //
analyzed: āśaṅkaya tatra rūḍhim ca tad śabdānām api svayam
samudra anta sthita tva ādyaiḥ tad dharmaiḥ viṣṇu rūḍha tām
sādhayitvā abhidām taiḥ ca punar eva nyavārayat

original: ceṣṭā hi cetanānāṃ yā sā bhavet tatprasādataḥ /
analyzed: ceṣṭāḥ hi cetanānām yā sā bhavet tad prasādataḥ
acetana svabhāvaḥ tu vivara ādiḥ katham tatas
iti śaṅkā nivṛtti artham ākāśaḥ iti nāma ca
pivarīyaḥ tva pūrvāt liṅgāt hareḥ bhavet
iti śaṅkā nivṛtti artham ākāśaḥ iti nāma ca
paratas pi pūrvāt liṅgāt hareḥ bhavet
prāṇa ādi hetu tā dṛṣṭeḥ atideśaḥ hi tādṛśaḥ

original: liṅgaṃ balavadeva syāt prerako 'syāpi yaddhariḥ // MAnuv_1,1.243 //
analyzed: liṅgam balavat eva syāt yat hariḥ
nitya tvāt eva śabdasya tad svabhāvaḥ katham hareḥ
katham prasiddha bahula śabdānām ayathārtha tā
iti ced tat hareḥ eva bāhulyāt śruti liṅgayoḥ
tādṛśa tvāt ca tad śakteḥ bāhulye śruti liṅgayoḥ
anyasya mukhya vācya tvam iti tat na atragasya hi

original: viṣṇoreva tu liṅgāni prāṇasthāni tu sarvaśaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.246 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ eva tu liṅgāni prāṇa sthāni tu sarvaśas
prāṇa saṃvāda pūrvāṇi mukhyatas jīva gāni ca
abhyārcat śata varṣāṇi prāṇa vaṃśa tvam iti api
tasmāt anyatragaiḥ śabdaiḥ ukta nyāyaiḥ samantataḥ

original: eko nārāyaṇo devo bhaṇyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.248 //
analyzed: ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ bhaṇyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
vāsudeva ādi rūpeṇa catur mūrtiḥ ca sarvaśas

original: athavā pañcamūrtiḥ sa prokto 'dhikaraṇaṃ prati // MAnuv_1,1.249 //
analyzed: athavā pañcamūrtiḥ sa proktaḥ dhikaraṇam prati
pratisūtram pratipadam pratyakṣaram atha api vā
taiḥ taiḥ yukti śruti nyāya viśeṣaiḥ yogyatā yathā
bṛhat tantra pramāṇena bahu artham api saṅgrahāt
ucyate nara buddhīnām api kiñcid graha arthataḥ
granthaḥ yam api bahu arthaḥ bhāṣyam ca atyartha vistaram
bahu jñāḥ eva jānanti viśeṣaṇa artham etayoḥ
tasmāt mahā guṇaḥ viṣṇuḥ nāmnā aya punaruktitaḥ
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācāyaḥ viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne prathama adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ
liṅga ātmakānām śabdānām vṛttiḥ nārāyaṇe pare

original: cintyate sarvagatvaṃ tu prathamaṃ pravicāryate // MAnuv_1,2.1 //
analyzed: cintyate sarvaga tvam tu prathamam pravicāryate
tatra tatra sthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ tad tad śakti prabodhakaḥ

original: dūrato 'pyatiriktaḥ sa līlayā kevalaṃ prabhuḥ // MAnuv_1,2.2 //
analyzed: dūratas pi atiriktaḥ sa līlayā kevalam prabhuḥ
iti jñāpayitum karma kartroḥ utsargataḥ bhidā

original: abhedo 'pi viśeṣe syād balī so 'pyanapoditaḥ // MAnuv_1,2.3 //
analyzed: abhedaḥ pi viśeṣe syāt balī saḥ pi anapoditaḥ

original: etad bhāvābhidhaṃ liṅgaṃ kriyāliṅge tataḥ param /
analyzed: etat bhāva abhidham liṅgam kriyā liṅge tatas param
antaryāmī antaraḥ ca iti kriyā bhāva ākhyam ucyate
adṛśya tva ādi abhāva ākhyam śrutiḥ liṅga adhikā parā

original: anityatvāt kriyāṇāṃ tu kathameva svarūpatā // MAnuv_1,2.5 //
analyzed: anitya tvāt kriyāṇām tu katham eva svarūpa tā

original: iti cet sa viśeṣo 'pi kriyāśaktayātmanā sthiraḥ /
analyzed: iti ced sa viśeṣaḥ pi kriyā śaktayā ātmanā sthiraḥ

original: śaktitā vyaktatā ceti viśeṣo 'pi viśeṣavān // MAnuv_1,2.6 //
analyzed: śakti tā vyakta tā ca iti viśeṣaḥ pi viśeṣavān

original: abhinno 'pi kriyādiśca svabhāva iti hi śrutiḥ /
analyzed: a bhinnaḥ kriyā ādiḥ ca svabhāvaḥ iti hi śrutiḥ

original: jñānaṃ nityaṃ kriyā nityā balaṃ śaktiḥ parātmanaḥ // MAnuv_1,2.7 //
analyzed: jñānam nityam kriyā nityā balam śaktiḥ parātmanaḥ
iti paiṅgi śrutiḥ ca āha śakti sadbhāve eva tu
kriyā ādi nitya tā jñeyā tad anyatra tu anitya tā
iti sat tattva vacanam dvi tvam ca ekasya yujyate
yaḥ setuḥ iti ca eka tva vacanena viśeṣaṇāt
antar sthitvā ramaṇa kṛt antaraḥ samudāhṛtaḥ
ramaṇam ca ātma śabdena ādeyam māti iti ca ucyate
viśiṣṭa sukhavat tvāt ca brahma tvam ca viśiṣṭa tā
anyonya niyatiḥ ca īśa niyame na anyathā bhavet
cetanānām viśeṣaḥ yaḥ
anyonya niyame tasmāt anavasthiti asambhavau
īśvaraḥ ced niyantā ca saḥ eva prathama āgataḥ
kim iti apodyate kasmāt vṛthā avasthiti kalpanā

original: doṣavatyeva tasmāt sā naiva kāryā kathañcana // MAnuv_1,2.13 //
analyzed: doṣavatī eva tasmāt sā nā eva kāryā kathañcana
ramaṇam na ati yatnasya vikṣepāt eva yujyate

original: iti cet sarvaniyamo yasya kasmānna śakyate // MAnuv_1,2.14 //
analyzed: iti ced sarva niyamaḥ yasya kasmāt na śakyate
ātmanā aniyatam vastu pratīpam hi ātmanaḥ bhavet
svādhīna sattā śaktayā ādi katham ātma pratīpakam
guṇa kriyā ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ yat iva syuḥ abhedinaḥ
abhedaḥ bhāva dharmāṇām brahmaṇā yujyate katham

original: nābhāvo bhāva iti ca viśeṣaḥ prāyaśo bhavet /
analyzed: na abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ iti ca viśeṣaḥ prāyaśas bhavet

original: atadbhāvo 'nyatā ceti na viśeṣo 'sti kaścana // MAnuv_1,2.17 //
analyzed: a tad bhāvaḥ ca iti na viśeṣaḥ sti kaścana
doṣa abhāvaḥ guṇaḥ iti prasiddhaḥ laukikeṣu api
adṛśya tva ādikān tasmāt guṇān āha svayam prabhuḥ
bhāva abhāva virodhaḥ na tu sarvatra vidyate

original: tadabhāvo hi tadbhāvavirodhī na tato 'paraḥ // MAnuv_1,2.19 //
analyzed: tad abhāvaḥ hi tad bhāva virodhī na paraḥ
pṛthak tava abhāva tad rūpān bhedān trīn kalpayanti ced
kalpanā gaurava ādyāḥ tu doṣāḥ tatra virodhinaḥ
pṛthaktava anyatva bhedāḥ tu paryāyeṇa eva laukikaiḥ
vyavahriyante satatam vaidikaiḥ api sarvaśas
dṛṣṭa hāniḥ adṛṣṭasya kalpanā iti eva dūṣaṇam

original: yadā tadadhiko doṣo vidyate ko nu vādinām // MAnuv_1,2.22 //
analyzed: yadā tad adhikaḥ doṣaḥ vidyate kaḥ nu vādinām
bhāva abhāva svarūpāḥ tu viśeṣāḥ eva vastunaḥ
abhinnāḥ eva saṅgrāhyāḥ vyavahāra prasiddhaye
yathā ekaḥ bheda abhedau ca vastuni
aṅgīkāryāḥ viśeṣeṇa sthāneṣu vyavahartṛbhiḥ
syāt viśeṣaḥ n icchataḥ pi asau

original: vyāvṛtte nirviśeṣe tu kiṃ vyāvartyabahutvataḥ // MAnuv_1,2.25 //
analyzed: vyāvṛtte nirviśeṣe tu kim vyāvartya bahu tvataḥ
bahu liṅga samāyuktaiḥ bahubhiḥ rūḍha nāmabhiḥ
prasiddhaiḥ anya ga tvena vācyaḥ sākṣāt janārdanaḥ
vaiśvānara ādayaḥ śabdāḥ api tad vācinaḥ tatas

original: tāni liṅgāni te śabdā api tadgā hi sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: tāni liṅgāni te śabdāḥ api tad gāḥ hi sarvaśas
bahulā api ajña rūḍhiḥ tad prajñā ārūḍhim na bādhate

original: // iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādaviracite śrīmadbrahmasūtrānuvyākhyāne prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne prathama adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
tatra anyatra ca siddhānām liṅga nāmnām punar hariḥ
viśeṣāt mukhyatas vṛttim svasmin eva atra
viṣṇau eva ātma śabdasya rūḍha tvāt na śiva ādikān
śrutiḥ vakti akhila īśa tvāt bhūmā viṣṇuḥ sukha adhikaḥ
atas viruddha vat bhātam api vyākhyāya tattvataḥ
yojanīyam harau vākyam viruddhaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yutam
brahmā eva tāni liṅgāni tad anyatra tu asanti api
avirodhena govinde santi asthūla ādikāni ca
anya vastu svabhāvānām sthaulya ādīnām apākṛtim
nārāyaṇe śrutiḥ vakti na tu tasya asvabhāvatām
sarva dharmā sarva nāmā sarva karmā guṇāḥ śrutāḥ

original: doṣāḥ śrutāśca netyādyā pramāṇaṃ śrutiratra ca // MAnuv_1,3.6 //
analyzed: doṣāḥ śrutāḥ ca na ityādyā pramāṇam śrutiḥ atra ca
liṅgam sādhāraṇam śabdau sthānam liṅgam anugrahaḥ

original: punaḥ śabdā liṅgaśabdau vicāryā dvisthitā iha // MAnuv_1,3.7 //
analyzed: punar śabdāḥ liṅga śabdau vicāryāḥ dvi sthitāḥ iha
bāhulyam liṅga śabdānām anuktiḥ ca viruddha tā
adṛṣṭiḥ anvaya abhāvaḥ viparīta śruti bhramaḥ
bahu tādṛś tava muktasya virodhaḥ rthāt tathā gatiḥ
samastam etat iti atra pūrvapakṣeṣu yuktayaḥ
tāḥ eva balavantaḥ tu gati antara vivarjitāḥ

original: siddhāntayuktayo jñeyā dṛśyante tāśca sarvaśaḥ // MAnuv_1,3.10 //
analyzed: siddhānta yuktayaḥ jñeyāḥ dṛśyante tāḥ ca sarvaśas
mukta upasṛpya tā prāṇāt ādhikyam sarvatas tathā
vailakṣaṇyam svabhāvasya prekṣā pūrva kriyā tathā
arasya ca īśa tvam sūrya ādi anukṛtiḥ tathā
vāmana ākhyā sarva kampaḥ tad śabda ananya siddha tā
a nāma rūpa tā bhedasya upajīvya pramāṇa tā
sarva aiśvarya ādika ādyāḥ tāḥ veda īśena pradarśitāḥ
adhikāraḥ ca tad hāniḥ prasaṅgāt eva cintitau

original: tatphalāya vidhiḥ siddhe copāsāyā nirākṛtaḥ // MAnuv_1,3.14 //
analyzed: tad phalāya vidhiḥ siddhe ca upāsāyāḥ nirākṛtaḥ
yatas jaimininā anya artham asiddhe rthe vidhiḥ tathā
vidyādhirājasya matam avirodhaḥ tayoḥ tatas

original: mokṣe phalaviśeṣo 'sti na ca sarvaṃ prakāśate /
analyzed: mokṣe phala viśeṣaḥ sti na ca sarvam prakāśate

original: sarvadā tena devānāmapi yuktā hyupāsanā // MAnuv_1,3.16 //
analyzed: sarvadā tena devānām api yuktā hi upāsanā

original: nityaṃ vṛddhikṣayāpetaṃ viṣṇoḥ pūrṇaṃ tu vedanam /
analyzed: nityam vṛddhi kṣaya apetam viṣṇoḥ pūrṇam tu vedanam
spaṣṭa ati spaṣṭa viśadam śeṣa vastu gam
anyeṣām kramaśas jñānam mita vastu gatam sadā
ityādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ tu sadā vidyāpateḥ hṛdi
jaimini ādyāḥ tu sāmānya vettṛ tvāt tat tathā avadan
vidyeśa matam etasmāt nā eva sadbhiḥ viruddhayate
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrī brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne prathama adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
duḥkhi baddha avara ādyāḥ tu tad adhīna tva hetutaḥ

original: śabdā brahmaṇi vartante rājñi yadvat parājayaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.1 //
analyzed: śabdāḥ brahmaṇi vartante rājñi yadvat parājayaḥ
svātantryam tadgata tvam ca śabda vṛtteḥ hi kāraṇam

original: svātantryaṃ tatra mukhyaṃ syāt kuto rājñi jayo 'nyathā // MAnuv_1,4.2 //
analyzed: svātantryam tatra mukhyam syāt kutas rājñi jayaḥ nyathā
na hi bhṛtyasya vijayi śabdaḥ tāvat prayujyate
yāvat rājñī anya ga tve pi svātantrya ābhāsa mātrataḥ
bhṛtya bandha ādikam rājñi rājñaḥ bandha ādi yogyataḥ

original: kāraṇaṃ saṃśayasya syāditi naiva prayujyate // MAnuv_1,4.4 //
analyzed: kāraṇam saṃśayasya syāt iti nā eva prayujyate
amaṅgala tvāt śabdānām rājñā yogāt amaṅgale
apriya tvāt tu śabdasya syāt prayoga nivartanam
guṇāḥ tu tādṛśāḥ yatra prayujyante khilāḥ api
pūjyeṣu eva viśeṣeṇa svātantryam mukhya kāraṇam
tatas doṣa ati dūra tvāt saṃśayasya api asambhavāt
doṣāṇām viṣṇu ga tvasya prājña buddhi vyapekṣayā
svātantrya artham abhipretya doṣa śabdāḥ ca viṣṇavi
vāsudeva śrutiḥ ca āha na eva viṣṇau amaṅgalam
maṅgala amaṅgale nyatra tatas na amaṅgalam vadet
svātantrya apekṣayā viṣṇau doṣaḥ na amaṅgala uktitaḥ

original: bahubhuktavaṃ yathā doṣo nṛṣu naiva harau kvacit /
analyzed: yathā doṣaḥ nṛṣu nā eva harau kvacid
evam duḥkhi ādi śabdāḥ ca svātantrya apekṣayā uditāḥ
na eva doṣāḥ harau tad ga buddhayā uktāḥ doṣa kāriṇaḥ

original: tasmāt te doṣaśabdāśca tatraiva guṇavācakāḥ // MAnuv_1,4.11 //
analyzed: tasmāt te doṣa śabdāḥ ca tatra eva guṇa vācakāḥ
harau yasmāt jyotiḥ ṣaḥ prāṇa rūpataḥ
āyajñetaḥ ca āyajetaḥ vasantiḥ ca vasantataḥ
vigata chādana tvāt tu gaccha bhūta kṣayaṅkaraḥ

original: bhuṅkṣetyukto harir huṃ ca hutamasmin jagad yataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.13 //
analyzed: bhuṅkṣa iti uktaḥ hariḥ hum ca hutam asmin jagat yatas
sphuṭa tvāt phaṭ iti proktaḥ kavarakṣaṇaḥ iti atas
kavacam yasmāt ṣaḍguṇa tvena sarvadā
vaṣaṭ tat gatvataḥ teṣām vauṣaṭ iti eva kathyate
svīyam svīkurute yasmāt svāhā iti uktaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: namantyasmin guṇā yasyānnama ityeva kathyate // MAnuv_1,4.15 //
analyzed: namanti asmin guṇāḥ yasya annam iti eva kathyate
iti aśeṣa kriyā nāma śabdaiḥ ekaḥ janārdanaḥ
ucyate mukhyatas yasmāt pada varṇa svara ādibhiḥ
tasmāt ananta guṇa tā śruti tātparyataḥ hi
vijñāna artha tvataḥ sarva śabdānām nā asti dūṣaṇam
aṅgīkṛte na evā asti doṣaḥ vākya samanvaye
tad artha tvena karma ādeḥ sambhavāt alpa buddhaye
kaḥ chandasām yogam iti śruteḥ yoga artha tattva vid

original: brahmaiko naiva cānyo 'sti ka ityasyarobhayārthataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.19 //
analyzed: brahmā ekaḥ nā eva ca anyaḥ sti kaḥ
tasya api pūrva siddhasya jñānam evā iti niścayāt
nitya yogaḥ śabdānām arthaiḥ nā eva
strī śabdāḥ ca niṣedha arthāḥ sarve brahma vācakāḥ
virodhi sarva bāhulya kāraṇa strī niṣedhinām
pṛthak samanvaya arthāni sthānāni etāni sarvaśas
sarva mānaiḥ virodhaḥ ca vyutpatteḥ api aśakya tā
paraspara virodhaḥ ca virodhaḥ kārya tadvatoḥ
strī liṅga tvam niṣedhaḥ ca pūrvapakṣeṣu hetavaḥ
doṣa ati a spṛṣṭi niyamaḥ śabda artha aneka tā tathā
bahu rūpa tvam īśasya vyaktaya vyakti viśeṣi tā
utpādanam sva dehāt ca durjana avyakta tā tathā

original: itayādyā yuktayaḥ sākṣāt siddhāntasthāpakā iha // MAnuv_1,4.24 //
analyzed: itayā ādyāḥ yuktayaḥ sākṣāt siddhānta sthāpakāḥ iha
anvayaḥ sarva śabdānām aśakyaḥ jñātum añjasā
iti yat loka vaimukhyam jaimini ādi matam vadan
vidyā adhināthaḥ bhagavān apācakre svayam prabhuḥ
sva śiṣyāṇām prasiddhayartham matam ātmīyam aṃśataḥ
vijñātam taiḥ jagāda atra tāratamyam nṛṇām vadan

original: teṣu teṣu padārtheṣu rūḍhiraṅgīkṛtā yataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.27 //
analyzed: teṣu teṣu padārtheṣu rūḍhiḥ aṅgīkṛtā yatas
prayojana bahu tvena tasya tasya avirodhataḥ
upadeśa ādi sāmarthyāt viṣṇau śaktiḥ ca gṛhyate
tathā api etad virodhe tu tad vāci tvam apodyate

original: avirodhe tu bahvarthā etanmūlatayā matāḥ // MAnuv_1,4.29 //
analyzed: avirodhe tu bahu arthāḥ etad mūla tayā matāḥ
itas hi rūḍha tā anyeṣām upajīvya tvam atra hi

original: tatsiddhistadapekṣā ca sāpekṣā ca harīcchayā // MAnuv_1,4.30 //
analyzed: tad siddhiḥ tad apekṣā ca sa apekṣā ca hari icchayā
tasmāt parama mukhya tvam viṣṇau anyatra mukhya tā

original: upalakṣaṇā ca gauṇī ca tisraḥ śabdasya vṛttayaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.31 //
analyzed: upalakṣaṇā ca gauṇī ca tisraḥ śabdasya vṛttayaḥ
pravṛtti hetoḥ bāhulyam jñeyam parama mukhya tā

original: tatra prayogabāhulyaṃ yadi tatparatā kimu // MAnuv_1,4.32 //
analyzed: tatra prayoga bāhulyam yadi tad para tā kimu
ubhayam dṛśyate viṣṇau śabdānām api sarvaśas
prayoga mātra bāhulyam rūḍhiḥ iti abhidhīyate
prayoga yukta sādṛśyam sambandhaḥ vā api amukhyataḥ
vṛtti hetuḥ iti jñeyaḥ pūrvā yoge para grahaḥ
etam eva tathā santam śatarcī ityādi nāmabhiḥ
ācakṣate iti hi atra santam iti avadhāraṇā

original: yogasya rūḍheḥ prābalyaṃ vidvadrūḍhiṃ ca tatragām /
analyzed: yogasya rūḍheḥ prābalyam vidvas rūḍhim ca tatragām
bahuśas darśayati añjas tātparyāt sa niruktikam

original: a iti brahma kathitaṃ tadvayākhyānānmatā tathā /
analyzed: a iti brahma kathitam tad vayākhyānāt matā tathā
śabdānām api sarveṣām nāma vid kṛtakṛtyatā
viṣṇu nāma artha rūpa tvam saṃhitā ādeḥ atha abravīt

original: ṇakāraṃ ca ṣakāraṃ ca balaceṣṭātmakaṃ vadan // MAnuv_1,4.38 //
analyzed: ṇakāram ca ṣakāram ca bala ceṣṭā ātmakam vadan
tad jñāna pūrvaka tvena saṃhitā adhyayanam tathā
upasarga tvataḥ veḥ tu tācchīlya arthāt unaḥ tathā
ṇakāraḥ ca ṣakāraḥ ca nāma rūpa tayā matau
tasmāt samanvayaḥ viṣṇau svara varṇa pada ātmanaḥ
api vedasya kim uta vākya rūpeṇa saṅgatiḥ

original: ghoṣāḥ sarve 'pi vedāśca sarve vedāśca yat padam // MAnuv_1,4.41 //
analyzed: ghoṣāḥ sarve vedāḥ ca sarve vedāḥ ca yat padam

original: indraṃ mitraṃ yamindraṃ ca prathamaḥ saṅkṛtistathā /
analyzed: indram mitram yam indram ca prathamaḥ saṅkṛtiḥ tathā
nāma dhāḥ sarva devānām ekaḥ iti ādikā śrutiḥ
pramāṇam ukta viṣaye tat eva uktam upakramāt
iti svayam bhagavatā bruvatā aśeṣam anvayam
na śabda vācya tā eva atra pradhanasya
sarva veda itihāseṣu purāṇeṣu ca saṅgrahāt
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti guṇāḥ prakṛti sambhavāḥ
nibadhnanti mahā bāho dehe dehinam avyayam
ityādi vākya rūpeṇa yatra arthaḥ na anyaḥ iṣyate
tejaḥ banna ātmakam vā api yadi upādānam iṣyate
anādyā iva aparādhaḥ kaḥ pradhānam iti ca udite
ajām ekām iti prāha śrutiḥ etām yadā tadā

original: ko doṣaḥ sarvathaivāsti pariṇāmi jaḍaṃ yadi // MAnuv_1,4.47 //
analyzed: kaḥ doṣaḥ sarvathā evā asti pariṇāmi jaḍam yadi
asmākam parama mukhya arthaḥ bhagavān ekaḥ eva tu
mukhya mātra tayā rūḍham sarvam abhyupagamyate
sarveṣām api śabdānām gauṇī ādyam tad ayogataḥ
artha dvayam abhipretya pravṛtte hariḥ uktavān
kāryāṇām kāraṇam pūrvam vacasām vācyam uttamam

original: yogānāṃ paramāṃ siddhiṃ paramaṃ te padaṃ viduḥ // MAnuv_1,4.50 //
analyzed: yogānām paramām siddhim paramam te padam viduḥ
iti buddhau samārohāt ubhayoḥ yoga rūḍhayoḥ
tyāge ca kāraṇa abhāvāt ubhaya artha tvam iṣyate

original: sā bhaved yatra sa vyarthaḥ pūrvāroho bhramo yathā /
analyzed: sā bhavet yatra sa vyarthaḥ pūrva ārohaḥ bhramaḥ yathā

original: ato jagadupādānaṃ pradhānaṃ vakti sā śrutiḥ // MAnuv_1,4.52 //
analyzed: atas jagat upādānam pradhānam vakti sā śrutiḥ
yat tat triguṇam avyaktam nityam sat asat ātmakam
pradhānam prakṛtim prāhuḥ aviśeṣam viśeṣavat
pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ brahma caturbhiḥ daśabhiḥ tathā
etad caturviṃśatikam gaṇam prādhānikam viduḥ

original: iti bhāgavate prāha vidyādhīśaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: iti bhāgavate prāha vidyādhīśaḥ svayam prabhuḥ
na ca prakṛti śabdena brahma upādānam ucyate

original: avikāraḥ sadā śuddho nitya ātmā sadā hariḥ /
analyzed: avikāraḥ sadā śuddhaḥ nityaḥ ātmā sadā hariḥ

original: aviśvo viśvakartājo yaḥ paraḥ so 'bhidhīyate // MAnuv_1,4.57 //
analyzed: aviśvaḥ viśvakartā ajaḥ yaḥ paraḥ saḥ abhidhīyate

original: brahmeti paramātmeti yaṃ vidurvaidikā janāḥ // MAnuv_1,4.58 //
analyzed: brahma iti parama ātmā iti yam viduḥ vaidikāḥ janāḥ
iti śruti purāṇa uktayā na vikārī janārdanaḥ
para adhīna viśeṣa āptiḥ a nivartya anyathābhavaḥ

original: kṣīrādivad vikāraḥ syānnaiva sa syāddhareḥ kvacit /
analyzed: kṣīra ādi vat vikāraḥ syāt na eva sa syāt hareḥ kvacid
apādāna tvam eva asya yadi upādāna tā iṣyate
aṅgīkṛtam tat pitṛ vat na tu viśvātmanā bhavaḥ
na ca ūrṇanābhi janitṛ mātṛṇām ca vikāri tā
cetana tvāt tat annam hi kārya rūpa tayā bhavet
apādāna tayā viśva kartṛ tvam buddhi pūrvakam
uktam bhāllavi śākhāyām brahmatarke ca sādaram
icchā mātrāt prabhoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ avikārasya sarvadā
svabhāvaḥ yam anantasya rajaḥ yena abhavat jagat
sva deha ādi chayā viśvam bhukta pūrvam janārdanaḥ
sasarja mātā pitṛ vat ūrṇanābhi vat eva vā

original: pradhānaṃ pariṇāmyeśo nirvikāraḥ svayaṃ sadā // MAnuv_1,4.65 //
analyzed: pradhānam pariṇāmya īśaḥ nirvikāraḥ svayam sadā

original: na cetanavikāraḥ syād yatra kvāpi hyacetanam /
analyzed: na cetana vikāraḥ syāt yatra kvāpi hi acetanam
na acetana vikāraḥ cetanaḥ syāt kadācana
na ca anyasya anya rūpa tvam vikṛta tve dṛśyate

original: na kṣīrādanyatā dadhnaḥ kenacid dṛśyate kvacit // MAnuv_1,4.67 //
analyzed: na kṣīrāt anya tā dadhnaḥ kenacid dṛśyate kvacid
sarvajñāt brahmaṇaḥ jagataḥ hi anubhūyate
abhedaḥ sattva mātreṇa syāt kharva su aṇayoḥ api
bhāgena pariṇāmaḥ ced bhāgayoḥ bhedaḥ eva hi

original: yo bhāgo na vikārī syāt sa evāsmākamīśvaraḥ // MAnuv_1,4.69 //
analyzed: yaḥ bhāgaḥ na vikārī syāt saḥ eva asmākam īśvaraḥ

original: bhinnānāṃ samudāyasya nāma brahmeti ced bhavet /
analyzed: bhinnānām samudāyasya nāma brahmā iti ced bhavet

original: brahmopādānatā na syāt tadā viśvasya hi kvacit // MAnuv_1,4.70 //
analyzed: brahma upādāna tā na syāt tadā viśvasya hi kvacid
śṛṅgāt śaraḥ vilomabhyaḥ dūrvā gomayataḥ tathā
vṛścikaḥ ca iti evamādyeṣu apādāna tvam iṣyate
upādāna eka deśa tvam yadi api atra pradṛśyate
api apādāna tā eva atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ brahmaṇaḥ bhavet
na hi upādāna tā eva atra bāhya avayava gauravāt

original: na cācetanatas tatra cetanasya samudbhavaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.73 //
analyzed: na ca acetanataḥ tatra cetanasya samudbhavaḥ
upādāna tayā kin tarhi apādānam hi acetanam
kārya deha gatasya asya cetanasya pradṛśyate
sat ca tyad ca abhavat iti na asya viśva tvam ucyate

original: tat sṛṣṭveti giraivāsya pūrvaṃ viśvasya siddhitaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.75 //
analyzed: tat sṛṣṭvā iti girā eva asya pūrvam viśvasya siddhitaḥ
sattvāt tateḥ vaidika tvāt samyak vaktum aśakyataḥ
āśraya tvāt sva āśraya tvāt jñāna tvāt durvida tvataḥ
sattateḥ yātanāt ca eva hi aprāpta tvāt ca durjanaiḥ
nitya asādhu guṇa vyāpti yantṛ rūpa tvataḥ sadā

original: jagadgatena rūpeṇa brahmaiva hi tathocyate // MAnuv_1,4.77 //
analyzed: jagat gatena rūpeṇa brahmā eva hi tathā ucyate
vyaktiḥ ukta guṇānām hi puruṣa apekṣayā nṛṇām
bhavet abhavat iti ādyaḥ prayogaḥ ca atra yujyate
tasmāt aśeṣa kartā ekaḥ nirvikāraḥ ramāpatiḥ
śabdaiḥ prakṛtiḥ ityādyaiḥ strī liṅgaiḥ abhidhīyate
bahu syām iti tasya eva hi ukta mārgeṇa yujyate
tad tad gatena rūpeṇa tad artham hi asṛjat jagat
yat ca avikṛtam eva etat brahma viśvātmanā mṛṣā

original: dṛśyate mandadṛṣṭayaiva sa sarga iti kathyate // MAnuv_1,4.81 //
analyzed: dṛśyate manda dṛṣṭayā eva sa sargaḥ iti kathyate
sā manda dṛṣṭiḥ tasya eva brahmaṇaḥ kim tatas

original: brahmaṇaścet kva sārvajñyamanyagā cet svato 'nyatā // MAnuv_1,4.82 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ ced kva sārvajñyam anya gā ced svatas
na a deha yoginaḥ dṛṣṭiḥ iti tat kāraṇam svatas

original: dehinaḥ kāraṇayutā dehāśca yadi na bhramāt // MAnuv_1,4.83 //
analyzed: dehinaḥ kāraṇa yutāḥ dehāḥ ca yadi na bhramāt

original: kiṃ bhrāntikalpitaṃ tatra bhedo 'pi bhramajo yadi /
analyzed: kim bhrānti kalpitam tatra bhedaḥ bhrama jaḥ yadi
bhrānteḥ ajñāna mūla tvāt tasya bheda vyapekṣayā
na ajñāna kalpakam kiñcid anyonya āśraya tā yatas
bhrama tve tu iyam uktiḥ ca tad antar patanāt na hi
vyāvahārika tā ca asya syāt abādhya tve eva hi

original: bādhyaṃ nārthakriyākāri na ca svapno 'pi no mṛṣā // MAnuv_1,4.86 //
analyzed: bādhyam na arthakriyā kāri na ca no mṛṣā
vāsanā janita tvena tasya api aṅgīkṛta tvataḥ

original: sa hi karteti vākyācca jāgrattvamiti hi bhramaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.87 //
analyzed: sa hi kartā iti vākyāt ca jāgrat tvam iti hi bhramaḥ
sarpa bhrama ādau api hi jñānam asti eva tādṛśam
tat eva artha kriyā kāri tat sat eva artha kārakam

original: brahma tvarthakriyākāri parataḥ svata eva vā /
analyzed: brahma tu arthakriyā kāri paratas svatas eva vā

original: aṅgīkṛtaṃ hi tenaiva paratastve na ca pramā // MAnuv_1,4.89 //
analyzed: aṅgīkṛtam hi tena eva paratas tve na ca pramā
amukhya satya mānasya sādhaka tve sadā āvayoḥ

original: na hi sampratipattiḥ syādatastiṣṭhatu sā pramā // MAnuv_1,4.90 //
analyzed: na hi sampratipattiḥ syāt atas tiṣṭhatu sā pramā

original: na hi vipratipannena śakyaṃ sādhayituṃ kvacit /
analyzed: na hi vipratipannena śakyam sādhayitum kvacid
sādhaka tvam tu satyasya sākṣiṇaḥ hi āvayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: samyak sampratipannaṃ tanna vivatarmamataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.91 //
analyzed: samyak sampratipannam tat na bhavet
yadi nā aṅgīkṛtam kiñcid anaṅgīkṛtatā api hi
na aṅgīkṛtā iti mūkaḥ syāt iti na asmad vivādi tā
viśvam satyam yat ciketa praghā anvasya yathārthataḥ

original: avirodhaścaturthe tu pāte samyak samarthyate // MAnuv_2,1.70 //
analyzed: avirodhaḥ caturthe tu pāte samyak samarthyate

original: asat kāryaṃ yathā dṛṣṭaṃ vastutvāt kāraṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: asat kāryam yathā dṛṣṭam vastu tvāt kāraṇam tathā

original: iti cenna niṣedhaikasvarūpasya na kartṛtā // MAnuv_2,1.71 //
analyzed: iti ced na niṣedha eka svarūpasya na kartṛ tā
buddhi pūrva pravṛttiḥ hi kartṛ tvam iha niścitam

original: abhāvasya ca bhāvo 'pi dharmo 'thāpi hi dharmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: abhāvasya ca bhāvaḥ hi dharmiṇaḥ

original: sarvanāśeṣvapi sadā śiṣṭatvād yasya kasya nuḥ /
analyzed: sarva nāśeṣu api sadā śiṣṭa tvāt yasya kasya nuḥ
nāśaḥ yam syāt nāśa tvāt kartṛ śeṣavān
na ca aśeṣa nṛ nāśaḥ tu dṛṣṭaḥ dṛśyaḥ sti vā kvacid
dharma adharma āśraya tvena svīkāryaḥ pi naraḥ laye

original: anāditvaṃ vinādṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ syāt kāraṇaṃ kvacit /

original: pūrvādṛṣṭāt parādṛṣṭaṃ yadi naivottaraṃ kutaḥ // MAnuv_2,1.77 //
analyzed: pūrva adṛṣṭāt para adṛṣṭam yadi na eva uttaram kutas

original: adṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ no cellaye mānaṃ ca kiṃ bhavet /

original: utpattināśakārī hi buddhimān dṛśyate kvacit // MAnuv_2,1.78 //
analyzed: utpatti nāśa kārī hi buddhimān dṛśyate kvacid
tad dṛṣṭāntena sarvatra kartā kim nā anumīyate

āgama anugraha abhāve na tarkaḥ syāt pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: anyathāsyāpratiṣṭhā ca svavācā vyāhataiva hi // MAnuv_2,1.80 //

atas
tat mano kuruta ityādeḥ asataḥ manasaḥ janiḥ

original: nivāritā tu pūrvatra hyakasmāditi tadvinā // MAnuv_2,1.82 //
analyzed: nivāritā tu pūrvatra hi akasmāt iti tat vinā

original: prāpakaṃ vākyamātraṃ tu parihāro viśeṣitaḥ // MAnuv_2,1.83 //

original: ato jīvasya na brahmabhāvaḥ syāddhi kadācana // MAnuv_2,1.85 //

original: bhoktṛtvāpattita iti yanmataṃ tat kuto hariḥ /

original: bhoktrāpatteriti prāha kathaṃ ca tadananyatā // MAnuv_2,1.87 //
analyzed: bhoktṛ āpatteḥ iti prāha katham ca tad ananyatā

original: dravyaṃ karma ca kālaśca svabhāvaścetanā dhṛtiḥ /

original: iti śrutestadvaśasya bhāvo na para ityataḥ // MAnuv_2,1.89 //
analyzed: iti śruteḥ tad vaśasya bhāvaḥ na paraḥ iti atas
śaktaḥ hi anyathā kartum sva icchā niyamataḥ hariḥ

original: asad yat kāryarūpeṇa kāraṇātmatayāsti hi // MAnuv_2,1.91 //
analyzed: asat yat kārya rūpeṇa kāraṇa ātma tayā asti hi
anavasthā anyathā hi syāt sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ
śaktaḥ pi bhagavān viṣṇuḥ a kartum kartum anyathā
sva bhinnam kāraṇa abhinna bhinnam viśvam karoti ajaḥ
iti śruteḥ avasitaḥ ukta arthaḥ yam aśeṣatas
an aṃśasya api jīvasya kiñcid sāmarthya yojanām

original: kāryeṣu yaḥ karotyaddhā namastasmai svayambhuve // MAnuv_2,1.94 //

original: yadi bhāgena kāryeṣu jīvaśaktiṃ na yojayet /

original: haristadā hi sarvatra kṛtsnayatnoṃ'śitāpi vā // MAnuv_2,1.95 //
analyzed: hariḥ tadā hi sarvatra kṛtsna yatna ūṃśitā api vā

original: aṃśino hi paṭādyā ye bhinnaireva parasparam /
analyzed: aṃśinaḥ hi paṭa ādyāḥ ye bhinnaiḥ eva parasparam

original: aṃśairaṃśina ucyante naivameva hi cetanāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.96 //
analyzed: aṃśaiḥ aṃśinaḥ ucyante na evam eva hi cetanāḥ
atas na aṃśinaḥ iti eva śrutiḥ eteṣu vartate
api aneka svarūpeṣu viśeṣāt eva kevalam
bahu svarūpa tā ākhyā tu teṣu asti eva hi sa aṃśa tā
bahu tvena avinābhāvāt bhinna tā niyamāt bhavet
yadi nā evam niyama kṛt bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ

original: tasya tvaśeṣaśaktitvād yujyate savarmeva ca // MAnuv_2,1.99 //
analyzed: tasya tu aśeṣa śakti tvāt yujyate sa varmā iva ca
virodhaḥ sarva vaiśiṣṭaye yaḥ dvitīye nirasyate
nārāyaṇasya tu adhyāye tad anye tatra tatragāḥ
sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vākyānām jīva rūpa abhidhāyinām
api anyonya avirodhaḥ tu dvitīya adhyāya gocaraḥ
māna meya viśeṣeṇa punaruktiḥ na jāyate
sadā pravṛttiḥ īśasya svabhāvāt eva kevalam
aṅga ceṣyāḥ yathā puṃsaḥ kāścid uddeśa varjitāḥ
devasya eṣa svabhāvaḥ yam iti āha śrutiḥ añjasā
krīḍām prayojanam kṛtvā sṛṣṭiḥ śruti virodhinī

original: iti kevalalīlaiva nirṇītā prabhuṇā svayam // MAnuv_2,1.104 //
analyzed: iti kevala līlā eva nirṇītā prabhuṇā svayam
ātma prayojana arthāya spṛhām śrutiḥ avārayat
na prayojanavat tvena iti atas āha jagadguruḥ
icchā mātram prabhoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ iti sṛṣṭau viniścitāḥ
iti praśaṃsayā kāma śrutibhyaḥ ca eva yuktitaḥ
mahā tātparya yukteḥ ca na icchā mātram

original: mokṣārthāḥ śrutayo yasmāt sa ca tasya prasādataḥ /
analyzed: mokṣa arthāḥ śrutayaḥ yasmāt sa ca tasya prasādataḥ
unninīṣati vākyāt ca loka dṛṣṭa anusārataḥ
icchāṃnimittakaḥ yasmāt tad abhāve kutas śrutiḥ
mahā tātparya rahitā pramāṇa tvam gamiṣyati
yāthārthyam eva māna tvam api vākyam prayojakam
māna tvam eti tatra api yat sampūrṇa prayojanam
vaiṣamyam ca eva nairghṛṇyam veda aprāmāṇya kāraṇam
na aṅgīkāryam atas na vaiṣamya ādi nāmakam

original: yadadhīnā guṇāścaiva doṣā api hi sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: yad adhīnāḥ guṇāḥ ca eva doṣāḥ api hi sarvaśas

original: guṇāstasya kathaṃ na syuḥ syurdeṣāśca kathaṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_2,1.111 //
analyzed: guṇāḥ tasya katham na syuḥ syuḥ deṣāḥ ca katham punar
sarva dharma apapatteḥ tat vākyaiḥ api hi tādṛśaiḥ
nirdoṣa aśeṣa guṇakaḥ nirṇītaḥ bhagavān hariḥ
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrī brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne dvitīya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ
smṛti yukti śruti guṇa yuktayaḥ bahu yuktayaḥ

original: evaṃ caturvidhā naiva viruddhayante 'nvayaṃ prati // MAnuv_2,2.1 //
analyzed: evam caturvidhāḥ nā eva viruddhayante nu ayam prati
iti prathama pādena nirṇīte pi abhiyogataḥ
darśanānām pravṛtta tvāt mandaḥ āśaṅkate punar
anādi kālataḥ vṛttāḥ samayāḥ hi pravāhataḥ
na ca ucchedaḥ sti kasya api samayasya iti atas vibhuḥ
bhrānti mūla tvam eteṣām pṛthak darśayati sphuṭam
tarkaiḥ dṛḍhatamaiḥ eva vākyaiḥ ca āgama vādinām
daurlabhyāt śuddha buddhīnām bāhulyāt alpa vedinām
tāmasa tvāt ca lokasya mithyā jñāna prasaktitaḥ

original: vidveṣāt parame tattve tattvavediṣu cāniśam // MAnuv_2,2.5 //
analyzed: vidveṣāt parame tattve tattva vediṣu ca aniśam
anādi vāsanā yogāt asurāṇām bahu tvataḥ
durāgraha gṛhīta tvāt vartante samayāḥ sadā
tathā api śuddha buddhīnām īśa anugraha yoginām
yuyuktayaḥ tamaḥ hanyuḥ āgama anugatāḥ sadā
iti vidyāpatiḥ samyak samayānām nirākṛtim
cakāra nija bhaktānām buddhi śāṇa tva siddhaye
cetana acetanam tattva dvayam eva nirīśvarāḥ
āhuḥ tat pañca pañcatva vibhāga stham acetanam

original: cetanaṃ tadasaṅkhayātaṃ bhinnamanyad layaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.9 //
analyzed: cetanam bhinnam anyat layam bhavet
acetanasya kartṛ tvam svātantryeṇa nigadyate
paraspara vibhedaḥ ca kāryāṇām ālayam bhavet
bhoktṛṇām cetanasya āhuḥ kecid tām api nā apare
svarūpa caitanya balāt sva prakāśāt ca bhogi tām
prakṛteḥ ca svarūpasya viveka agraham eva tu
abhoga vādinaḥ bhogam āhuḥ bheda grahāt tayoḥ
bhoginām muktiḥ uddiṣṭā saḥ eva abhoga vādinām
īśasya asaṅgrahāt eva na yuktau tau ubhau api
cetanā icchā anusāreṇa yadā dṛṣṭaḥ paṭa udbhavaḥ
etādṛśa tvam anyasya vastu tvāt kena vāryate

original: na ca kācit pramoktārthe śrutireva pramā hi naḥ /
analyzed: na ca kācid pramā ukta arthe śrutiḥ eva pramā hi naḥ
āpta tvam ukta mārgeṇa vaktuḥ nā evā upapadyate

original: svoktākhilaniṣedhī syānna ca kiñcit prasiddhayati // MAnuv_2,2.16 //
analyzed: sva ukta akhila niṣedhī syāt na ca kiñcid
idam na acetana vaśam vastu tvāt pratipanna vat

original: ityeva pratiṣiddhasya kena mūlānumā bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.17 //
analyzed: iti eva pratiṣiddhasya kena mūla anumā bhavet
svatantra vṛttī racanā sā ca eva acetane kutas
acetana tvam svātantryam iti
sva icchā anusāri tām eva svātantryam hi vidaḥ viduḥ

original: kuta icchācetanasya secchaṃ cet kimacetanam // MAnuv_2,2.19 //
analyzed: kutas icchā acetanasya sa iccham ced kim acetanam
icchāmi aham iti hi eva nija anubhava rodhataḥ

original: kathaṃ na sa ghaṭasya syānmano ma iti bhedataḥ /
analyzed: katham na sa ghaṭasya syāt manaḥ me iti bhedataḥ
manasaḥ u pi gṛhīta tvāt ubhaya ātmaka tā yatas
kāmasya tu manaḥ kāmaḥ priya apriya vibhedataḥ

original: dvaividhyaṃ dṛśyate cāsya tasmād bhedāgrahaḥ kutaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.22 //
analyzed: dvaividhyam dṛśyate ca asya tasmāt bheda agrahaḥ kutas
racanā anupapatteḥ tat na

original: acetanaṃ jagatkartṛ payo 'mbvādi ca nopamā // MAnuv_2,2.23 //
analyzed: acetanam jagat kartṛ payaḥ mbu ādi ca nā upamā
etad praśāsti vacanāt cetana acetanasya ca
dvaividhye pitu kāma ādeḥ kutas svāmi tvam ātmanaḥ
sākṣāt anubhava ārūḍham śakyate poditum kvacid
icchā svāmi tvam eva uktam icchāvat tvam na ca aparam
kiñcid svāmi tvam loka vat bhavet
sarva ātma tantra kāma ādeḥ kim uta eva para īśituḥ
na ca anubhava gam kāma svāmi tvam veda vāc api
śaktā apavaditum tasmāt sā tad anya abhidhāyinī
mokṣa kāmaḥ bhavet anyaḥ yadi muktāt bhaviṣyataḥ

original: mokṣakāmasya kiṃ tena svanāśārthaṃ ca ko yatet // MAnuv_2,2.28 //
analyzed: mokṣa kāmasya kim tena sva nāśa artham ca kaḥ yatet
kartṛ tvam yasya tasya eva bhoktṛ tvam upalabhyate

original: vibhāge ca tayormānaṃ naiva kiñcit kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.29 //
analyzed: vibhāge ca tayoḥ mānam nā eva kiñcid kvacid bhavet
sarva māna virodha eka durdīkṣā dīkṣitaḥ tu ayam
māyā vādi upamām yāyāt tad caśabdāt nirākṛtaḥ
sāṅkhayaḥ tu sa īśvaraḥ brūte kṣetra anugraha śaktimān
asti īśvaraḥ svayambhātaḥ kleśa karma ādi varjitaḥ
kṣetra śaktimatī sā eva prakṛtiḥ bīja śaktimān
jīvaḥ parjanya vat daiva śaktimān īśvaraḥ smṛtaḥ
pṛthivī vat pradhānam tat jīvaḥ sannidhi mātrataḥ
bīja āvapana kartā iva iti atra prāha prabhuḥ svayam

original: anyatra kāpi śaktirna svātantryeṇeśa eva hi /
analyzed: anyatra kā api śaktiḥ na svātantryeṇa īśaḥ eva hi
śaktīḥ tāḥ prerayati añjas tad adhīnāḥ ca sarvadā
sattā pradhāna puruṣa śaktīnām ca pratītayaḥ

original: pravṛttayaśca tāḥ sarvā nityaṃ nityātmanā yataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.35 //
analyzed: pravṛttayaḥ ca tāḥ sarvāḥ nityam nitya ātmanā yatas
yathā nitya tayā nityam nitya śaktayā svayā īśvaraḥ

original: niyāmayati nityaṃ ca na ṛte tvaditi śruteḥ // MAnuv_2,2.36 //
analyzed: niyāmayati nityam ca na ṛte tvat iti śruteḥ
svabhāva jīva karmāṇi dravyam kālaḥ śrutiḥ kriyāḥ

original: yatprasādādime santi na santi yadupekṣayā // MAnuv_2,2.37 //
analyzed: yad prasādāt ime santi na santi yad upekṣayā

original: iti śruterna sattādyā api nārāyaṇaṃ vinā /
analyzed: iti śruteḥ na sattā ādyāḥ api nārāyaṇam vinā
tat patañjali vindhya ādi matam na puruṣa artha dam
cārvākaiḥ ucyate mānam akṣa jam na aparam kvacid

original: deha ātmā pumarthaśca kāmārthābhyāṃ vinā na hi // MAnuv_2,2.39 //
analyzed: dehaḥ ātmā pumarthaḥ ca kāma arthābhyām vinā na hi
yat evam darśanena asya kaḥ rthaḥ pratyakṣa gocaraḥ

original: labdhastenaiva hi naraiḥ śāstrāt kiṃ mohanaṃ vinā // MAnuv_2,2.40 //
analyzed: labdhaḥ tena eva hi naraiḥ śāstrāt kim mohanam vinā
sva para artha vihīna tvāt sva matena eva niṣphalam
kim iti unmatta vat śāstram vṛthā pralapati svayam
dehāt anyaḥ nubhavate ātmā bhāti śarīriṇām

original: mama deha iti vyaktaṃ mamārtha itivat sadā // MAnuv_2,2.42 //
analyzed: mama dehaḥ iti vyaktam mama arthaḥ iti vat sadā
pratyakṣasya eva māna tvam iti kena avasīyate

original: yadi tatsādhakaṃ vedaprāmāṇye na kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.43 //
analyzed: yadi tat sādhakam veda prāmāṇye na katham bhavet
na ca anya amāna tā kvāpi pramāṇena avasīyate
sva matena artha rahitaḥ upekṣyaḥ pakṣaḥ īdṛśaḥ
sannidhānāt cetanasya vartate yadi acetanam
tathā api abuddhi pūrva tvāt ukta doṣaḥ samaḥ bhavet
aṅgi tvam puruṣasya eva sarvaiḥ api anubhūyate
tad aṅga tva uktitaḥ ca eva syāt sarvasya apalāpakaḥ
kimu sarveśvarasya asya hi apalāṣāt yatas khilam
aṅgi tvam yadi tasya eva svātantryam ced na ca akhilam
tad preraṇe pi aśakta tvāt svatantraḥ nyaḥ hi apekṣitaḥ
na ca svātantryam asya eva pratyakṣa ādi virodhataḥ
hita ākṛti ādi doṣāt ca bhadram na anīśvaram matam
saṃsāriṇaḥ sarva īśam sarva śaktim anaupamam
cetana acetanasya asya sattva ādeḥ tad adhīna tām

original: nāṅgīkurvanti ye teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca samā ime // MAnuv_2,2.49 //
analyzed: na aṅgīkurvanti ye teṣām sarveṣām ca samāḥ ime
tasmāt śruti pramāṇena yuktibhiḥ ca paraḥ hariḥ
aṅgīkā yartamaḥ nityaḥ sarvaiḥ api su niścitam
nitya jñāna prayatna iccham saṅkha yad yaiḥ api pañcabhiḥ
yuktam īśam vadanti anye tad icchā dṛṣṭa coditāḥ
paramāṇavaḥ catur vargāḥ saṃyujyante dviśas khilāḥ
paramāṇu dvayena eva dvayaṇukam nāma jāyate
dvayaṇuka trayeṇa tṛyaṇukam taiḥ caturbhiḥ tad ātmakam
tatas tu aniyamena eva khaṇḍa avayavinām bhavaḥ
tatas ca aniyamena eva sarva avayavi sambhavaḥ
kāraṇam samavāyi ākhyam paramāṇu ādi tatra hi
īśa icchā dṛṣṭa kālāḥ tu nimittam kāraṇam matam
sāmānya antya viśeṣau ca samavāyaḥ ca tat trayam

original: nityaṃ kriyā anityāstu guṇadravye dvirūpake // MAnuv_2,2.55 //
analyzed: nityam kriyāḥ anityāḥ tu guṇa dravye dvi rūpake
kārye guṇa kriyāṇām tu samavāyi anya kāraṇam
kāraṇa sthāḥ guṇa ādyāḥ tu saṃyogaḥ dravya kāraṇam
evam sthite siddhānte viśeṣaḥ tatra kalpitaḥ

original: dvayaṇuke paramāṇau ca hrasvatvaṃ parimaṇḍalam // MAnuv_2,2.57 //
analyzed: dvayaṇuke paramāṇau ca hrasva tvam parimaṇḍalam

original: na kāraṇaṃ kāryaguṇe vairūpyaṃ tatra kāraṇam /
analyzed: na kāraṇam kārya guṇe vairūpyam tatra kāraṇam
iti āhuḥ tān atha uvāca vidyādhīśaḥ svayam prabhuḥ
mahat tvam ca eva dīrgha tvam tṛ yaṇuka ādyeṣu kalpitam
tasmāt ca sadṛśam kāryam tat kāryeṣu upajāyate
yathā tathā eva hrasva tvāt hi

original: jāyeta sadṛśaṃ kārye parimāṇaṃ samatvataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.60 //
analyzed: jāyeta sadṛśam kārye parimāṇam sama tvataḥ
na ced mahattvataḥ ca eva dīghartvāt api no bhavet

original: sadṛśasya hi kāryasya naiva yogaḥ kathañcana // MAnuv_2,2.61 //
analyzed: sadṛśasya hi kāryasya na eva yogaḥ kathañcana
apratyakṣa tvam evam syāt yatas kāryeṣu aṇu tvataḥ
iti ced na mahat tvam ca paramāṇau aṇau api
katham tṛyaṇuka pūrveṣu na aṇu tvam api kathyate

original: aṇutvaṃ ca mahattvaṃ ca yato vastuvyapekṣayā // MAnuv_2,2.63 //
analyzed: aṇu tvam ca mahat tvam ca yatas vastu vyapekṣayā

original: tāratamyasthitā yasmāt padārthāḥ sarva eva ca /
analyzed: tāratamya sthitāḥ yasmāt padārthāḥ sarve eva ca
yathā mahattva viśrāntiḥ tathā aṇu tvasya ca iṣyate
parimāṇa tvataḥ ced na mahat tvasya api viśramaḥ
dṛśyate nantaḥ iti eva tathā ānantya maṇau api
na mahat tatva guṇataḥ etāvān iti hi īśvaraḥ
paricchinnaḥ tathā aṇoḥ ca na etāvat bhāga tā kvacid
viśrāntaḥ yadi ananta aṃśaḥ kaścid asti iti gamyate
na avasāyayitum śakyaḥ virodhāt eva kevalam
kevalam sākṣi mānena kālaḥ deśaḥ na antavān
aparyavasitiḥ ca aṇoḥ dṛśyate sakṣiṇā dvayoḥ

original: yadi no sākṣigamyaṃ tanmahattvaṃ kena gamyate /
analyzed: yadi no sākṣi gamyam tat mahat tvam kena gamyate
viśrāntiḥ tāratamyena dṛśyate hi anumānataḥ
yadi āgamāt anantam tat mahattvam avagamyate
anantam eva ca aṇu tvam kutas nā evā avasīyate
mahat tva aṇu tvayoḥ nā eva viśrāntiḥ upalabhyate
anyat eva hi ananta tvam mahat tva aṇu tvayoḥ samam
bahu tva alpa tvayoḥ yadvat sāṅkhayāyām upalabhyate
ānantyam eka bhāgānām tāvat tvam hi eva gaṇyate
aṇīyān ca mahīyān ca bhagavān āgama uditaḥ
ānantya vācakaḥ śabdaḥ dvidhā ānantye māna tām

original: yāti naiva guṇālpatvaṃ kālātpatvaṃ ca mānagam /
analyzed: yāti nā eva guṇa alpatvam ca māna gam
sarva kāla gatasya alpa kāle syāt avasthitiḥ

original: mahāguṇasya cālpo 'pi guṇaḥ syāditi ced bhavet /
analyzed: mahā guṇasya ca alpaḥ pi guṇaḥ syāt iti ced bhavet

original: tāvattvameva naiva syād deśe 'pyetanna no matam // MAnuv_2,2.75 //
analyzed: tāvat tvam eva nā eva syāt deśe pi etat na naḥ matam
mahataḥ lpatvam api hi vyoma vat prāha veda vid

original: yadyalpadeśasaṃsthānaṃ na sarvatrāpi no bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.76 //
analyzed: yadi alpa deśa saṃsthānam na sarvatra api no bhavet
sthitasya hi alpa deśeṣu sarvaga tvam bhavet dhruvam

original: śūnyatvameva tasya syād yasyaikatrāpi na sthitiḥ /
analyzed: śūnya tvam eva tasya syāt yasya ekatra api na sthitiḥ

original: ato nāṇutvaviśrāntirna mahattvasya ca kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.78 //
analyzed: atas nā aṇu tva viśrāntiḥ na mahat tvasya ca kvacid
ubhaya ānantya yuj tasmāt yadi mukhya mahat bhavet

original: tacca brahma paraṃ sākṣāt sarvānantyayutaṃ sadā // MAnuv_2,2.79 //
analyzed: tat ca brahma param sākṣāt sarva ānantya yutam sadā

original: yadi sākṣī svayambhāto na mānaṃ kena gamyate /
analyzed: yadi sākṣī svayambhātaḥ na mānam kena gamyate
akṣaja ādeḥ ca māna tvam anavasthā athavā bhavet
atas sarva padārthānām bhāgāḥ santi eva sarvadā

original: dvayoreva tu saṃyoga iti kenāvasīyate // MAnuv_2,2.82 //
analyzed: dvayoḥ eva tu saṃyogaḥ iti kena avasīyate
kāraṇasya guṇāḥ tena bhaveyuḥ kārya gāḥ api

original: na ca tatproktasṛṣṭau tu mānaṃ kevalakalpanā /
analyzed: na ca tad prokta sṛṣṭau tu mānam kevala kalpanā

original: kathaṃ sākṣimitasyāsya śaknuyād vāraṇe kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.84 //
analyzed: katham sākṣi mitasya asya śaknuyāt vāraṇe kvacid
yadi sākṣi mitam na etat na anumā tatra vartate
pakṣīkartum aśakya tvāt kutas evā anumā bhavet
yatra nā asti pada nyāsaḥ kaḥ tam viṣayam āpnuyāt
deśa antara ādi śabdaḥ ca śaśa śṛṅga ādi śabda vat

original: sadṛśaṃ ca sajātīyaṃ nāsmatpakṣe kim eva hi /
analyzed: sadṛśam ca sajātīyam na asmad pakṣe kim eva hi
yena eva ca prakāreṇa ati asiddham anumīyate
tena eva śaśṛṅga ādeḥ śakyam astitva kalpanam
pratyakṣam āgamaḥ vā api bhavet yatra niyāmakaḥ
sā eva vyāptiḥ bhavet mānam na anyā sandigdha mūlataḥ
saha darśana mātreṇa na vyāptiḥ avasīyate

original: tannirdhāritayuktirvā vyāptiḥ saivāparā na hi // MAnuv_2,2.89 //

anyathā

original: aniṣṭāni ca sarvāṇi hyanumā kāmacāriṇī // MAnuv_2,2.90 //

original: bhinnasyaiva tu sambandhaḥ samavāyo 'nya īryate // MAnuv_2,2.91 //

original: sa svanirvāhakaścet syād dravyameva tathā na kim // MAnuv_2,2.92 //

nānā vyavahṛteḥ hetuḥ ananta tvam viśeṣataḥ

kalpanā guru tā doṣāt padārtha antara tā na hi
kalpayitvā ṣaṭ padārthān sa abhāvān api kevalam

original: ekasmin sa viśeṣaścet kiṃ pūrvaṃ tasya vismṛtiḥ // MAnuv_2,2.96 //

original: bhāvābhāvavibhāgena yaṃ vinā na kathañcana // MAnuv_2,2.97 //
analyzed: bhāva abhāva vibhāgena yam vinā na kathañcana
abhedena pratītiḥ ca kārya kāraṇa pūrvake

original: kathaṃ dharmā nivāryante vastvaikye 'pi hi vādibhiḥ // MAnuv_2,2.99 //
analyzed: katham dharmāḥ nivāryante vastu aikye hi vādibhiḥ

original: kathaṃ viśeṣo naivāsti sa ca dharmo 'paro yadi // MAnuv_2,2.100 //

ṣaṣ padārtha atirekaḥ syāt padārtha aniyame hi

original: nāṅgīkṛtaḥ sa ca yadi nānavasthā kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.102 //

original: ananyatvānnānavasthā bhedo nāśe bhavet tathā // MAnuv_2,2.103 //

original: tato dṛṣṭe virodhastu sadbhirāpādyate katham // MAnuv_2,2.105 //

original: bhāve ta eva cocchedāt tadanye ca samastaśaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.107 //

original: yadyaṃśago na saṃyogaḥ kāryeṣu prathimā katham // MAnuv_2,2.110 //

original: paramāṇormahattvaṃ ca vinetyetad vacaḥ katham // MAnuv_2,2.111 //

original: bhinnā iti tu bhedānāṃ samudāyo hi dṛśyate /

itas muṣya amutas pi asya bhedaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ dvidharmikaḥ

original: tatraikavacanaṃ yattad viprāṇāṃ bhojanaṃ yathā // MAnuv_2,2.115 //

original: etādṛśaṃ ca sādṛśyaṃ padārtheṣu pṛthak pṛthak /

original: tādṛśo 'yaṃ ca tacchabda iti jñāpayati sphuṭam /

original: jātitaścet kathaṃ tāsu tatra cedanavasthitiḥ // MAnuv_2,2.123 //

original: anyat tadeva cedagnimattvaṃ kiṃ tatra bhaṇyate // MAnuv_2,2.126 //

original: anyonyābhāvabhedau ca pṛthaktavaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_2,2.137 //

original: avidāraṇe 'pi hyāsyasya bhinnāvoṣṭhau tu tasya ca /

atas unmatta vākya tvāt māyā vādaḥ bhyupekṣitaḥ
na ca amanda sat ānanda syandi ananta guṇa arṇavaḥ
īśvaraḥ ṣṭaguṇa tvena prameyaḥ pramita tvataḥ
mayi ananta guṇe nante guṇataḥ nanta vigrahe
nārāyaṇaḥ śeṣa cetanebhyaḥ param padam

ananta guṇa tā viṣṇoḥ katham eva hi apodyate

original: kathaṃ sarvajñatā tasya svajñānādhigamaṃ vinā // MAnuv_2,2.148 //

iti jñāna dvayena eva sarva vid parameśvaraḥ
iti ced eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ tad jñāna avasitaḥ yadi
sva prakāśa tvam eva syāt jñānam hi etat viśeṣaṇam
jñāna antareṇa ced atra bhavet evā anavasthitiḥ

original: sukhavān duḥkhavāṃśca syāditi vyāptiśca no bhavet /
analyzed: sukhavān duḥkhavān ca syāt iti vyāptiḥ ca no bhavet

original: ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān vipāpmetyādikā ca sā // MAnuv_2,2.153 //
