analyzed: gītāt puṣpa phala avāptiḥ sparśāt kārśyam rasāt sthitiḥ

original: api vṛkṣasya dṛśyanta iti nānātmatā bhavet /
analyzed: api vṛkṣasya dṛśyante iti nānā ātma tā bhavet
evam ca ātma akārtsnyam iti tatas eva āha veda vid
sarvajña tva ādikaiḥ sarvaiḥ guṇaiḥ yuktam sadāśivam
jagat vicitra racanā kartāram doṣa varjitam
āhuḥ pāśupatāḥ tat ca bahu śruti virodhataḥ

original: nopādeyaṃ mataṃ hyasya devasya stuhi gartagam // MAnuv_2,2.253 //
analyzed: na upādeyam matam hi asya devasya stuhi gartagam
utpipeṣa śiraḥ tasya gṛṇīṣe sat patim padam

original: yad viṣṇorupamaṃ hantuṃ rudramākṛṣṭate mayā // MAnuv_2,2.254 //
analyzed: yat viṣṇoḥ upamam hantum rudram ākṛṣṭate mayā

original: dhanuryaṃ kāmaye taṃ tamugraṃ mā śiśnadevatāḥ /
analyzed: dhanuḥ yam kāmaye tam tam ugram mā śiśna devatāḥ
ghnan śiśnadevān ekaḥ saḥ āsīt nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ
tasmāt rudraḥ samprasādaḥ ca abhūtām vaiṣṇavam makham
yajñena yajñam ayajanta abadhnan puruṣam paśum
yaḥ bhūtānām adhipatiḥ rudraḥ tanti caraḥ vṛṣā
ityādi śruti sāmarthyāt pāratantryam janiḥ mṛtiḥ
pratīyante sa doṣa tvāt na īśaḥ paśupatiḥ tatas
aśarīra tvataḥ tasya sambandhaḥ jagatā kvacid

original: kartṛtvena na yujyeta dehino jñānadṛṣṭitaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.259 //
analyzed: kartṛ tvena na yujyeta dehinaḥ jñāna dṛṣṭitaḥ

original: na ca dehādivad viśvamasya syād bhogasambhavāt /
analyzed: na ca deha ādi vat viśvam asya syāt bhoga sambhavāt

original: adhiṣṭhāne sthitaḥ kartā kāryaṃ kurvan pratīyate /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhāne sthitaḥ kartā kāryam kurvan pratīyate
na asya adhiṣṭhāna yogaḥ sti bhūtānām praḷaye tadā
adehaḥ ced asārvajñaḥ śilā kāṣṭha ādi vat sadā
dehī ced antavān eva yajñadatta nidarśanāt
na ca etat akhilam viṣṇau śruti prāmāṇya gauravāt

original: manobuddhayaṅgitāṃ viṣṇorlakṣayāmo ya eva saḥ // MAnuv_2,2.262 //
analyzed: manaḥ buddhaiḥ aṅgitām viṣṇoḥ lakṣayāmaḥ yaḥ eva saḥ
saḥ eva dehaḥ vijñānam aiśvaryam śaktiḥ ūrjitā

original: deho viṣṇorna te viṣṇo vāsudevo 'grato 'bhavat // MAnuv_2,2.263 //
analyzed: dehaḥ viṣṇoḥ na te viṣṇo vāsudevaḥ gratas bhavat

original: eko nārāyaṇastvāsīnna brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ tu āsīt na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ
ajasya nābhau adhi ekam arpitam mātrayā paraḥ
sat dehaḥ sukha gandhaḥ ca jñāna bhās sat parākramaḥ

original: jñānajñānaḥ sukhasukhaḥ sa viṣṇuḥ paramākṣaraḥ // MAnuv_2,2.265 //
analyzed: jñāna jñānaḥ sukha sukhaḥ sa viṣṇuḥ parama akṣaraḥ
ānandaḥ ekaḥ eva agre āsīt nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ

original: priyaṃ tasya śire modapramodau ca bhujau hareḥ // MAnuv_2,2.266 //
analyzed: priyam tasya śire moda pramodau ca bhujau hareḥ

original: ānando madhyato brahma pucchaṃ nānyadabhūt kvacit /
analyzed: ānandaḥ madhyatas brahma puccham na anyat abhūt kvacid
brahmā lalāṭāt api śaṅkaraḥ
pakṣayoḥ garuḍaḥ śeṣaḥ mukhāt āsa sarasvatī
sahasra śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasra akṣaḥ sahasra pād
ityādi śruti sandarbha balāt nitya guṇa ātmanaḥ
viṣṇoḥ dehāt jagat sarvam āvirāsīt iti iyate
mānavat tvāt virodhaḥ kaḥ nāmānam kvacid iṣyate

original: avirodho virodhaśca mānenaiva hi gamyate // MAnuv_2,2.270 //
analyzed: avirodhaḥ virodhaḥ ca mānena eva hi gamyate

original: ata uktaṃ samastaṃ ca vāsudevasya yujyate /
analyzed: atas uktam samastam ca vāsudevasya yujyate
śiva ādi nāma yuktāḥ ca śrutayaḥ viṣṇu vācakāḥ

original: nāmāni sarvāṇi ca yameko yo devanāmadhāḥ /
analyzed: nāmāni sarvāṇi ca yam ekaḥ yaḥ deva nāma dhāḥ

original: viṣṇunāmāni nānyasya sarvanāmā hariḥ svayam // MAnuv_2,2.272 //
analyzed: viṣṇu nāmāni na anyasya sarva nāmā hariḥ svayam
na nārāyaṇa nāmāni tad anyeṣu apare harau
ityādi śrutayaḥ tatra mānam ca uktaḥ samanvayaḥ
purāṇāni purāṇa ādyaiḥ viruddha tvāt na tat pramā
tad viruddheṣu no mānam pūrva apara virodhataḥ
sama brāhma virodhāt ca niyamāt vaiṣṇaveṣu api
moha artha muktitaḥ ca eva viṣṇuḥ ekaḥ guṇa arṇavaḥ
skanda sūrya gaṇeśa ādi matāni nyāyataḥ mutaḥ
nirākṛtāni aśeṣeṇa siddhāntasya aviśeṣataḥ
nirākṛtau viśeṣasya bhāvāt śakti matam pṛthak
dūṣyate mahatī devī hrīṅkarī sarva kāraṇam
tripurā bhairavī ityādi nāmabhiḥ sā abhidhīyate
tasyāḥ sadāśiva ādyāḥ ca jāyante deva mānuṣāḥ
bhūta bhautikam api etat iti tat na upapadyate

original: dṛṣṭā pumbhyaḥ sadā sṛṣṭiḥ strīpumbhyo vā viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭā pumbhyaḥ sadā sṛṣṭiḥ strī pumbhyaḥ vā viśeṣataḥ

original: kevalābhyo na hi strībhyastata utpattyasambhavāt // MAnuv_2,2.279 //
analyzed: kevalābhyaḥ na hi strībhyaḥ tatas utpatti asambhavāt
na arcyam mahā vāma matam vāmaiḥ anyat udīryate
śiva upasarjanā śaktiḥ sasarja idam samantataḥ
iti tat ca upapannam na śivasya akaraṇa tvataḥ
adeha tvāt api hi anye brūyuḥ sarvajñam īśvaram
aṇu vāmā na tat yuktam īśa vāda praveśanāt
sārvajñya ādi guṇaiḥ yuktam guru kalpanayā dvayam

original: na yujyate hyatastvīśa eka eva prayojakaḥ /
analyzed: na yujyate hi atas tu īśaḥ ekaḥ eva prayojakaḥ

original: uktadoṣaśca tatpakṣa iti naivātra dūṣyate // MAnuv_2,2.283 //
analyzed: ukta doṣaḥ ca tad pakṣaḥ iti nā evā atra dūṣyate
śruti smṛti itihāsānām sāmastyena virodhataḥ

original: satāṃ jugupsitatvācca nāṅgīkāryaṃ hi tanmatam // MAnuv_2,2.284 //
analyzed: satām jugupsita tvāt ca nā aṅgīkāryam hi tat matam
pañcarātra niṣedha artham etāni ācakṣate yadi

original: sūtrāṇyativiruddhaṃ tad yata āha sa bhārate // MAnuv_2,2.285 //
analyzed: sūtrāṇi ati viruddham tat yatas āha sa bhārate
pañcarātrasya kṛtsnasya vaktā nārāyaṇaḥ svayam
jñāneṣu eteṣu rāja indra sarveṣu etat viśiṣṭate
pañcarātra vidaḥ ye tu yathākrama parāḥ nṛpa
ekānta bhāva upagatāḥ vāsudevam viśanti te

original: iti gītā ca tacchāstrasaṅkṣepa iti hīritam /
analyzed: iti gītā ca tad śāstra saṅkṣepaḥ iti hi īritam

original: vedena pañcarātreṇa bhaktayā yajñena caiva hi // MAnuv_2,2.288 //
analyzed: vedena pañcarātreṇa bhaktayā yajñena ca eva hi
dṛśyaḥ ham nā anyathā dṛśyaḥ varṣa koṭi śataiḥ api

original: iti vārāhavacanaṃ ślokā iti vacaḥ śrutau // MAnuv_2,2.289 //
analyzed: iti vārāha vacanam ślokāḥ iti vacaḥ śrutau
vedaiḥ ca pañcarātraiḥ ca dhyeyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ

original: pañcarātraṃ ca vedāśca vidyaikaiva dvidheyate // MAnuv_2,2.290 //
analyzed: pañcarātram ca vedāḥ ca vidyā ekā eva dvidhā iyate
iti ādi veda vacanaiḥ pañcarātram apodyate

original: kathamevātra doṣaḥ ka utpattirjño 'ta ityapi // MAnuv_2,2.291 //
analyzed: katham eva atra doṣaḥ kaḥ utpattiḥ te iti api
iha evā uktāḥ na ca abhūta bhāvaḥ tatra api kathyate
vāsudeva icchayā nityam bhramati iti hi tat vacaḥ

original: na hi saṃsārasāditvaṃ pañcarātroditaṃ kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.293 //
analyzed: na hi saṃsāra sādi tvam pañcarātra uditam kvacid
jīva abhimāni śeṣasya nāmnā saṅkarṣaṇasya tu
vāsudevāt janiḥ proktā pradyumnasya tatas tathā
manaḥ bhimāninaḥ kāmasya evam sākṣāt hareḥ kvacid
saṅkarṣaṇa ādi nāmnā eva nitya acintya uru śaktitaḥ
vyūhaḥ uktaḥ nyathā anūdya katham duṣṭa tvam ucyate
yadi vidyāt catur vedān iti vat veda pūraṇam
pañcarātrāt iti kutas dveṣaḥ śāṇḍilya vartane
atas parama śāstroḥ udveṣāt uditam āsuraiḥ

original: dūṣaṇaṃ pañcarātrasya vīkṣāyāmapi na kṣamam // MAnuv_2,2.297 //
analyzed: dūṣaṇam pañcarātrasya vīkṣāyām api na kṣamam
nārāyaṇaḥ śruti gaṇa tātparyāt avasīyate
andham tamaḥ praviśanti ye tu avidyām upāsate

original: tato bhūya ivāpsyanti ye tasyā naiva nindakāḥ // MAnuv_2,2.299 //
analyzed: tatas bhūyaḥ iva āpsyanti ye tasyāḥ nā eva nindakāḥ

original: tato vidyāmavidyāṃ ca yo jānātyubhayaṃ saha /
analyzed: tatas vidyām avidyām ca yaḥ jānāti ubhayam saha
doṣa jñānāt atītya etān vidyayā amṛtam aśnute
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne dvitīya adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
atha aśeṣa samāmnāya virodha apākṛtim prabhuḥ
kariṣyan adhidaiva adhibhūta jīva parātmanām
svarūpa nirṇayāya eva vacanānām parasparam
pādena anena avirodham darśayati amita dyutiḥ
anubhūti yukti bahu vāc vailomyam ca tatas dhikam

original: etat sarvaṃ sataḥ sāmyaṃ dvāravaiyarthyameva ca // MAnuv_2,3.3 //
analyzed: etat sarvam sataḥ sāmyam dvāra vaiyarthyam eva ca
prasiddha nāma svīkāre

original: tatra tatra parijñānaṃ guṇasāmyaśrutī tathā // MAnuv_2,3.5 //
analyzed: tatra tatra parijñānam guṇa sāmya śrutī tathā
nānā śrutiḥ ca vaicitṛyam yuktayaḥ pūrvapakṣa gāḥ
vyavasthā anupapattiḥ ca svātantryam anusāri tā

original: mukhyatā śaktimattvaṃ ca vairūpyaṃ sarvasaṅgrahaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.7 //
analyzed: mukhya tā śaktimat tvam ca vairūpyam sarva saṅgrahaḥ
gati ādiḥ īśa śaktiḥ ca sarva māna virodhi tā
viśeṣa kāraṇam ca iti siddhāntasya eva sādhakāḥ
prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ kālaḥ devāḥ tad abhimāninaḥ
mahat ādyāḥ ca jāyante para adhīna viśeṣi tā
idam sarvam sasarja iti janimat tvam iha uditam
avakāśa mātram ākāśaḥ katham utpadyate nyathā

original: yadyanākāśatā pūrvaṃ kiṃ mūrtanibiḍaṃ jagat // MAnuv_2,3.10 //
analyzed: yadi anākāśa tā pūrvam kim mūrta nibiḍam jagat
ca eva yadi anākāśa tā bhavet

original: mūrtadravyāṇi cākāśe sthitānyeva hi sarvadā // MAnuv_2,3.11 //
analyzed: mūrta dravyāṇi ca ākāśe sthitāni eva hi sarvadā
atas ākāśa śabda uktaḥ tad devaḥ vināyakaḥ
deha utpattyā samutpannaḥ iti śrutyā abhidhīyate
bhūtam api asitam divya dṛṣṭi gocaram eva tu
utpadyate vyākṛtam hi gaganam sākṣi gocaram

original: pradeśa iti vijñeyaṃ nityaṃ notpadyate hi tat // MAnuv_2,3.13 //
analyzed: pradeśaḥ iti vijñeyam nityam na utpadyate hi tat
tathā api pūrva sambandha para tantra viśeṣa yuj
kham eva utpattimat nāma śruti śabda vivakṣitam

original: prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ kāla ityete ca samastaśaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ kālaḥ iti ete ca samastaśas
īśa adhīna viśeṣeṇa janyāḥ iti eva kīrtitāḥ
kāla pravāhaḥ eva ekaḥ nityaḥ na tu viśeṣavān
puruṣa avyakta kālānām ramā eva eka abhimāninī
sisṛkṣu tva viśeṣam tat sākṣāt bhagavat icchayā
prāptā eva sṛṣṭā iti uditā pradhānam vikṛteḥ api
pumāṃsaḥ deha sambandhāt sṛṣṭimantaḥ iti īritāḥ
evam praḷaya kāle pi pratibhāta parāvaraḥ
mukhyau āyuḥ nityasamaḥ śarīra utpatti kāraṇāt
para adhīna viśeṣeṇa janimān eva śabditaḥ
na eva kiñcid tatas janma varjitam paramāt ṛte
pūrva śabda vilopaḥ ca yadi janma iti kīrtyate

original: ramāyā naiva janmāsti caitanyasyāpi kevalam // MAnuv_2,3.21 //
analyzed: ramāyāḥ nā eva janma asti caitanyasya api kevalam
pradhanasya ca vedasya vedasya api īśvara icchayā

original: vyaktirnāma viśeṣo 'sti tasmāt tadvaśataiva hi // MAnuv_2,3.22 //
analyzed: vyaktiḥ nāma viśeṣaḥ sti tasmāt tad vaśa tā eva hi
utpattiḥ atra kathitā svatantra tvāt parātmanaḥ

original: naivotpattiḥ kathamapi na svatantraṃ tato 'param // MAnuv_2,3.23 //
analyzed: nā evā utpattiḥ katham api na svatantram
acchedyasya api jīvasya vibhāgam bahudhā hariḥ

original: kṛtvā bhogān pradāyaiva caikyamāpādayet punaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.24 //
analyzed: kṛtvā bhogān pradāya eva ca aikyam āpādayet punar
atas īśa vaśam sarvam cetana acetanam jagat
avibhāgam vibhāgāya yadā nayati keśavaḥ
kim aśakyam pareśasya tadā iti hi abhidhīyate
evam sthite jīva aikyam kecid āhuḥ parātmanā
tat yaḥ ham iti pūrvābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ ca anumā balāt

original: na tad yuktaṃ yato viṣṇuḥ pṛthagevābhidhīyate /
analyzed: na tat yuktam yatas viṣṇuḥ pṛthak eva abhidhīyate
prajñānetraḥ lokaḥ iti muktau bhedaḥ bhidhīyate
etam ānandam iti anyā paramam sāmyam iti api
idam jñānam apāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ

original: sarge 'pi nopajāyante praḷaye na vyathanti ca // MAnuv_2,3.28 //
analyzed: sarge pi na upajāyante praḷaye na vyathanti ca
upasampadya tat jyotiḥ sva rūpeṇa abhipadyate

original: tatra paryeti jakṣaṃśca krīḍannapi sadā sukhī // MAnuv_2,3.29 //
analyzed: tatra paryeti jakṣan ca krīḍan api sadā sukhī

original: ācakṣva me mokṣaṃ dhīrā yaṃ pravadanti tam /
analyzed: ācakṣva me mokṣam dhīrāḥ yam pravadanti tam

original: ityakta āha vāgdevī paraṃ mokṣaṃ prajāpateḥ // MAnuv_2,3.30 //
analyzed: iti aktaḥ āha vāgdevī param mokṣam prajāpateḥ
śākhām śākhām mahā nadyaḥ saṃyānti paritas sravāḥ
dhānā apūpāḥ māṃsa kāmāḥ sadā pāyasa kardamāḥ
yasmin agni mukhāḥ devāḥ sa indrāḥ saha marut gaṇāḥ
ījire kratubhiḥ śreṣṭhaiḥ tat akṣaram upāsate
praviśanti param devam muktāḥ tatra eva bhoginaḥ
nirgacchanti yathākāmam pareśena eva coditāḥ
bheda dṛṣṭayā abhimānena niḥsaṅgena api kamarṇā

original: kartṛtvāt saguṇaṃ brahma puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabham // MAnuv_2,3.34 //
analyzed: kartṛ tvāt sa guṇam brahma puruṣam puruṣa ṛṣabham
sa saṅgatya punar kāle kālena īśvara mūrti tā
jāte guṇa vyatikare yathāpūrvam prajāyate

original: ṛcāṃ tvaḥ poṣamāste ca pareṇa preritāḥ sadā /
analyzed: ṛcām tvaḥ poṣam āste ca pareṇa preritāḥ sadā
yad kāmaḥ tat sṛjati at ha eṣa ātmanā tat sṛjati api
saha eva brahmaṇā kāmān bhuṅkate nistīrṇa tad guṇaḥ
duḥkha ādīn ca parityajya jagat vayāpāra varjitaḥ
bhuṅkte bhogān saha eva uccān ityādi āgama mānataḥ
muktasya bheda avagateḥ katham eva hi abhinna tā
jīva īśayoḥ nā anumā ca tad abhedam pramāpayet
mithyā eva bhedaḥ vimataḥ bheda tvāt candra bheda vat

original: iti cet sādhyadharmo 'yaṃ sannasan vā navobhayam // MAnuv_2,3.39 //
analyzed: iti ced sādhya dharmaḥ yam san asan vā na vā ubhayam
yadi san apasiddhāntaḥ saḥ eva asān iti īrite

original: nobhayaṃ cenna siddhaṃ taditi mānasya dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_2,3.40 //
analyzed: na ubhayam ced na siddham tat iti mānasya dūṣaṇam
na ca māna antareṇa etat śakyam sādhayitum kvacid

original: anumānena cet saiva hyanavasthā bhaviṣyati // MAnuv_2,3.41 //
analyzed: anumānena ced sā eva hi anavasthā bhaviṣyati
na ca āgamaḥ tad arthaḥ sti na asat āsīt na tat vadet
pariśeṣāt anirvācyam yadi siddhayet parātmanaḥ
anirvācya tvam eva syāt pariśiṣṭaḥ hi asau tadā
na ca anyaḥ āgamaḥ tatra sat asat pratiyogini
na ca pratyakṣa mātrā asti na ca arthāpattiḥ iṣyate

original: bādhāyogāt sata iti bādhābhāvata eva hi // MAnuv_2,3.44 //
analyzed: bādhā yogāt sataḥ iti bādhā bhāvataḥ eva hi

original: viṣayasya kuto bādho vidyamānaṃ hi bādhyate /
analyzed: viṣayasya kutas bādhaḥ vidyamānam hi bādhyate

original: na hi vandhyāsuto vadhyo yajñadatto hi vadhyate // MAnuv_2,3.45 //
analyzed: na hi vandhyā sutaḥ vadhyaḥ yajñadattaḥ hi vadhyate

original: bādhāyogaḥ sata iti vyāptireṣā kva dṛśyate /
analyzed: bādhā yogaḥ sataḥ iti vyāptiḥ eṣā kva dṛśyate

original: kaścāyaṃ bādha uddiṣṭo na hi nāśo 'sato bhavet /
analyzed: kaḥ ca ayam bādhaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ na hi sataḥ bhavet
nivṛttiḥ ca apravṛttasya katham evā upapadyate
na āsīt asti bhaviṣyat ca tat iti jñāna meya tā
yadi bādhaḥ tadā asattvam tena eva aṅgīkṛtam punar
pratītiḥ na asataḥ iti vadan aṅgīkaroti tām
niṣedhaḥ hi apratītasya kathañcid nā upapadyate

original: na copamā bhavedatra pratyakṣāt sattvameva ca /
analyzed: na ca upamā bhavet atra pratyakṣāt sattvam eva ca
śāstra gamya para īśānāt bhedaḥ sva ātmanaḥ īyate
anubhūti virodhena katham eka tvam ucyate
kiñcitkartā ca duḥkhī iti sarvaiḥ evā anubhūyate
sarvajñaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarva śaktiḥ iti śrutaḥ
anubhūtāt hi bhedena śrutiḥ eṣā vadati amum
upajīvya viruddham tu katham aikyam śrutiḥ vadet
aprāmāṇyam yadā bheda vācakasya bhaviṣyati

original: sa eva dharmiṇo grāhī tadabhedaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: saḥ eva dharmiṇaḥ grāhī tad abhedaḥ katham bhavet

original: yat svarūpagrahe mānaṃ taddharme na kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,3.53 //
analyzed: yat sva rūpa grahe mānam tat dharme na katham bhavet
eka vijñāna vijñaptyāḥ dvayam mānam bhaviṣyati

original: na cedekamamānaṃ tad dvayamapyatra no bhavet // MAnuv_2,3.54 //
analyzed: na ced ekam amānam tat dvayam api atra no bhavet
dharmi grāhi virodhaḥ tu tasmāt mānasya dūṣaṇam
na upajīvyaḥ hi abhedaḥ kvacid bheda śruteḥ balāt

original: na ca mānāntaropeyaṃ brahma tad bhavati kvacit /
analyzed: na ca māna antara upeyam brahma tat bhavati kvacid
yena mānena ca apeyam bhedaḥ tena avagamyate
sarva jñāna maya evā īśaḥ yadi upeyaḥ kathañcana
sarva jñathva guṇena eva tayā bhedaḥ vagamyate
na duḥkha anubhavaḥ kvāpi mithyā anubhava tām vrajet

original: na hi bādhaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭo duḥkhādyanubhavasya tu // MAnuv_2,3.58 //
analyzed: na hi bādhaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ duḥkha ādi anubhavasya tu
yadi duḥkha anubhūtiḥ ca bhrāntiḥ iti avasīyate

original: aduḥkhitāśrutiḥ kena na bhrāntiriti gamyate // MAnuv_2,3.59 //
analyzed: aduḥkhita aśrutiḥ kena na bhrāntiḥ iti gamyate
śruti svarūpam arthaḥ ca mānena eva avasīyate

original: taccenmānaṃ gṛhītaṃ te kiṃ duḥkhānubhave bhramaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.60 //
analyzed: tat ced mānam gṛhītam te kim duḥkha anubhave bhramaḥ
na ca bādha viśeṣaḥ u sti yat abādhitam eva tat

original: bādho yadyanubhūte 'rthe kathaṃ nirṇaya īyate // MAnuv_2,3.61 //
analyzed: bādhaḥ yadi anubhūte rthe katham nirṇayaḥ īyate

original: ko 'pi hy artho na niścetuṃ śakyate bhramavādinā /
analyzed: kaḥ pi hi arthaḥ na niścetum śakyate bhrama vādinā
bhrama tvam abhrama tvam ca yadā eva anubhava upagam

original: ekasya bhramatā tatra parasyābhramatā kutaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.62 //
analyzed: ekasya bhramatā tatra parasya a bhramatā kutas

original: bhramatvamabhramatvaṃ ca sarvaṃ vedyaṃ hi sākṣiṇā /
analyzed: bhrama tvam abhrama tvam ca sarvam vedyam hi sākṣiṇā

original: sa cet sākṣī kvacid duṣyaḥ kathaṃ nirṇaya īyate // MAnuv_2,3.63 //
analyzed: sa ced sākṣī kvacid duṣyaḥ katham nirṇayaḥ īyate
viśeṣā sarve eva ete sākṣi pratyaya gocarāḥ

original: ūrīkṛtya ca tān sarvān vyavahāraḥ pravartate /
analyzed: ūrīkṛtya ca tān sarvān vyavahāraḥ pravartate
sākṣiṇaḥ vyavasāyī tu vyavahāraḥ bhidhīyate
tasmāt sarva prasiddhasya vyavahārasya siddhaye

original: sākṣī nirdoṣa evaikaḥ sadāṅgīkārya eva naḥ // MAnuv_2,3.65 //
analyzed: sākṣī nirdoṣaḥ eva ekaḥ sadā aṅgīkāryaḥ eva naḥ

original: śuddhaḥ sākṣī yadā siddho duḥkhitvaṃ vāryate katham /
analyzed: śuddhaḥ sākṣī yadā siddhaḥ duḥkhi tvam vāryate katham
upajīvya pramāṇam tat bheda grāhakam eva hi
atas jīva īśayoḥ bhedaḥ śruti sāmarthya su sthiraḥ
tathā api tu cit ānanda pūrvāḥ tad sadṛśāḥ guṇāḥ
sāra svarūpam asya api muktau api avaśiṣyate
atas bheda vat eva etāḥ śrutayaḥ pravadanti hi
paurāṇāni ca vākyāni sādṛśya abheda saṃśrayāt
sādṛśyāt ca pradhāna tvāt svātantryāt api ca abhidām

original: āhurīśena jīvasya na svarūpābhidāṃ kvacit // MAnuv_2,3.69 //
analyzed: āhuḥ īśena jīvasya na svarūpa abhidām kvacid
sthāna aikyam aikamatyam ca muktasya tu viśiṣṭate

original: sādṛśyaṃ ca viśeṣeṇa jaḍānāṃ dvayameva tu /
analyzed: sādṛśyam ca viśeṣeṇa jaḍānām dvayam eva tu
bhavet sādṛśyam ati alpam tṛtīyam parama ātmanā
īśa rūpa kriyāṇām ca guṇānām api sarvaśas
tathā eva avayavānām tad svarūpa aikyam tu mukhyatas
yathā udakam durge vṛṣṭam parvateṣu vidhāvati
evam dharmān pṛthak paśyan tān eva anuvidhāvati
iti śruteḥ nā ubhayam ca bheda abheda ākhyam iṣyate
ekam eva advitīyam na iha nānā asti kiñcana

original: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati // MAnuv_2,3.73 //
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati
iti śrutau iva iti asmāt bheda abheda nirākṛtiḥ

original: ivobhaye ca sādṛśya iti vāk śabdanirṇaye // MAnuv_2,3.74 //
analyzed: iva ubhaye ca sādṛśye iti vāc śabda nirṇaye
bhedasya muktau vacanāt api tad pakṣa nigrahaḥ
cetana tva ādi sādṛśyam yadi abhedaḥ iti iṣyate
aṅgīkṛtam tat asmābhiḥ na svarūpa ekatā kvacid
na kenacid abhedaḥ sti bheda abhedaḥ kvacid

original: samudāyamṛte viṣṇoḥ svaguṇādīn vināpi vā // MAnuv_2,3.76 //
analyzed: samudāyam ṛte viṣṇoḥ sva guṇa ādīn vinā api vā
iti śruteḥ na tasya asti kenacid

original: abhedaśrutayo' ṃśatvāt sādṛśyaṃ cāṃśatāsya tu // MAnuv_2,3.77 //
analyzed: abheda śrutayaḥ ṃśa tvāt sādṛśyam ca aṃśa tā asya tu

original: aṃśastu dvividho jñeyaḥ svarūpāṃśo 'nya eva ca /
analyzed: aṃśaḥ tu dvividhaḥ jñeyaḥ svarūpa aṃśaḥ nyaḥ eva ca
vibhinna aṃśaḥ lpa śaktiḥ syāt kiñcid sādṛśya mātra yuj

original: aṃśino yattu sāmarthyaṃ yat svarūpaṃ yathā sthitiḥ /
analyzed: aṃśinaḥ yat tu sāmarthyam yat svarūpam yathā sthitiḥ

original: sa eva cet svarūpāṃśaḥ prādurbhāvā hareryathā // MAnuv_2,3.79 //
analyzed: saḥ eva ced svarūpa aṃśaḥ prādurbhāvāḥ hareḥ yathā
sūrya maṇḍalam āni ekaḥ tad prakāśa abhimānavān

original: sūryo 'tha saptamābdheśca bāhyodasya ca vāripaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.80 //
analyzed: saptama abdheḥ ca bāhyodasya ca vāripaḥ
kaṭhina tvena meru ādeḥ pṛthivyāḥ api devatā
dharādevī evam eva ekaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ
nānā avatāra rūpeṇa sthitaḥ pūrṇa guṇaḥ sadā
viṣ mūtra akṣi ādi māninyaḥ yathā apabhraṣṭa devatāḥ
sūrya ādibhyaḥ tathā evā ayam saṃsārī paramāt pṛthak
deha doṣaiḥ ca duṣṭa tvāt apabhraṣṭa ākhya devatāḥ

original: anyāḥ sūryādidevebhyo hyanugrāhyāśca taiḥ sadā // MAnuv_2,3.83 //
analyzed: anyāḥ sūrya ādi devebhyaḥ hi anugrāhyāḥ ca taiḥ sadā

original: evameva parād viṣṇoḥ pṛthak saṃsāriṇo matāḥ /
analyzed: evam eva parāt viṣṇoḥ pṛthak saṃsāriṇaḥ matāḥ
anugrāhyāḥ ca tena eva tad prasādāt ca mokṣiṇaḥ
na tu matsya ādi rūpāṇām anugrāhya tvam iṣyate
guṇaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ pūrṇa tvāt mukhya abhedaḥ paraiḥ na ca
aṃśa ābhāsāḥ ca sarve parasya aṃśāḥ na mukhyatas
yathā eṣā puruṣe chāyā etasmin etat ātatam

original: na tu pumpādavat pādā jīvā ete parātmanaḥ /
analyzed: na tu pumpāda vat pādāḥ jīvāḥ ete parātmanaḥ
pūrṇāḥ tasya guṇāḥ eva prādurbhāva tayā sthitāḥ
evam jagāda parama śrutiḥ nārāyaṇam param
akṣayaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ lakṣmyā vāsaḥ laye sthitaḥ
muktaiḥ sadā cintyamānaḥ brahma ādyaiḥ tāratamya gaiḥ
prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ kālaḥ vedāḥ ca iti
nityam svarūpataḥ viṣṇoḥ viśeṣa avāpti mātrataḥ
utpatti māt iti proktam lakṣmīḥ tad abhimāninī

original: tato jātaḥ pumān nāma brahmāsyāṃ vāsudevataḥ /
analyzed: tatas jātaḥ pumān nāma brahmā asyām vāsudevataḥ

original: sūtrātmā prāṇanāmā ca devyau prakṛtimāninī // MAnuv_2,3.90 //
analyzed: sūtra ātmā prāṇa nāmā ca devyau prakṛti māninī

original: tato rūpaṃ mahān nāma brahmaṇo 'haṅkṛtiḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: tatas rūpam mahān nāma brahmaṇaḥ haṅkṛtiḥ śivaḥ
brahmaṇaḥ tatas indraḥ manaḥ bhidhaḥ

original: skandaśca tata evānye sarve devāḥ prajajñire // MAnuv_2,3.91 //
analyzed: skandaḥ ca tatas eva anye sarve devāḥ prajajñire

original: tatra pūrvatanaḥ śreyān guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samastaśaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pūrvatanaḥ śreyān guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samastaśas

original: tebhyaśca bhagavān viṣṇustadadhīnā ime sadā // MAnuv_2,3.92 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ca bhagavān viṣṇuḥ tad adhīnāḥ ime sadā
mokṣaḥ ca tad adhīna tvam eteṣām na eva hīyate
muktau api saḥ evā ekaḥ svatantraḥ pūrṇa sat guṇaḥ
iti śruti upapattibhyām pāde smin prabhuṇā uditam
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne dvitīya adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
śruti arthaḥ śruti yuktibhyām viruddhaḥ iva dṛśyate
yatra tad nirṇayam devaḥ su viśiṣṭa upapattibhiḥ
karoti anena pādena tatra spaṣṭa arthavat śrutiḥ
viśeṣa śruti vairūpyam māhātmyam vyakta sat guṇāḥ
dṛṣṭa ayuktiḥ samāna tvam kartṛ śaktiḥ vimiśra tā
yuktayaḥ pūrvapakṣeṣu su nirṇītāḥ asatu tādṛśāḥ
yuktayaḥ nirṇayasya eva svayam bhagavatā uditāḥ
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
svābhāvika anyathā nāma sahābhāva anyathā uktayaḥ

original: aviśeṣo viśeṣau ca sahabhāvo vimiśratā // MAnuv_3,1.1 //
analyzed: aviśeṣaḥ viśeṣau ca sahabhāvaḥ vimiśra tā
viruddha uktiḥ sahasthānam vaiyarthyam ca anyathā gatiḥ
yuktayaḥ pūrvapakṣasya guṇa ādhikya arthatobhavau
upapattiḥ dvi rūpa tvam ādhikyam anurūpa tā
yogyatā prabala tvam ca vibhāgaḥ kāraṇa ābhavaḥ
kḷptiḥ anya āgatiḥ ca eva siddhāntasya eva sādhakāḥ
bījā pūruṣa yonīnām saṅga ati niyama ujkhitim
atha śabdena bhagavān āha kāraṇataḥ ca tām
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne tṛtīya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ
paścāt adṛṣṭaya vijñāna kāla duḥkha pṛthak bhavāḥ
sthāna bhedaḥ viruddha tvam nyāya sāmyam svatobhavaḥ
guṇa sāmyam ayogaḥ ca tarka bādhaḥ viloma tā
nānābhāvaḥ pralobhaḥ ca pūrvapakṣa gāḥ
aśakya kartṛ tā śaktiḥ svatas bodhaḥ tat eva ca
viśeṣa dṛṣṭi vākye ca pum śaktiḥ su nidarśanam
vāsanāḥ sarva vastūnām anādi anubhava āgatāḥ
santi eva aśeṣa jīvānām anādi manasi sthitāḥ
triguṇa ātmakam mano sti eva yāvat muktiḥ sadātanam
tatra eva aśeṣa saṃskārāḥ sañcīyante sadā eva ca
sūkṣma tvena laye sat ca prākṛtaiḥ upacīyate

original: sṛṣṭikāle yadā tanna kutaḥ saṃsārasaṃsthitiḥ // MAnuv_3,2.7 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi kāle yadā tat na kutas saṃsāra saṃsthitiḥ
saṃskāraiḥ bhagavān eva sṛṣṭvā nānāvidham jagat
svapna kāle darśayati bhrāntiḥ jāgrat tvam eva hi

original: adṛṣṭe cāśrute bhāve na bhāva upajāyate /
analyzed: a dṛṣṭe ca a śrute bhāve na bhāvaḥ upajāyate
a dṛṣṭāt a śrutāt bhāvāt na bhāvaḥ upajāyate
iti śruti purāṇa uktiḥ anādi tvāt tu yujyate

original: kadācid darśanāyogyaṃ yat tatrāpi vibhāgataḥ // MAnuv_3,2.10 //
analyzed: kadācid darśana ayogyam yat tatra api vibhāgataḥ

original: dṛṣṭaṃ samānādhikaraṇaṃ dṛśyate ca sa ca bhramaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam samāna adhikaraṇam dṛśyate ca sa ca bhramaḥ
vāsanā mātra mūla tvāt jāgrat vat spaṣṭa tā na ca
dvandvam iti praśnaḥ na yujyate
draṣṭuḥ svapnasya dṛṣṭa tvāt bhedasya eva akhilaiḥ janaiḥ
praśna doṣāḥ hi catvāraḥ sva vyāhatiḥ asaṅgatiḥ

original: siddhārthatā ca vaiphalyaṃ na taiḥ syāt tattvanirṇayaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.13 //
analyzed: siddhārtha tā ca vaiphalyam na taiḥ syāt tattva nirṇayaḥ
tattva nirṇaya vailomyam syāt vāde hi nigrahaḥ
udbhāvanīyam eva syāt na kathā avasitiḥ bhavet
vijigīṣu kathāyām tu kathā avasiti kāraṇam
parihāre pi siddha tvam dūṣaṇam prativādinaḥ

original: pratijñāyāṃ tadanyasya siddhataiva hi sādhakā // MAnuv_3,2.15 //
analyzed: pratijñāyām tad anyasya siddha tā eva hi sādhakā
āśraya vyāśraya asiddhī sādhya siddhiḥ ca dūṣaṇam

original: keṣāñcin na ca te doṣā vyāptau satyāṃ kathañcana // MAnuv_3,2.16 //
analyzed: keṣāñcid na ca te doṣāḥ vyāptau satyām kathañcana
doṣaḥ vyāhatiḥ evā asti nṛśṛṅga astitva sādhane

original: yatra vyāhatatā nāsti ko 'tisaṅgo 'sya sādhane // MAnuv_3,2.17 //
analyzed: yatra vyāhata tā na asti sādhane
pratyakṣa āgama mūlāḥ tu nyāyāḥ sarve bhavanti hi

original: nyāyābhāsā amūlāḥ syurnyāyasyānyasya tau punaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.18 //
analyzed: nyāya ābhāsāḥ amūlāḥ syuḥ nyāyasya anyasya tau punar

original: adṛṣṭe vyabhicāre tu sādhakaṃ taditi sphuṭam /
analyzed: adṛṣṭe vyabhicāre tu sādhakam tat iti sphuṭam

original: jñāyate sākṣiṇaivādvā mānabādhe na tad bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.19 //
analyzed: jñāyate sākṣiṇā eva a dvā māna bādhe na tat bhavet
yat sākṣiṇā eva māna tvam mānānām avasīyate

original: amānasya tu mānatvaṃ mānasatvāccalaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.20 //
analyzed: amānasya tu māna tvam mānasa tvāt calam bhavet
utsargataḥ yat prāptam apavāda vivarjitam
vyabhicāri apavādena mānam eva bhaviṣyati
atas hi bhojana ādīnām iṣṭa sādhana tā anumā

original: mānaṃ vyavahṛtau nityaṃ vyabhicāro hi tatra ca // MAnuv_3,2.22 //
analyzed: mānam vyavahṛtau nityam vyabhicāraḥ hi tatra ca

original: vyāptatve vyāśrayatvaṃ tu kathameva hi dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: vyāpta tve vyāśraya tvam tu katham eva hi dūṣaṇam
rohiṇī udayaḥ āsannaḥ kṛttikā abhyuditā yatas

original: ityukte sādhanaṃ no kiṃ na hyājñaivātra sādhakā // MAnuv_3,2.23 //
analyzed: iti ukte sādhanam no kim na hi ājñā eva atra sādhakā
anyat sat asatoḥ viśvam iti ca vyāhateḥ amā

original: asiddhasādhane doṣaḥ ko vyāptiryadi vidyate // MAnuv_3,2.24 //
analyzed: asiddha sādhane doṣaḥ kaḥ vyāptiḥ yadi vidyate
vyāptiḥ ca vyatirekeṇa tatra taiḥ ca eva gamyate
aprasiddhasya sādhyasya sādhaka tvam yat ā iṣyate

original: liṅgasyoktau viśeṣo 'yaṃ kena mānena gamyate // MAnuv_3,2.25 //
analyzed: liṅgasya uktau viśeṣaḥ yam kena mānena gamyate
sādhanam paramāṇu ādeḥ yat āsiddhasya ca iṣyate
yathānubhavam eva etat na aṅgīkāryam kutas tadā

original: yatra nātiprasaṅgo 'sti mānaṃ na ca viparyate /
analyzed: yatra na ati prasaṅgaḥ sti mānam na ca viparyate
kliṣṭa kalpanayā eva atra sādhyam iti ati durvacaḥ
asiddha sādhaka tvena pañcāvayavatām vinā
aṅgīkāryāḥ samastaiḥ tad niyamaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ
siddasādhana tāyām ca na kathā avasitiḥ bhavet
vyabhicāraḥ hetu asiddhiḥ eka pakṣe dūṣaṇam
sādhya sādhana vaikalyam dṛṣṭāntasya viśeṣaṇe
ca viśiṣṭa asiddhiḥ eva hi
siddha praśna ādikam yat tad ādhikya anta gartam bhavet
arthāpatti upamā bhāvāḥ anumā antargatāḥ kvacid
pratyakṣa antargataḥ bhāvaḥ sukha ādeḥ niyamena ca
anyatra khaṭ iti prāptaḥ prārambha ādyāḥ ca yuktayaḥ
āgama artha avasiti arthāḥ khilāḥ

original: vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ sthānaṃ samākhyā ca tathāvidhāḥ /
analyzed: vākyam prakaraṇam sthānam samākhyā ca tathāvidhāḥ
kuru pāṇḍava vat teṣām upapatteḥ pṛthak vacaḥ
sva nyāyaiḥ sādhanam kāryam para nyāyaiḥ tu dūṣaṇam

original: svanyāyairdūṣaṇaṃ ca syāt sādhitaiḥ prativādinaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.35 //
analyzed: sva nyāyaiḥ dūṣaṇam ca syāt sādhitaiḥ prativādinaḥ
prasaṅga artha tayā proktāḥ na siddhāntasya dūṣakāḥ
chalam jātiḥ iti dvedhā vyāhati antaram iṣyate
jātiḥ sva vyāhatiḥ jñeyā chalam artha antara uttaram
evam saṃśodhita nyāya sat āgama virodhataḥ
na anirvācyam iha proktam māyā mātra padena hi
vilakṣaṇam sat asatoḥ iti hi vyāhatam svatas
pratiyogi tvam api asya brahmaṇaḥ ṅgīkṛtam bhavet

original: mithyā cet pratiyogitvaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ tato na hi /
analyzed: mithyā ced pratiyogitvam vailakṣaṇyam tatas na hi
avilakṣaṇa tvam satyam syāt mithyātvam brahmaṇaḥ tatas

original: anirvācyasya sattvaṃ vā yadi dharmā na kecana /
analyzed: anirvācyasya sattvam vā yadi dharmāḥ na kecana

original: brahmaṇo naiva jijñāsyaṃ jijñāsā dharmanirṇayaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.40 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ na eva jijñāsyam jijñāsā dharma nirṇayaḥ

original: itthambhāvo hi dharmo 'sya na cenna pratiyogitā // MAnuv_3,2.41 //
analyzed: ittham bhāvaḥ hi na ced na pratiyogitā

original: yadi syustādṛśā dharmāḥ sarvajñatvādayo na kim /
analyzed: yadi syuḥ tādṛśāḥ dharmāḥ sarvajña tva ādayaḥ na kim

original: anyāpekṣā yadi syuṣṭe sattaivaṃ deśakālagā // MAnuv_3,2.43 //

original: deśakālānapekṣā hi na sattā kvāpi dṛśyate /
analyzed: deśa kāla anapekṣā hi na sattā kvāpi dṛśyate
sarva dharma ujjñitasya asya kim śāstreṇa adhigamyate

original: aprāptāṃ bhrāntimāpādya kiṃ vedo mānatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_3,2.45 //
analyzed: aprāptām bhrāntim āpādya kim vedaḥ māna tām vrajet

original: na hi vedaṃ vinā brahma vedyaṃ dharmāśca tadgatāḥ /

original: vedavedyasya mithyātvaṃ yadi naikyasya tat katham // MAnuv_3,2.46 //
analyzed: veda vedyasya mithyātvam yadi nā aikyasya tat katham
sāmānya dharma ādīnām hi
idam tad ādi dharmi tve dharmaḥ nyaḥ kalpyate hi
sarva dharma vihīnasya dharma āropaḥ kva dṛśyate
tad artham yadi dharmāṇām āropaḥ sā anavasthitiḥ
īśa tad jñāna veda akṣa ja anumā mātṛ pūrviṇaḥ

original: bhrāntirviśvasya yenaiva mānābhāsena kalpyate 'tra hi // MAnuv_3,2.49 //
analyzed: bhrāntiḥ viśvasya yena eva māna ābhāsena kalpyate hi

original: tanmātrasyānyathā bhāvāt kiṃ na syād viśvasatyatā /
analyzed: tad mātrasya anyathā bhāvāt kim na syāt viśva satyatā

original: yenedaṃ kalpyate bhrāntaṃ bhrāntistasyaiva kiṃ na sā // MAnuv_3,2.50 //
analyzed: yena idam kalpyate bhrāntam bhrāntiḥ tasya eva kim na sā
bhrānta tve tasya viśva ādeḥ īśa ādi a bhrāntam eva hi
bhaveyuḥ bhrāntayaḥ nṛṇām na eva īśa ādeḥ kathañcana
satya tvam akṣa ja prāptam yadi bhrāntam iti iṣyate
prāmāṇyam āgamasya api pratyakṣāt anyatas kutas

original: sākṣiṇaḥ svaprakāśatvamanavasthā tato na hi // MAnuv_3,2.53 //
analyzed: sākṣiṇaḥ sva prakāśa tvam anavasthā tatas na hi

original: aikyāgamasya kiṃ na syāt tasyāpyetādṛśaṃ yadi /
analyzed: aikya āgamasya kim na syāt tasya api etādṛśam yadi
aikya prāmāṇya mithyātvam yadā viśvasya satyatā
aikya āgamasya māna tvam yadi abādhyam iti iṣyate
akṣajasya api māna tvam na abādhyam kim iti iṣyate

original: yadi svatastvaṃ prāmāṇye viśvasattā kathaṃ na te // MAnuv_3,2.56 //
analyzed: yadi svatas tvam prāmāṇye viśva sattā katham na te

original: prāmāṇyasya ca maryādā kālato vyāhatā bhavet /

original: mithyātvamānaṃ mokṣe 'pi mānaṃ kiṃ neti bhaṇyatām /

māna tve dvaita hāniḥ syāt amāna tve pi amokṣa tā

asti ced muktaya vasthā ca dvaita āpattiḥ atas nyathā

original: amuktatvaṃ tathā kāle kālādhīnā hi muktatā /

original: mukterapi nivṛttiḥ syāt saṃsāritvamato bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.60 //

original: dehātmatvaṃ yadi na tat prāptaṃ pratyakṣataḥ kvacit /

original: mama deha iti hyeva na deho 'hamiti pramā // MAnuv_3,2.61 //
analyzed: mama dehaḥ iti hi eva na dehaḥ ham iti pramā

original: svataḥ śuklatvavat kārṣṇyaṃ na mameti pratīyate // MAnuv_3,2.62 //

original: kathaṃ ca bhedo dehāderātmano na pramīyate /

original: jātamātrā mṛgā gāvo hastinaḥ pakṣiṇo khaṣāḥ /
analyzed: jāta mātrāḥ mṛgāḥ gāvaḥ hastinaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ khasāḥ

original: asmṛtau pūrvadehasya vijñānaṃ tat kathaṃ bhavet /

original: bhavanti vyavahārāśca na hi pratyakṣagānapi // MAnuv_3,2.66 //

original: lokāstato hi pratyakṣasiddhaṃ nānyena kenacit // MAnuv_3,2.67 //
analyzed: lokāḥ tatas hi pratyakṣa siddham na anyena kenacid

original: āgamo 'pi hi sāmānye siddhe pratyakṣataḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: āgamaḥ pi hi sāmānye siddhe pratyakṣataḥ punar

original: viśeṣaṃ jñāpayed vākyaṃ na tadajñātaśaktike // MAnuv_3,2.70 //

original: yadi śaktigraho 'nyatra kathaṃ sa syāt tadagrahe // MAnuv_3,2.71 //

na svarūpa tva sāmānyam kena api aṅgīkṛtam kvacid

original: svarūpaṃ cedanugataṃ vyāvṛttaṃ tatra kiṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.73 //

original: syāduttaraṃ tato 'nyaccet tadeva svayameva naḥ // MAnuv_3,2.74 //

original: tasya sāmānyato jñānaṃ vinā sa ca bhavet kutaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.75 //
analyzed: tasya sāmānyatas jñānam vinā sa ca bhavet kutas

original: vyāvṛttaṃ yacca sāmānyaṃ tadeva syād viśeṣataḥ // MAnuv_3,2.76 //
analyzed: vyāvṛttam yat ca sāmānyam tat eva syāt viśeṣataḥ
na ca eka dharma tā tena padārthānām parasparam
dharmāṇām bheda dṛṣṭayā eva tad sādṛśyasya darśanāt
atas sarva padārthāḥ ca sāmānyāt sākṣi gocarāḥ
sarvam iti eva vijñānam sarveṣām katham anyathā
kiñcid sādṛśya vijñānāt akhilasya api vastunaḥ
śabda śakti grahaḥ ca syāt tad tad sādṛśya mānataḥ
pratyakṣam mānasam ca eva yadā atīta artha gocaram
tadā smṛti pramāṇa tvam atīta tva viśeṣitam

original: mānatā ca kathaṃ na syāt smṛterbādhaśca nātrahi // MAnuv_3,2.81 //

original: ato na vatarmānaikaniyamaḥ syād grahe 'kṣaje // MAnuv_3,2.83 //

original: na ca pramāṇato 'nyā syāt pramitirnāma kutracit /

original: jñānameva tato 'nyā na pramitirnāma dṛśyate // MAnuv_3,2.85 //

original: svapnānāmapi caiteṣāṃ na bādho dṛśyate kvacit // MAnuv_3,2.86 //

original: na ca kācit pramā viśvabhrāntatve sarvameva ca /

original: abhrāntatve pramāṇaṃ tu kathaṃ tadbhrāntitā bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.90 //

original: kiñca bhrāntatvavādī sa bhrāntatvaṃ svamatasya ca /

aṅgīkaroti niyatam tatra sampratipanna tā
vādinoḥ tena ca abhrāntam viśvam eva bhaviṣyati
bhrānti tva bhrānta tā ced syāt katham nā abhrānti satya tā
aśeṣa doṣa duṣyam tat matam heyam bubhūṣibhiḥ
yena sva mata heya tvam svayam aṅgīkṛtam sadā
bhrānti tvāt durghaṭa tvasya bhūṣaṇa tvāt ca kevalam
unmattaḥ pi katham tasya matam svīkartum icchati
īśa śakteḥ acintya tvāt mahā unmattaiḥ pravartitam

original: nimittamaiśvarī mukhyaṃ nirmitaṃ trātameva ca // MAnuv_3,2.95 //

cit acit miśram eva etat manaḥ yāvat ca saṃsṛtiḥ

original: tenāvasthā imāḥ sarvā jīvaḥ paśyati sarvadā // MAnuv_3,2.98 //

original: sthūlā bhavantyatasteṣāṃ spaṣṭatā na tathā kvacit // MAnuv_3,2.99 //

original: jīvaṃ nayati deveśo nānyaḥ kartāsya kaścana // MAnuv_3,2.102 //

original: tadviruddhaṃ tu yat tatra mānaṃ naiva bhavet kvacit /

original: jānātyasmai prasanno 'haṃ dadyāṃ muktiṃ nacānyathā // MAnuv_3,2.107 //

original: yo māmaśeṣābhyadhikaṃ vijānāti sa eva mām /

original: vijānātyakhilāṃstasya dadyāṃ kāmān paraṃ padam // MAnuv_3,2.108 //

original: yo māmevamasammūḍhaḥ kiṃ mā nindanti śatravaḥ /

ityādi veda smṛti ga vākyaiḥ eva avasīyate
lokataḥ ca prasādena muktiḥ sa guṇa vedanāt
mahā tātparya mukhyasya virodhāt atas eva hi
doṣi tva nirguṇa tva alpa guṇa tva ādi kathañcana
na arthaḥ śruti purāṇa ādeḥ tad viruddhaḥ khilasya ca

original: arthaḥ svayaṃ vinirṇīto vāsudevena sādaram // MAnuv_3,2.111 //
analyzed: arthaḥ svayam vinirṇītaḥ vāsudevena sādaram

original: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaśca bhārata // MAnuv_3,2.112 //
analyzed: etat buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca bhārata
iti atas khila sat śāstra viruddha tvena nā anumā

na ca cit tvāt abhinna tvam jīvasya īśa vat āpyate
yatas ābhāsa tām eva śrutiḥ asya vadati alam

original: chāyā yathā puṃsadṛśā pumādhīnā ca dṛśyate /
analyzed: chāyā yathā puṃsadṛśā ca dṛśyate

original: ābhāsa eva puruṣā muktāśca paramātmanaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.116 //

original: chāyā viṣṇo ramā tasyāśchāyā dhātā viśeṣakau /
analyzed: chāyā viṣṇoḥ ramā tasyāḥ chāyā dhātā viśeṣakau
tasya indra kāmau ca tayoḥ tayoḥ anye khilāḥ api
hareḥ brahma asya gīḥ tasyāḥ viśeṣau indraḥ etayoḥ
māraḥ ca ābhāsakāḥ sarve etayoḥ tad adhīnataḥ
sarve lpa śaktayaḥ ca eva pūrṇa śaktiḥ paraḥ hariḥ

original: ityādiśrutivākyebhyo jñāyate bheda eva hi // MAnuv_3,2.119 //
analyzed: ityādi śruti vākyebhyaḥ jñāyate bhedaḥ eva hi

original: tanna yuktaṃ yadābhāsa upādhyāyatta īyate // MAnuv_3,2.120 //
analyzed: tat na yuktam yat ābhāsaḥ upādhyāyattaḥ īyate
upādhyā āyatta tā bhāvāt ābhāsa tva virodhataḥ
cetana tvena ca aṃśa tvāt samudāya aikyam āpatet
atas pṛthak tavam uditam samudāya aṃśayoḥ bhavet
īśa ākhyā samudāye syāt īśa rūpeṣu iva uditā
atas deha ādi upādhīnām apāye samatā bhavet
īśa rūpaiḥ atha ābhāsāḥ mukhyatas sūryaka ādi vat
yadā tadā upādhyāya tta rūpāṇām nāśitā bhavet
iti āśaṅkā nivṛtti artham āha veda adhipaḥ prabhuḥ
atas eva upamā iti eva ca anya ābhāsa viśeṣitām
yat uktam tad adhīna tvam sarva avasthāsu aśeṣatas

original: jīvasya sadṛśatvaṃ ca cittvamātraṃ nacāparam // MAnuv_3,2.125 //
analyzed: jīvasya sadṛśa tvam ca cit tva mātram na ca aparam
tāvat mātreṇa ca ābhāsaḥ rūpam eṣām cit ātmanām
na upādhi adhīna tā ādyaiḥ ca na ati sāmyam nidarśane
kiñcid sukha ādi sādṛśyam api īśena īsuḥ anṛte

original: tata ābhāsate nityaṃ tadvadābhāsate 'pi ca // MAnuv_3,2.127 //
analyzed: tatas ābhāsate nityam tadvat ābhāsate ca

original: jīva ābhāsa uddiṣṭaḥ sadaiva paramātmanaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.128 //
analyzed: jīvaḥ ābhāsaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ sadā eva paramātmanaḥ
na jala āyatta sūrya ādi pratibimba upama tvataḥ
tad adhīna tvam evā iti kiñcid sādṛśyam eva ca
samprakāśayataḥ sūtra gatau akhila mānataḥ
jīva īśa bheda dṛṣṭayā eva samudāya ekatā kutas
aśeṣa doṣa rāhityam sarva śakti tvataḥ hareḥ
sarva upetā iti kathitam atas aikyam kva doṣiṇā
aśeṣa śakti yuktaḥ ced svātantryāt doṣavān katham
anusandhāna rahitam aikyam ced ekatā na tat
cetanā aikye nusandhānam pramāṇam nā eva ca aparam
anusandhāna rahita samudāya aikyam eva ced
cetaneṣu astu tat nāma mātram eva yatas tatas
muktau syāt anusandhānam ced mithyājñāni tā bhavet

original: sarvajña ekatāṃ nānusandhatte naiva sā yataḥ // MAnuv_3,2.134 //
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ ekatām na anusandhatte na eva sā yatas
paścāt syāt anusandhānam ced mithyājñāni tā bhavet
vidyamāna anusandhānam na ced ajña tvam āpatet

original: asadaikyaṃ bhavet paścād yadi syāt saptamo rasaḥ /
analyzed: asat aikyam bhavet paścāt yadi syāt saptamaḥ rasaḥ
samudāya aikyam etasmāt sadā
śeṣa guṇa unnaddham nirdoṣam yāvat eva hi

original: tāvadeveśvaro nāma tatra bhedo 'pi na kvacit // MAnuv_3,2.137 //
analyzed: tāvat eva īśvaraḥ nāma tatra na kvacid

original: neha nānāsti kimapi harayo 'yamayaṃ hi saḥ /
analyzed: na iha nānā asti kim api harayaḥ yam ayam hi saḥ

original: ityādiśrutimānena jīvāṃśāḥ sarva eva ca // MAnuv_3,2.138 //
analyzed: ityādi śruti mānena jīva aṃśāḥ sarve eva ca
niyamena anusandhānavantaḥ yadi ekatā svatas
aṃśinoḥ śeṣa sandhānam ati alpasya api vidyate
bhuvi jātena ca aṃśena sukha duḥkha ādi tat gatam
anubhūyate viśeṣaḥ tu kaścid īśa kṛtaḥ bhavet
īśasya acintya śakti tvāt na aśakyam kvāpi vidyate
sā īśa tā anupapannā eva yadi jīva eka tā asya hi
anīśasya īśa tā iti eva viruddham sarva mānataḥ
īśa tvena eva vijñātam anīśa tvena ced śrutiḥ
anīśa tvena vijñātam īśa tvena athavā diśet
upajīvya virodhena nā eva māna tvam eṣyati
atas eva īśa tā siddheḥ na kiñcid śakyam asya ca
īśa tve nīśa bhedena śrutyā samyak prakāśite

original: ayuktamapi cānyatra yuktaṃ bhavati tadbalāt // MAnuv_3,2.144 //
analyzed: ayuktam api ca anyatra yuktam bhavati tad balāt
atas nyatra api yat dṛṣṭam tat īśena eva kalpyate
śruti ābhāsa āptam api nahi īśatva paripanthi yat

original: īśo 'nīśo jaganmithyā duḥkhī mukto bhidā na hi /
analyzed: īśaḥ nīśaḥ jagat mithyā duḥkhī muktaḥ bhidā na hi
iti pratijñā vyāghātaḥ sarva doṣa adhika adhikaḥ
iti hi brahma tarka uktiḥ atiheyam atas khilaiḥ
bubhūṣubhiḥ matam idam jīva īśa abheda vādinaḥ
na ayuktam īśituḥ kiñcid īśatvasya avirodhi yat
yadi īśitva virodhi syāt tat eva ayuktam añjasā
īśitvasya avirodhena yojayitvā akhilāḥ pramāḥ

original: siddheśitvena cāyuktamapi hīśe na yojayet // MAnuv_3,2.149 //
analyzed: siddha īśitvena ca ayuktam api hi īśe na yojayet
mānataḥ prāptam akhilam nāmānam yojayet kvacid
iti hi brahma tarka uktiḥ atas yuktam iha uditam
sa ca aprākṛta rūpa tvāt arūpaḥ
rūpam asya śiraḥ pāṇi pāda ādi ātmakam iṣyate
atas nā anitya tā nā eva śruti dvaya virodhi tā
yathā hi taijasasya eva prakāśasya ujkhitau api
ātmā eva jyotiḥ iti āha jīvasya īśam śrutiḥ tathā
tad bhakti tāratamyena tāratamyam vimukti gam
brahma ādīnām ca sarveṣām ānanda ādeḥ yathākramam
pratibimba vat api eṣām ānandaḥ yathā
nārāyaṇa guṇa adhīnaḥ ca ati alpaḥ tad apekṣayā
tasmāt bhinnaḥ ca satatam anyat jñānam parasya ca

original: anyajjñānaṃ tu jīvānāmanya ānanda īśatā // MAnuv_3,2.155 //
analyzed: anyat jñānam tu jīvānām anyaḥ ānandaḥ īśatā

original: mukhyeśatā pareśasya gauṇī jīvasya sā yataḥ /
analyzed: mukhya īśa tā para īśasya gauṇī jīvasya sā yatas
iti śruteḥ sṛṣṭi nāśau tad adhīnau iti īrite
svabhāva tvāt sthiteḥ na etat apekṣā iti na yujyate
yatas svabhāvaḥ khile īśa āyattaḥ khilasya ca

original: avyakto 'pi svaktayaiva bhaktānāṃ dṛśyate hariḥ // MAnuv_3,2.157 //
analyzed: avyaktaḥ su aktayā eva bhaktānām dṛśyate hariḥ
tad abhinnāḥ guṇāḥ nityam api sarve viśeṣataḥ
guṇa tvena guṇi tvena bhoktṛ bhogya tayā sthitāḥ
viśeṣa ātma tayā teṣām nitya śaktayā ātmanā tathā
nitya sthiteḥ na dharmāṇām kriyā ādīnām anitya tā
na viśeṣa ātma tā ca iyam anityā śakti rūpa tā

original: saiva yat saviśeṣā syād viśeṣo 'nyo nacāpyayam // MAnuv_3,2.160 //
analyzed: sā eva yat sa viśeṣā syāt viśeṣaḥ nyaḥ na ca api ayam
sva nirvāhaka tā hetoḥ tathā api syāt viśeṣataḥ
viśeṣa tvena vijñāteḥ pramāṇaiḥ akhilaiḥ api
sasarja sañjahāra iti viśeṣaḥ hi avagamyate

original: śrutyaiva sa sa eveti tadabhedaśca gamyate // MAnuv_3,2.162 //
analyzed: śrutyā eva sa saḥ eva iti tad abhedaḥ ca gamyate

original: bhedo yadi viśeṣasya sa bhedo bhedinā katham /
analyzed: bhedaḥ yadi viśeṣasya sa bhedaḥ bhedinā katham

original: bhinnaścedanavasthā syādabhinnaścet purā na kim // MAnuv_3,2.163 //
analyzed: bhinnaḥ ced anavasthā syāt abhinnaḥ ced purā na kim
viśeṣaḥ bhinnaḥ evā iti tena nā abhyupagamyate
abhinnaḥ bhedaḥ tad bheda tā kutas
anena anena bhinnaḥ yam iti yat sa viśeṣataḥ

original: bheda evaiṣa bahudhā dṛśyate tat kimuttaram // MAnuv_3,2.165 //
analyzed: bhedaḥ eva eṣa bahudhā dṛśyate tat kim uttaram
abheda bhedayoḥ ca eva sva rūpa tvam hi bhedinā
tayoḥ api aviśeṣa tve paryāya tvam hi śabdayoḥ
abheda bheda śabdau ca paryāyau iti kaḥ vadet
bhedaḥ nyonyam abhedaḥ ca bhedinā ced viśeṣa tā
nirviśeṣe katham bhedaḥ bhedinā ekaḥ tathā
punar tayoḥ vibhedaḥ ca bhedi mātra tvataḥ bhavet
bhedinaḥ ca eva bhedasya viśeṣaḥ yadi gamyate
abheda abhedinoḥ ca eva kim bhedaḥ bheda bhedayoḥ
viśeṣeṇa eva sarvatra yadi vyavahṛtiḥ bhavet

original: kalpanāgauravāyaiva kiṃ bhedaḥ kalpyate tadā // MAnuv_3,2.170 //
analyzed: kalpanā gauravāya eva kim bhedaḥ kalpyate tadā
aikya pratīti abhāvena bhedaḥ eva gav aśvayoḥ

original: sa eveti pratītau hi viśeṣo nāma bhaṇyate // MAnuv_3,2.171 //
analyzed: saḥ evā iti pratītau hi viśeṣaḥ nāma bhaṇyate
saccid ādeḥ aparyāya siddhayartham māyinā api hi
aṅgīkāryaḥ viśeṣaḥ yam yadi asatya viśeṣaṇam
pṛthak pṛthak vārayitum śabda antaram iti iṣyate
māyā viśeṣa rāhitya viśeṣeṇa viśeṣitā

original: satyasyāpi bhavet sā ca tathā cedanavasthitiḥ // MAnuv_3,2.173 //
analyzed: satyasya api bhavet sā ca tathā ced anavasthitiḥ

original: yadi satye viśeṣo na na taduktirbhavet tadā /
analyzed: yadi satye viśeṣaḥ na na tad uktiḥ bhavet tadā

original: lakṣyate cet tena lakṣyamityapi syād viśeṣitā // MAnuv_3,2.174 //
analyzed: lakṣyate ced tena lakṣyam iti api syāt viśeṣitā
punar punar lakṣaṇāyām api syāt anavasthitiḥ
yadi abhāva viśeṣi tvam syāt aṅgīkṛtam eva te
asārvajñya ādi rāhityam api evam te bhaviṣyati
tadā sārvajñyam eva syāt bhāva artha tvāt nañoḥ dvayoḥ
yadi nā etādṛśam grāhyam asukha tva anivartanāt
asattva jñānatā ādeḥ ca syāt asattva ādikam tadā
anṛta ādi virodhi tvam yat yasya abhyupagamyate
anaiśvarya virodhi tvam api evam kim nivāryate
akhaṇḍa khaṇḍanāt evam viśeṣa ukhaṇḍa vādinā
khaṇḍitena api manasā svīkāryaḥ ūna anyathāgateḥ
akhaṇḍa khaṇḍa vādibhyām khaṇḍa akhaṇḍena ca eva tat

original: mahādareṇa śirasi viśeṣo dhārya eva hi // MAnuv_3,2.180 //
analyzed: mahā ādareṇa śirasi viśeṣaḥ dhāryaḥ eva hi
nidarśana trayeṇa atas bhagavān ati abhinna tām
guṇānām ādareṇa āha tat ca na abhihita anvayaḥ
sāmānyataḥ bhavet
pada ekena api uttareṇa viśeṣa avagatiḥ bhavet
yatas śeṣa viśeṣāṇām vastunā asti eva ca eka tā
atas sāmānyatas jñātaḥ pada antara balāt punar
bhavet viśeṣataḥ jñānaḥ tena syāt anvita ukti tā
sva arthaḥ eva anvitaḥ yasmāt kenacid tad viśeṣataḥ
anena iti tad uktayā eva jñāyate nubhavena hi
yadi ananvitam eva etat padam sva artham vadet iha

original: tathānyānyapi sarvāṇi kaḥ kuryādanvayaṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.185 //
analyzed: tathā anyāni api sarvāṇi kaḥ kuryāt anvayam punar

original: vyāpāro na hi śabdasya paraḥ svārthaprakāśanāt /
analyzed: vyāpāraḥ na hi śabdasya paraḥ sva artha prakāśanāt
pumān api eka vāra uktayā kṛtakṛtyaḥ yadā bhavet

original: anvayasya kathaṃ jñānaṃ śabdārthatvaṃ yadāsya na /
analyzed: anvayasya katham jñānam śabda artha tvam yadā asya na
yadā eva ananvita arthasya vacanam taiḥ

original: ananvitaḥ syācchabdārtho na tadartho hi so 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: ananvitaḥ syāt śabda arthaḥ na tad arthaḥ hi saḥ nvayaḥ
nirākāṅkṣa padāni eva vākyam iti ucyate budhaiḥ
tad tad artha abhidhānena syāt nirākāṅkṣa tā ca sā
apūrteḥ tāvat arthānām ākāṅkṣā pūrvam iṣyate

original: karmakartṛkriyāṇāṃ tu pūrtau ko 'nyo 'nvayo bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.190 //
analyzed: karma kartṛ kriyāṇām tu pūrtau kaḥ nyaḥ nvayaḥ bhavet
apūrtiḥ ced padaiḥ uktaiḥ kim nṛśṛṅgeṇa pūryate

original: vyāpāraścet punasteṣāmanuktāvapi kiṃ na saḥ // MAnuv_3,2.191 //
analyzed: vyāpāraḥ ced punar teṣām anuktau api kim na saḥ
ukte buddhi stha tā hetoḥ yadi vyāpāraḥ iṣyate

original: buddhisthatvāya yatnaṃ na kathaṃ kuryuḥ puraiva ca /
analyzed: buddhi stha tvāya yatnam na katham kuryuḥ purā eva ca

original: puruṣādhīnatā teṣāṃ yadi paścācca sā samā // MAnuv_3,2.192 //
analyzed: puruṣa adhīna tā teṣām yadi paścāt ca sā samā
pumān eva anvayāya eṣām paścāt yadi viceṣyate
ananvita abhidhānānām saḥ eva artha antara uktiṣu

original: yatatāṃ śabdaśaktiścet tatra naivānvaye katham // MAnuv_3,2.193 //
analyzed: yatatām śabda śaktiḥ ced tatra nā evā anvaye katham
tad kalpanā guru tva ādi doṣa itas bhihita anvayaḥ
anubhūti viruddhaḥ ca tyājyaḥ eva manīṣibhiḥ
kartṛ śabde hi abhihite dharma sāmānya vedanāt
viśeṣa dharmam anvicchan kim iti eva hi pṛcchati
guṇa kriyā ādi dharmāṇām viśeṣe kathite punar
nirākāṅkṣaḥ bhavet yasmāt śabdāḥ anvita vācakāḥ
atas nanta guṇa ātmā ekaḥ bhagavān ekaḥ eva tu
ucyate sarva vedaiḥ ca te ca akhila vilakṣaṇāḥ
sarve sarva guṇa ātmānaḥ sarva kartāraḥ eva ca
tathā api sa viśeṣāḥ ca pi ca
taiḥ taiḥ śabdaiḥ ca bhaṇyante yujyate ca upadeśataḥ
anya ānanda ādi sādṛśyam ānukūlya ādinā param

original: pūrṇatvādi mahat teṣāṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ śrutau śrutam /
analyzed: pūrṇa tva ādi mahat teṣām vailakṣaṇyam śrutau śrutam
pūrṇe śeṣa niyantā ca sukhādutamaḥ eka kalaḥ
guṇa ūru samudāyaḥ yam vāsudevaḥ sa niṣkaḷaḥ

original: vāsudevaśrutiḥ saiṣā guṇān vakti hareḥ parān // MAnuv_3,2.201 //
analyzed: vāsudeva śrutiḥ sā eṣā guṇān vakti hareḥ parān
saḥ eva aśeṣa jīva stha nissaṅkhaya anādikālikān

original: dharmādharmān sadā paśyan svecchayā bodhayatyajaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.202 //
analyzed: dharma adharmān sadā paśyan sva icchayā bodhayati ajaḥ

original: kāṃścit teṣāṃ phalaṃ caiva dadāti svayamacyutaḥ /
analyzed: kāṃścid teṣām phalam ca eva dadāti svayam acyutaḥ
na te viśeṣam kam api preraṇa ādikam ucyate
kuryuḥ kadāpi tena ayam svatantraḥ n upacārataḥ

original: karmāṇi tāni ca pṛthak cetanānyeva sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: karmāṇi tāni ca pṛthak cetanāni eva sarvaśas
acetana śarīrāṇi sva karma phala bhāñci ca
pratyekam teṣu ca ananta karmāṇi evaṃvidhāni ca
tāni ca evam iti īśasya nissīmā śaktiḥ uttamā
ekā eva brahmahatyā hi varāhahariṇā uditā
brahmapāra stavena eva niṣkrāntāḥ rāja dehataḥ

original: stotrasya tasya māhātmyād vyādhatvaṃ gamitā punaḥ /
analyzed: stotrasya tasya māhātmyāt vyādha tvam gamitā punar

original: prāpya jñānaṃ paraṃ cāpa tathānyānyapi sarvadā // MAnuv_3,2.207 //
analyzed: prāpya jñānam param ca āpa tathā anyāni api sarvadā
anantāni uditāni evam prabhuṇā kapilena hi

original: saṃsāre pacyamānāni karmāṇyapi pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_3,2.208 //
analyzed: saṃsāre pacyamānāni karmāṇi api pṛthak pṛthak
tasmāt ananta māhātmya guṇa pūgaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: bhaktyā paramayā'rādhya iti pādārtha īryate // MAnuv_3,2.209 //
analyzed: bhaktyā paramayā ārādhyaḥ iti pādārthaḥ īryate
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne tṛtīya adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
vairāgyataḥ bhakti dārḍhyam tena upāsā yadā bhavet

original: āparokṣyaṃ bhaved viṣṇoriti pādakramo bhavet // MAnuv_3,3.1 //
analyzed: āparokṣyam bhavet viṣṇoḥ iti pāda kramaḥ bhavet
yuktitaḥ jñāta veda arthaḥ nirasya samayān parān
paraspara virodham ca praṇudya aśeṣa vākya gam
adhyātma praṇavaḥ bhūtvā tasya sannihita tvataḥ
bahu yukti virodhānām bhānāt tad sahita śruteḥ
virodham ca nirākṛtya śrutīnām prāṇataḥ tu agān
parihṛtya virodhān ca tad prasāda anurañjitaḥ
deha kartṛ tvam īśasya jñātvā tad pitṛ tā smṛteḥ
viśeṣa sneham āpādya sarva kartṛ tvataḥ dhikam
niṣpādya bahu mānam ca tad anyatra ati duḥkhataḥ
utpādya adhika vairāgyam tad guṇa ādhikya vedanāt
sarvasya tad vaśa tvāt ca dārḍhyam bhakteḥ avāpya ca
yateta upāsanāya eva viśiṣṭa ācārya sampadā
kartavyā brahma jijñāsā iti ukte kim iti saṃśaye
atas iti udite pi asya viśeṣa anuktitaḥ punar
sṛṣṭi bandhana mokṣa ādi kartṛ tvasya śruta tvataḥ
yatas mokṣa ādi dātā asau atas jijñāsyaḥ eva vaḥ

original: ityāha tat paraṃ brahma vyāsākhyaṃ jñānaraśmimat // MAnuv_3,3.9 //
analyzed: iti āha tat param brahma vyāsa ākhyam jñāna raśmimat

original: yenaiva bandhamokṣaḥ syāt sa ca jijñāsayā gataḥ /
analyzed: yena eva bandha mokṣaḥ syāt sa ca jijñāsayā gataḥ
su prasannaḥ bhavet īśaḥ mukti dā
mokṣa ādi da tvam īśasya katham evā avagamyate
iti ced śāstra yoni tvāt śāstra gamyaḥ hi mokṣa daḥ
pratyakṣa avasitebhyaḥ syāt yadi mokṣaḥ kathañcana
kim iti anādi saṃsāra magnāḥ sarvāḥ imāḥ prajāḥ
yasmāt niyamataḥ duḥkha hāniḥ pratyakṣataḥ bhavet
dhāvanti eva tam uddiśya rāja ādyam akhilāḥ prajāḥ
anumāna gamyataḥ mokṣaḥ yadi tasya anumā eva hi
dṛṣṭa pūruṣa vat mokṣa dātṛ tām vinivārayet
tad śāstra gamyaḥ eva ekaḥ mokṣa daḥ bhavati dhruvam
śāstra gamyaḥ ca na anyaḥ sti mokṣa da tvena keśavāt

original: mokṣado hi svatantraḥ syāt paratantraḥ svayaṃ sṛtau /
analyzed: mokṣa daḥ hi svatantraḥ syāt paratantraḥ svayam sṛtau

original: vartamānaḥ kathaṃ śaktaḥ paramokṣāya kevalam // MAnuv_3,3.16 //
analyzed: vartamānaḥ katham śaktaḥ para mokṣāya kevalam

original: anyāśrayeṇa yadyeṣa dadyānmokṣaṃ sa eva hi /
analyzed: anya āśrayeṇa yadi eṣa dadyāt mokṣam saḥ eva hi
tena ananusṛtaḥ mokṣam na dadyāt anya vākyataḥ
atas tad artham api sa jñeyaḥ viṣṇuḥ mumukṣibhiḥ

original: yamevaiṣa iti śrutyā tameveti ca sādaram /
analyzed: yam eva eṣa iti śrutyā tam eva iti ca sādaram
śāstra yoni tvam asya eva jñāyate veda vādibhiḥ
ye enam viduḥ amṛtāḥ iti uktaḥ tu samudragaḥ
tat eva brahma paramam iti śrutyā avadhāritaḥ

original: yataḥ prasūteti tataḥ sṛṣṭimāha tato hariḥ /
analyzed: yatas prasūtā iti tatas sṛṣṭim āha tatas hariḥ
śāstra yoniḥ na ca anyaḥ sti mukhyatas tu iti gamyate
śāstra yoni tvam etasya jñāyate hi samanvayāt
sam iti hi upasargeṇa para mukhyā atha ṛtā ucyate
evam parama mukhya arthaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ iti śruteḥ
nirdhāraṇāya na aśabdam iti vedapatiḥ jagau
katham samanvayaḥ jñeyaḥ su alpa śākhā vidām nṛṇām

original: vedā hyanantā iti hi śrutirāhāpyanantatām // MAnuv_3,3.23 //
analyzed: vedāḥ hi anantāḥ iti hi śrutiḥ āha api ananta tām
ananta veda nirṇītiḥ mahā praḷaya vāridheḥ
uttāraṇa upamā iti asmāt na jñeyaḥ samanvayaḥ
iti śaṅkā apanoda artham saḥ āha karuṇākaraḥ
aśakya uttaraṇa tve pi hi āgama apāra vāridheḥ
nirṇīyate mayā eva ayam romakūpala yodinā
yadi api aśeṣa veda arthaḥ khila mānavaiḥ
prāpnoti paramāṇu tām
iti prakāśayan viśvapatiḥ āha prameya tām
nikhilasya api vedasya gati sāmānyam añjasā
kaḥ nāma gati sāmānyam ananta āgama sampadaḥ
jñānasūryam ṛte brūyāt tam ekam bādarāyaṇam
śākhā catuṣpañca gatam vasu
jānan na anumita tvena brūyāt tasya prasādataḥ
iti mukhya tayā aśeṣa gati sāmānya vid prabhuḥ

original: pratijajñe dṛḍhaṃ yasmād devānāmapi pūryate // MAnuv_3,3.30 //
analyzed: pratijajñe dṛḍham yasmāt devānām api pūryate
atas nikhila vedānām siddhaḥ evam samanvayaḥ

original: iti sujñāpitārtho 'pi pṛthak cāha samanvayam // MAnuv_3,3.31 //
analyzed: iti pṛthak ca āha samanvayam
tatra prathamatas nyatra prasiddhānām samanvayaḥ
śabdānām vācyaḥ evā atra mahā mat leśa bhaṅga vat
i taḥ t yabhyadhika tve turya pāda uditasya tu
mahā samanvaye tasmin na adhikāraḥ khilasya hi
brahmā eva adhikṛtaḥ tatra mukhyatas nye yathākramam
durgama tvāt ca nā evā atra prāthamyena uditaḥ ñjasā
atas nyatra prasiddhānām śabdānām nirṇayāya tu
pravṛttaḥ prathamam devaḥ tatra ānanda ādayaḥ guṇāḥ
īśasya eva iti nirṇītāḥ śruti yukti samāśrayāt
devatā antara gāḥ sarve śabda vṛtti nimittataḥ
viṣṇum eva vadanti addhā tad saṅgāt upacārataḥ
anya devān vadanti iha viśeṣa guṇa vaktṛtaḥ
viṣṇum eva param brūyuḥ evam anye pi aśeṣatas
iti anyatra prasiddha uru śabdarāśeḥ aśeṣatas

original: jñāte samanvaye viṣṇau liṅgairhyeṣa samanvayaḥ // MAnuv_3,3.38 //
analyzed: jñāte samanvaye viṣṇau liṅgaiḥ hi eṣa samanvayaḥ

original: teṣāmanyagatatve tu na syāt samyak samanvayaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām anya gata tve tu na syāt samyak samanvayaḥ
iti eva aśeṣa liṅgānām brahmaṇi eva samanvayam
āha ubhaya gata tvam ca syāt atas liṅga śabdayoḥ
iti saṃśaya nutti artham ubhayatra pratītitaḥ
śabdānām vartamānānām sa liṅgānām viśeṣataḥ
samanvayaḥ harau eva yat na eva anyatra mukhyatas

original: śabdā liṅgāni ca yato naivānyatra svatantratā /
analyzed: śabdāḥ liṅgāni ca yatas na evā anyatra svatantra tā
asvatantreṣu śabdasya vṛtti hetuḥ na mukhyatas
yad adhīnāḥ te śabda artha tvam upāgatāḥ
ati alpena eva śabdasya vṛtti hetu guṇena tu

original: ayo yathā dāhakatvaṃ sa eveśaḥ svatantrataḥ /
analyzed: ayaḥ yathā dāhaka tvam saḥ evā īśaḥ svatantrataḥ

original: mukhyaśabdārtha iti hi svīkartavyo manīṣibhiḥ // MAnuv_3,3.44 //
analyzed: mukhya śabda arthaḥ iti hi svīkartavyaḥ manīṣibhiḥ
iti āha evam ca śabdānām nārāyaṇa samanvaye
siddhe pi aśeṣa śabdānām na kathañcana yujyate
virodhau avara tva ādeḥ api prāptiḥ yatas bhavet
iti ced avara tva ādi dvividham hi upalabhyate
parasya avara tā hetuḥ yaḥ svayam paraḥ eva san

original: so 'pi hyavaraśabdārtho yathā rājā jayī bhavet // MAnuv_3,3.47 //
analyzed: saḥ pi hi avara śabda arthaḥ yathā rājā jayī bhavet
anyaḥ vara tva anubhavī tayoḥ sti keśave

original: dvitīyo jīva evāsti svātantrānnaca dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,3.48 //
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ jīvaḥ evā asti svātantrāt na ca dūṣaṇam
hareḥ evam aśeṣeṇa sarva śabda samanvaye
ukte virodha hīnasya syāt samanvaya tā yatas
atas śeṣa virodhānām kṛta īśena nirākṛtiḥ
samanvaya avirodhābhyām sañjāte vastu nirṇaye

original: kiṃ mayā kāryamityeva syād buddhiradhikāriṇaḥ // MAnuv_3,3.50 //
analyzed: kim mayā kāryam iti eva syāt buddhiḥ adhikāriṇaḥ
tatra bhakti vidhāna artham abhakta anartha santatau
uktāyām bhakti dārḍhyāya prokte śeṣa guṇa uccaye
vaktavyā upāsanā nityam kartavyā iti ādareṇa hi
sa upāsanā ca dvividhā śāstra abhyāsa svarūpiṇī

original: dhyānarūpā parā caiva tadaṅgaṃ dhāraṇādikam // MAnuv_3,3.52 //
analyzed: dhyāna rūpā parā ca eva tad aṅgam dhāraṇā ādikam
tathā ubhaya ātmakam ca eva pāde smin bādarāyaṇaḥ
āha upāsanam addhava vistarāt śruti pūrvakam
pṛthak dṛṣṭiḥ aśakya tvam anirṇītiḥ samuccayaḥ
viśeṣa darśanam kārya lopaḥ nānā uktiḥ āśu tā
vibhramaḥ upākṛtiḥ liṅgam anavasthā viśeṣi tā
aprayojana tā ca atiprasaṅgaḥ dūra saṃśrayaḥ
viśiṣṭa kāraṇam ceṣyā dṛṣṭa vairūpyam unnatiḥ
anuktiḥ aprayatna tvam dṛḍha bandha parābhavau
puṃsāmyam prāpta san tyāgaḥ kāraṇa anirṇayaḥ bhramaḥ
viśeṣa darśi tā ālāpaḥ guṇa sāmyam pṛthak dṛśiḥ
agamya vartma sandhānam iṣṭam phalam akalpanā
śuddha vairūpyam aṅga tvam aviśeṣa dṛśiḥ kriyā
yuktayaḥ pūrvapakṣa sthāḥ su jñeya tvam vidhi kriyā
māhātmyam alpa śakti tvam yathāyogya phalam bhavaḥ
phala sāmyam viśeṣaḥ ca guṇa ādhikyam pradhāna tā
yathāśakti kriyā sandhiḥ pramāṇa balam ānatiḥ
kāraṇam kārya vaiśeṣyam svabhāvaḥ vastu dūṣaṇam
pratikriyā virodhaḥ ca pratisandhiḥ anūna tā
saṃskāra pāṭavam sva icchā niyatiḥ vastu vaibhavam
su sthira tvam kṛta prāptiḥ anādi guṇa vistaraḥ
sādhana uttama tā nānā dṛṣṭiḥ śiṣṭiḥ anūna tā
avighna tva virodhau ca guṇa vaiśeṣyam āgamaḥ
siddhānta nirṇaye hi etāḥ yuktayaḥ vyāhatāḥ sadā
yathāśaktaya akhilān vedān vijñāya upāsanam bhavet

original: tatrākhilasya vijñaptiḥ samyag brahmaṇa eva hi // MAnuv_3,3.65 //
analyzed: tatra akhilasya vijñaptiḥ samyak brahmaṇaḥ eva hi
tat anyeṣām yathāyogyam akhila jñaptiḥ iṣyate
tāvatā upāsane yogyaḥ bhavet eva akhilaḥ pumān
mahattvasya param pāram viditvā eva janārdanaḥ
stoṣyatām eti tuṣṭa tvam iti na asti eva nārada
kintu niścalayā bhaktayā hi ātma jñāna anurūpataḥ

original: yaḥ stoṣyati sadā bhaktastuṣyastasya sadā hariḥ // MAnuv_3,3.68 //
analyzed: yaḥ stoṣyati sadā bhaktaḥ tuṣyaḥ tasya sadā hariḥ
ātma jñāna anurūpa tvam yathāśakti vicāraṇāt
vedaḥ kṛtsnaḥ dhik antavyaḥ svādhyāya adhyayanam bhavet
ityādi vākya vaiyarthyam anyathā na nivāryate

original: adyāpi tena devādyāḥ śṛṇvate manvate sadā /
analyzed: adyā api tena deva ādyāḥ śṛṇvate manvate sadā
dhyāyanti ca yathāyogam tathā āpyāḥ vastu nirṇayāt

original: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ caiva kartavyaṃ sarvathaiva hi // MAnuv_3,3.71 //
analyzed: śravaṇam mananam ca eva kartavyam sarvathā eva hi
mati śruti dhyāna kāla viśeṣam guruḥ uttamaḥ

original: vetti tasyoktimārgeṇa kurvataḥ syāddhi darśanam // MAnuv_3,3.72 //
analyzed: vetti tasya ukti mārgeṇa kurvataḥ syāt hi darśanam
śravaṇam dṛṣṭa tattvasya mananam dhyānam eva ca
viśeṣa ānanda samprāptyai anyasya etāni dṛṣṭaye
yadi tādṛś guruḥ nā asti nirṇīta śravaṇa ādikam
tad siddhānta anusāreṇa nirṇaya jñāt samācaret

original: śravaṇādi vinā naiva kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭhedapi kvacit /
analyzed: śravaṇa ādi vinā nā eva kṣaṇam tiṣṭhet api kvacid

original: atyaśakye tu nidrādau punareva samārabhet // MAnuv_3,3.75 //
analyzed: ati aśakye tu nidrā ādau punar eva samārabhet
abhāve nirṇaya jñasya sat śāstrāṇi eva sarvadā
śṛṇuyāt yadi sat jñāna prācuryam upalabhyate
mahat bhayaḥ viṣṇu bhaktebhyaḥ yathāśakti ca saṃśayān
chindyāt svatas dhika abhāve svayam eva samabhyaset
aśeṣa guṇa pūrṇa tvam sarva doṣa samujkhitiḥ
viṣṇoḥ anyat ca tat tantram iti samyak vinirṇayaḥ

original: svatantratvaṃ sadā tasya tasya bhedaśca sarvataḥ /
analyzed: svatantra tvam sadā tasya tasya bhedaḥ ca sarvatas
adoṣa tvasya siddhayartham yat abhede tad anvayaḥ
tad tantra tvam ca muktānām api tad guṇa pūrtaye
muktānām api bhedaḥ ca na hi bhinnam abhinna tām
gacchat dṛṣṭam kvacid tasya api abhāvaḥ nubhava upagaḥ
pūrva abhede doṣavat tvam īśasya iti ati bhinna tā
nārāyaṇena muktānām api samyak iti sthitiḥ
bheda abhede pi abhedena doṣāṇām api sambhavaḥ
nirdoṣa tvam ramāyāḥ ca tad anantara tā tathā
brahmā sarasvatī vīndra śeṣa rudrāḥ ca tad sriyaḥ

original: śakrakāmau tadanye ca kramānmuktāvapīti ca // MAnuv_3,3.83 //
analyzed: śakra kāmau tad anye ca kramāt muktau api iti ca

original: satsiddhānta iti jñeyo nirṇīto hariṇā svayam /
analyzed: sat siddhāntaḥ iti jñeyaḥ nirṇītaḥ hariṇā svayam

original: etadvirodhi yat sarvaṃ tamase 'ndhāya kevalam // MAnuv_3,3.84 //
analyzed: etat virodhi yat sarvam tamase ndhāya kevalam
andham tamaḥ viśanti iti prāha śrutiḥ ati sphuṭam
iti eva śrutayaḥ śeṣāḥ pañcarātram atha akhilam
mūlarāmāyaṇam ca eva bhāratam smṛtayaḥ khilāḥ
vaiṣṇavāni purāṇāni sāṅkhaya yogau parau api
brahmatarkaḥ ca mīmāṃsā iti anantaḥ śabdasāgaraḥ
anantara yuktayaḥ ca eva pratyakṣa āgama mūlakāḥ
pratyakṣam aiśvaram ca eva ramā ādīnām aśeṣatas
muktānām api amuktānām etam eva artham uttamam
anya avakāśa rahitam prakāśayati sādaram

original: etadeva ca sacchāstraṃ duḥśāstraṃ tu tataḥ param // MAnuv_3,3.89 //
analyzed: etat eva ca sat śāstram duḥśāstram tu tatas param
sat śāstram abhyaset nityam duḥśāstram ca parityajet
asaṃśayena tattvasya nirṇaye brahma darśanam
samyak viṣama vijñāna tāratamya anusārataḥ

original: phalaṃ bhavet tāratamyāt sukhaduḥkhātmakaṃ nṛṇām // MAnuv_3,3.91 //
analyzed: phalam bhavet tāratamyāt sukha duḥkha ātmakam nṛṇām
samyak ca adhika vijñānāt sukha ādhikyam bhavet nṛṇām

original: ato yathātmaśaktayaiva śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ tathā // MAnuv_3,3.92 //
analyzed: atas yathā ātma śaktayā eva śravaṇam mananam tathā
viṣayeṣu ca saṃsargāt śāśvatasya ca saṃśayāt

original: manasā cānyadākāṅkṣāt paraṃ na pratipādyate // MAnuv_3,3.93 //
analyzed: manasā ca anyat ākāṅkṣāt param na pratipādyate
iti bhārata vākyam hi tena etat doṣa varjitaḥ
sadā upāsanayā yuktaḥ vāsudevam prapaśyati
doṣāḥ anādi sambaddhāḥ te mukti paripanthinaḥ

original: santyeva prāyaśaḥ puṃsu tena mokṣo na jāyate // MAnuv_3,3.95 //
analyzed: santi eva prāyaśas puṃsu tena mokṣaḥ na jāyate

original: sarve ta ete jīveṣu dṛśyante tāratamyataḥ /
analyzed: sarve te ete jīveṣu dṛśyante tāratamyataḥ
ṛjūnām ekaḥ eva asti parama utsāha varjanam
sa guṇa alpa tva mātra tvāt na ṛju tvena viruddhayate
atas viṣṇau parā bhaktiḥ tad bhakteṣu rama ādiṣu
tāratamyena kartavyā puruṣa artham abhīpsitā
su ādaraḥ sarva jantūnām saṃsiddhaḥ hi svabhāvataḥ
tatas dhikaḥ sva uttameṣu tad ādhikya anusārataḥ
kartavyaḥ vāsudeva antam sarvathā śubham icchatā

original: na kadācit tyajet taṃ ca krameṇainaṃ vivardhayet // MAnuv_3,3.99 //
analyzed: na kadācid tyajet tam ca krameṇa enam vivardhayet

original: sameṣu svātmavat snehaḥ satsvanyatra tato dayā /
analyzed: sameṣu sva ātma vat snehaḥ satsu anyatra tatas dayā
kāryā evam āparokṣyeṇa dṛśyate kṣipram īśvaraḥ
tat tamaḥ vrajet viṣṇu sama tvam yaḥ nupaśyati
ramā brahma śiva ādīnām api muktau kathañcana
kim uta ādhikya dṛṣṭeḥ tat guṇa abhāva mateḥ api
doṣa vettuḥ abhedasya draṣṭuḥ draṣṭuḥ tathā ubhayoḥ
iti āha sat śrutiḥ tena samprokta guṇa saṃyutam

original: upāsīta hariṃ dṛṣṭvā muktistenaiva jāyate // MAnuv_3,3.103 //
analyzed: upāsīta harim dṛṣṭvā muktiḥ tena eva jāyate
dveṣāt yat mukti kathanam śruti vākya virodhi yat
ripavaḥ ye tu rāmasya vimukha tvāt nirāmiṇaḥ

original: abhidrohapade nityamandhe tamasi te sthitāḥ // MAnuv_3,3.104 //
analyzed: abhidroha pade nityam andhe tamasi te sthitāḥ
hari dviṣaḥ tamaḥ yānti ye ca eva tad abhedinaḥ
tad nirguṇa tva vettāraḥ tasya doṣa vidaḥ api ca
ityādi śruti sandarbhāt dveṣiṇaḥ tamaḥ īyate
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca api bhagavat nindayā tamaḥ
vidhikṣuḥ atyagāt sūno prahlādasya anubhāvataḥ

original: yadanindat pitā mahyaṃ tvadbhakte mayi cāghavān /
analyzed: yat anindat pitā mahyam tvad bhakte mayi ca aghavān

original: tasmāt pitā me pūyeta durantād dustarādaghāt // MAnuv_3,3.107 //
analyzed: tasmāt pitā me pūyeta durantāt dustarāt aghāt
nindām bhagavataḥ śṛṇvan tad parasya janasya vā

original: tato nāpaiti yaḥ so 'pi yātyaghaḥ sukṛtāccyutaḥ // MAnuv_3,3.108 //
analyzed: tatas na apaiti yaḥ saḥ u pi yāti aghaḥ sukṛtāt cyutaḥ
avajānanti mām mūḍhāḥ mānuṣīm tanum āśritam
param bhāvam a jānantaḥ mama bhūta maheśvaram
mogha āśāḥ mogha karmāṇaḥ mogha jñānāḥ vicetasaḥ

original: rākṣasīmāsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohanīṃ śritāḥ // MAnuv_3,3.110 //
analyzed: rākṣasīm āsurīm ca eva prakṛtim mohanīm śritāḥ
mām ātma para deheṣu pradviṣantaḥ bhyasūyakāḥ
tān aham dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu nara adhamān
kṣipāmi ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣu eva yoniṣu
āsurīm yonim āpannāḥ mūḍhāḥ janmani janmani

original: māmaprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yāntyadhamāṃ gatim // MAnuv_3,3.112 //
analyzed: mām a prāpya eva kaunteya tatas yānti adhamām gatim

original: yo dviṣṭād vibudhaśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
analyzed: yaḥ dviṣṭāt vibudha śreṣṭham devam nārāyaṇam prabhum

original: kathaṃ sa na bhaved dveṣya ālokāntasya kasyacit // MAnuv_3,3.113 //
analyzed: katham sa na bhavet dveṣyaḥ āloka antasya kasyacid

original: yo dviṣṭād vibudhaśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
analyzed: yaḥ dviṣṭāt vibudha śreṣṭham devam nārāyaṇam prabhum
majjanti pitaraḥ tasya narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
ityādi vākya sandohāt dveṣiṇaḥ tamaḥ eva tu
na eva mokṣaḥ iti prāhuḥ lokāyata mate sthitāḥ
bhogaḥ śarīra paryantam bhasmībhāvaḥ tatas bhavet

original: iti tat kena mānena dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣavādinā /
analyzed: iti tat kena mānena dṛṣṭam pratyakṣa vādinā
na hi pratyakṣa mānena mokṣa abhāvaḥ vasīyate
ghaṭate mukti dṛṣṭiḥ tu puruṣeṇa mahīyasā

original: neti vakturmahattvaṃ tu kathañcana na vidyate // MAnuv_3,3.117 //
analyzed: na iti vaktuḥ mahat tvam tu kathañcana na vidyate
sādhayan sarva sāmānyam katham eva viśeṣavān
dṛśyante puruṣāḥ loke parāvara vidaḥ pi ca
aparokṣa dṛśaḥ yoga niṣṭhāḥ ca amala cakṣuṣaḥ
pratyakṣam devatām dṛṣṭvā tad prasāda āpta bhūtayaḥ
jñāna vijñāna pāra jñāḥ katham nṛbhiḥ
dṛśyate ca ati māhātmyam teṣām ati mahā ojasām

original: yadi te 'pi niṣiddhayante kiṃ noktiste niṣiddhayate /
analyzed: yadi te niṣiddhayante kim na uktiḥ te niṣiddhayate
yat ukta vākya prāmāṇyam pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyate

original: varādayo 'pi taddattāḥ sadā satyā bhavanti hi /
analyzed: vara ādayaḥ pi tad dattāḥ sadā satyāḥ bhavanti hi
aprāmāṇyam tad ukteḥ ca vṛthā vācā avasīyate
na hi prayojanam kiñcid para loka nivāraṇāt

original: vṛthāvācaṃ vṛthā hanyād yadi tasya kimuttaram /
analyzed: vṛthā vācam vṛthā hanyāt yadi tasya kim uttaram

original: svajīvanavirodhāya vadan kiṃ nāma buddhimān // MAnuv_3,3.123 //
analyzed: sva jīvana virodhāya vadan kim nāma buddhimān

original: prāmāṇye saṃśayaḥ kiṃ syāt tayoḥ puruṣayorapi /
analyzed: prāmāṇye saṃśayaḥ kim syāt tayoḥ puruṣayoḥ api
sva jīvana viruddha uktiḥ ajñaḥ dṛṣṭasya ca api saḥ
yaḥ ca atīndriya deva ukti śrotā dṛṣṭa parāvaraḥ
atīta anāgatam sarvam loka anubhavam āpayan

original: ataḥ pratyakṣagamyatvād vedamātvasya ca sphuṭam // MAnuv_3,3.125 //
analyzed: atas pratyakṣa gamya tvāt veda mā tvasya ca sphuṭam
yadi āgamasya naḥ mā tvam akṣajasya tathā bhavet

original: yadyakṣajasya mātvaṃ syādāgamasya kathaṃ na tat /
analyzed: yadi akṣa jasya mā tvam syāt āgamasya katham na tat
loka vākyāt viśeṣaḥ ca avyabhicāreṇa siddhayati
asti mokṣaḥ pi dharmeṇa yathārtha jñānataḥ pi ca
prāmāṇyam anumāyāḥ ca jinasya āpta tva sādhane
tad vākyāt dharma sat jñāna vijñaptiḥ bhavati iti ca
dharmaḥ hiṃsā paraḥ na anyaḥ jñānam pudgala darśanam

original: iti jaināḥ kathaṃ tat syāt pramāṇamanumānataḥ /
analyzed: iti jaināḥ katham tat syāt pramāṇam anumānataḥ

original: viṣayān prati sthitaṃ hyakṣaṃ pratyakṣamiti gīyate /
analyzed: viṣayān prati sthitam hi akṣam pratyakṣam iti gīyate
pratyakṣa śabda anusārāt anumā iti prakītiḥ tā

original: ā samantād gamayati dharmādharmau paraṃ padam /
analyzed: ā samantāt gamayati dharma adharmau param padam
yat ca api atīndriyam tu anyat tena asau āgamaḥ smṛtaḥ
etena kāreṇena eva tad tad māna tvam iṣyate
svarūpam hi tat eteṣām anyathā siddhi mānataḥ

original: ato 'numā kathaṃ dharmaṃ pudgalaṃ cāpi darśayet /
analyzed: atas numā katham dharmam pudgalam ca api darśayet
svarūpam pudgalasya uktāḥ doṣāḥ ānandam eva ca

original: na manyate pudgalaṃ sa duḥkhābhāvaḥ sukhaṃ tviti // MAnuv_3,3.132 //
analyzed: na manyate pudgalam sa duḥkha abhāvaḥ sukham tu iti
mātrā bhoga atirekeṇa sukha ādhikyasya darśanāt

original: sukhasyābhāvatā kena na ca syāt kiṃ viparyayaḥ // MAnuv_3,3.133 //
analyzed: sukhasya abhāva tā kena na ca syāt kim viparyayaḥ

original: yadi bhāvo 'pi kaścit syāt tasyaivābhāvatā kutaḥ /
analyzed: yadi kaścid syāt tasya eva abhāvatā kutas
yadi sarve pi abhāvāḥ syuḥ anyonyam iti bhāvatā

original: abhāvābhāvatā yat syāt kiṃ naśchinnaṃ tadā bhavet /
analyzed: abhāva abhāvatā yat syāt kim naḥ chinnam tadā bhavet
bhāva tvam vidhi rūpa tvam niṣedha tvam abhāva tā

original: niṣedhasya niṣedho 'pi bhāva eva balād bhavet /
analyzed: niṣedhasya bhāvaḥ eva balāt bhavet

original: na ca pudgalavijñānaṃ mokṣadaṃ bhavati kvacit /
analyzed: na ca pudgala vijñānam mokṣa dam bhavati kvacid

original: asvātantryāt pudgalasya jñāto 'pi sukhado na hi // MAnuv_3,3.137 //
analyzed: asvātantryāt pudgalasya sukha daḥ na hi
na hi duḥkhi parijñānāt duḥkhi tvam vinivartate
yadi pudgala vijñānāt aduḥkhī syāt kathañcana

original: dehavānapi nāduḥkhī kiṃ jñānāduttaraṃ sadā // MAnuv_3,3.138 //
analyzed: dehavān api nā aduḥkhī kim jñānāt uttaram sadā
īśa kḷpti anusāreṇa syāt kālāt īśa vādinaḥ
karma hetu tvam api tu niścaitanyāt nahi kvacid
aśeṣa duḥkha vilaye na idānīm kāraṇam yathā

original: tathottaraṃ ca naiva syād dṛṣṭipūrvānumā yataḥ // MAnuv_3,3.140 //
analyzed: tathā uttaram ca nā eva syāt dṛṣṭi pūrvā anumā yatas
śaktasya anyasya vijñānam tat prīti janakam yadi

original: tayaiva bandhahāniḥ syāditi kiṃ nāma dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,3.141 //
analyzed: tayā eva bandha hāniḥ syāt iti kim nāma dūṣaṇam
sva jñānāt bandha hāniḥ tu dṛśyate kasya kutracid
ahiṃsāyāḥ ca dharma tvam kena mānena gamyate

original: hiṃsāyā eva dharmatvamityukte syāt kimuttaram // MAnuv_3,3.142 //
analyzed: hiṃsāyāḥ eva dharma tvam iti ukte syāt kim uttaram
dharmasya sukha hetu tvam api kena avagamyate
hatyayā mokṣa hetu tvam kutas mānāt nivāryate
na ca śūnya parijñānāt śūnya bhāvanayā api ca

original: mokṣaḥ kathañcana bhaved yadīdānīṃ kathaṃ na saḥ // MAnuv_3,3.144 //
analyzed: mokṣaḥ kathañcana bhavet yadi idānīm katham na saḥ
para prasādana icchoḥ tu viḷambaḥ nāma yujyate

original: pumicchādhīnatā no ced viḷambaḥ kiṅkṛto bhavet // MAnuv_3,3.145 //
analyzed: pumicchā adhīna tā no ced viḷambaḥ kiṅkṛtaḥ bhavet
anyatra api viḷambāḥ tu syuḥ īśa icchā nimittataḥ

original: anyathā kāraṇaṃ cet syāt kiṃ kāryaṃ nopajāyate /
analyzed: anyathā kāraṇam ced syāt kim kāryam na upajāyate

original: kāraṇe sati kāryasya bhāvaḥ suniyato 'sya hi // MAnuv_3,3.146 //
analyzed: kāraṇe sati kāryasya bhāvaḥ su niyataḥ hi
vijñāna vādinaḥ ca eva vijñāna advaita vedanāt

original: vijñānabhāvanāccaiva mokṣo na ghaṭate kvacit // MAnuv_3,3.147 //
analyzed: vijñāna bhāvanāt ca eva mokṣaḥ na ghaṭate kvacid
antar jñānasya bāhye ca kṣaṇika tvasya vedanāt
bhāvanāt ca ukta mārgeṇa māna abhāvāt na mucyate

original: iti śaṅkayā na caitasmin mānamīśāprasādataḥ // MAnuv_3,3.149 //
analyzed: iti śaṅkayā na ca etasmin mānam īśa aprasādataḥ

original: vadanti niyamānmuktiṃ tamṛte 'taḥ kuto bhavet // MAnuv_3,3.150 //
analyzed: vadanti niyamāt muktim tam ṛte kutas bhavet
kaṇāda yoga akṣa pādāḥ api īśasya prasādataḥ

original: kṣayaṃ prāhuḥ kutaścaitat prasanne jagadīśvare // MAnuv_3,3.151 //
analyzed: kṣayam prāhuḥ kutas ca etat prasanne jagat īśvare
bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ chidyante sarva saṃśayāḥ

original: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare // MAnuv_3,3.152 //
analyzed: kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare
bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ chidyante sarva saṃśayāḥ
kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi dṛṣṭe eva ātmani īśvare
iti śruti purāṇa ādi vacanebhyaḥ nyathā gateḥ
na ca pāśupata ādi ukta śiva ādīnām anugrahāt

original: nānyaḥ panthā iti hyuktaṃ puruṣajñānataḥ śrutau // MAnuv_3,3.154 //
analyzed: na anyaḥ panthāḥ iti hi uktam puruṣa jñānataḥ śrutau
sarve nimeṣāḥ jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣādataḥ
evam puruṣa śabdaḥ ca prayuktaḥ bdhi śaye harau

original: na tasyeśe kaścana tasya nāma mahad yaśaḥ /
analyzed: na tasya īśe kaścana tasya nāma mahat yaśaḥ

original: iti cādhipatistasya pratiṣiddhaḥ svayaṃ śrutau // MAnuv_3,3.156 //
analyzed: iti ca adhipatiḥ tasya pratiṣiddhaḥ svayam śrutau

original: viśvataḥ paramāṃ nityaṃ viśvaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim /
analyzed: viśvatas paramām nityam viśvam nārāyaṇam harim
iti sarva adhika tva uktayā vinivāritaḥ
sama adhikasya rāhityāt na upacāra pumān asau

original: puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yacca bhavyam /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ eva idam sarvam yat bhūtam yat ca bhavyam
uta amṛta tvasya īśānaḥ yat annena atirohati
mukta amukta para īśa tvam iti tasya āha sā śrutiḥ
amṛta īśāna vacanāt sarvasya īśāna tā uditā
yadi sarva tvam uditam uta īśaḥ iti tat vṛthā
uta śabdaḥ vadet eṣa hi īśa tvasya samuccayam

original: puruṣeṇedaṃ vyāptamiti brāhmaṇaṃ cāha taṃ prati /
analyzed: puruṣeṇa idam vyāptam iti brāhmaṇam ca āha tam prati

original: etāvānasya mahimeti mahimno vaco hi tat // MAnuv_3,3.161 //
analyzed: etāvān asya mahimā iti mahimnaḥ vacaḥ hi tat
saḥ mṛtasya abhayasya īśaḥ martyam annam yat atyagāt
tu pūrva ardha uktam anūdya ca
uta amṛtasya īśaḥ iti vidhatte mukti ga īśa tām
atas viṣṇu parijñānāt eva muktiḥ na ca anyatas

original: tad yatheti śruteścaiva tataḥ karmakṣayo bhavet // MAnuv_3,3.163 //
analyzed: tat yathā iti śruteḥ ca eva tatas karma kṣayaḥ bhavet

original: jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā // MAnuv_3,3.164 //
analyzed: jñāna agniḥ sarva karmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā
sarva dharmān parityajya mām ekam śaraṇam vraja

original: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ /
analyzed: aham tvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ
ityādi bhagavat vākyaiḥ ukta arthaḥ ca avasīyate
nitya naimittikam karma kurvan anyat parityajan
mucyate saṃsṛteḥ ca etat api etena nirākṛtam
vidyā eva iti imam eva artham svayam eva āha vedarāj

original: vinā karma na mokṣaḥ syājjñānenetyapi sā śrutiḥ /
analyzed: vinā karma na mokṣaḥ syāt jñānena iti api sā śrutiḥ

original: nānyaḥ panthā iti hyeva nivārayati sādaram // MAnuv_3,3.167 //
analyzed: na anyaḥ panthāḥ iti hi eva nivārayati sa ādaram
anyathā upāsanam api tam evam iti vādinī

original: nivārayatyādareṇa na pratīka iti prabhuḥ // MAnuv_3,3.168 //
analyzed: nivārayati ādareṇa na pratīkaḥ iti prabhuḥ
andham tamaḥ praviśanti ye vidyām upāsate
iti śruti virodhāt ca na anyathā upāsanam bhavet
na ca api eka tva vijñānāt ukta nyāyena mucyate
iti sarvam pravijñāya sarvaiḥ tarka sat āgamaiḥ

original: upāsīta hariṃ nityaṃ guṇaireva svayogataḥ // MAnuv_3,3.170 //
analyzed: upāsīta harim nityam guṇaiḥ eva sva yogataḥ
brahmā sarva guṇaiḥ ca eva kriyā sāmānyataḥ ca gīḥ
guṇa sāmānyataḥ rudraḥ dravya sāmānyataḥ pare
adhikāra viśeṣeṇa bhakti jñāna sukha ādibhiḥ

original: viśeṣo devatādīnāṃ mokṣe caiva viśeṣataḥ // MAnuv_3,3.172 //

original: ābhāsatvāt pareṣāṃ tadavarāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // MAnuv_3,3.173 //
analyzed: ābhāsa tvāt pareṣām tad avarāṇām ca sarvaśas

original: yato 'varāṇāṃ sarve 'pi guṇāḥ sarvāḥ kriyā api /
analyzed: yatas varāṇām sarve guṇāḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ api

original: ataḥ sacchiṣyavat teṣāṃ naiverṣyādiḥ kathañcana // MAnuv_3,3.174 //
analyzed: atas sat śiṣya vat teṣām na eva īrṣyā ādiḥ kathañcana

original: sūtre hyārabdhamātrasya bhogenaiva kṣayo dhruvaḥ // MAnuv_3,3.175 //
analyzed: sūtre hi ārabdha mātrasya bhogena eva kṣayaḥ dhruvaḥ

original: paunaruktayena tenaite uktārthe iti niścayaḥ // MAnuv_3,3.176 //
analyzed: paunaruktayena tena ete ukta arthe iti niścayaḥ

original: uṣāḥ svāhā ca parjanyo mitro 'gnirvaruṇo vidhuḥ /
analyzed: uṣāḥ svāhā ca parjanyaḥ mitraḥ gniḥ varuṇaḥ vidhuḥ

original: pravaho 'niruddha indrome rudro vāṇī ca mārutaḥ /
analyzed: pravahaḥ niruddhaḥ indra ume rudraḥ vāṇī ca mārutaḥ
uttarottarataḥ tu ete guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ ca mukti gāḥ
sūrya dharmau yathā somaḥ manuḥ dakṣaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ
śacī ratiḥ ca aniruddha samāḥ tārā ca mitravat

original: parjanyavad vāruṇī ca tathā sañjñā ca rohiṇī // MAnuv_3,3.179 //
analyzed: parjanya vat vāruṇī ca tathā sañjñā ca rohiṇī
dharmī ca mitravat tvena prāvahī parikīrtitā
mitrapa jarnya madhya sthau aśvinau vighna vittapau

original: varuṇāgnyantarā tatra nāradaḥ prāya indravat // MAnuv_3,3.181 //
analyzed: varuṇa agni antarā tatra nāradaḥ prāyas indra vat
kāmaḥ suparṇī ca umā vat vi indraḥ rudra vat īritaḥ
niṛtiḥ mitra sadṛśaḥ viśvāmitraḥ ka sūnu vat
vaivasvataḥ manuḥ ca aśvi paścāt anye tatas varāḥ
cyavana ucathya vainyāḥ ca śaśabinduḥ ca haihayaḥ
tadvat ca vipra rājanya viśeṣaḥ kaścana
tadvat priyavrataḥ ca api tad anyāḥ śata devatāḥ
tad anye tu tatas varāḥ
etebhyaḥ bhyadhikā śrīḥ astu sadā muktā viśeṣataḥ

original: tatsamo nāsti paramo harireva nacāparaḥ // MAnuv_3,3.185 //
analyzed: tad samaḥ nā asti paramaḥ hariḥ eva na ca aparaḥ
saṃhitāyām bṛhatyām tu svayam bhagavatā uditam
tat etat akhilam prāṇaḥ āhaṅkārikaḥ eva ca
indrāt anantaraḥ dṛṣṭiḥ api yogya anusārataḥ

original: śravaṇādi ca kartavyaṃ nānyathā darśanaṃ kvacit // MAnuv_3,3.187 //
analyzed: śravaṇa ādi ca kartavyam na anyathā darśanam kvacid

original: guṇādhikaṃ guruṃ prāpya taddhīnaṃ nāpnuyāt kvacit /
analyzed: guṇa adhikam gurum prāpya tad hīnam na āpnuyāt kvacid

original: same vikalpa eva syāt pūrvānujñā ca sarvathā /
analyzed: same vikalpaḥ eva syāt pūrva anujñā ca sarvathā
tad uttama guru prāptyai pūrvā anujñā na mṛgyate
ca vidyā ca eva sarasvatī
devatāḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarveṣām aviśeṣatas
tad prasādena muktiḥ syāt na anyathā tu kathañcana
sva uttamāḥ tu krameṇa eva sarveṣām guravaḥ śrutāḥ
upadeśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tu sarveṣām eva muktaye
sādhanebhyaḥ dhikā bhaktiḥ nā evā anyat tādṛśam kvacid
bhaktiḥ ca eva harau eva mukhyāni atra yathākramam

original: svādhikā tveva sarvatra svottameṣu krameṇa ca /
analyzed: sva adhikā tu eva sarvatra sva uttameṣu krameṇa ca
anuvartate ca sā bhaktiḥ muktau ānanda rūpiṇī
tad pūrvakā upāsanā evam kartavyā muktaye guṇaiḥ
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne tṛtīya adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
evam utpanna nirdoṣa bhagavat darśanāt sadā
apekṣita phala prāptiḥ ārabdhasya anatikramāt
deva ṛṣi mānuṣa ādīnām tad tad jāti anusārataḥ
jaiminī uktam mānuṣāṇām tad viśeṣāḥ ca kecana
sāmānyam bhagavat proktam deva ādīnām viśeṣataḥ
balavat virodhi sadbhāve jaiminī ādi uktiḥ iṣyate
vikarma lepaḥ na evā asti samyak dṛṣṭimatām kvacid
guṇa hāniḥ ca nā evā asti brahmaṇaḥ tu avikarmataḥ

original: devānāmapi na prāyaḥ kḷptasya tu kathañcana /
analyzed: devānām api na prāyas kḷptasya tu kathañcana

original: prāptahrāso bhavet kvāpi mahatā tu vikarmaṇā /
analyzed: prāpta hrāsaḥ bhavet kvāpi mahatā tu vikarmaṇā

original: tathāpi tat kḷptameva tasmānna niyamojkhitiḥ // MAnuv_3,4.5 //
analyzed: tathā api tat kḷptam eva tasmāt na niyama ujkhitiḥ
candra sugrīvayoḥ ca eva sva ucca dāra parigrahāt
prāpta hāniḥ abhūt na eva kṛpta hāniḥ yathañcana
mānuṣa ādīnām ānandasya vikarmaṇā
bhavet muktau viśeṣeṇa sva uccānām aparādhataḥ
jñāna uttarasya pāpasya caturthe lepaḥ ucyate
aśuci tva ādikam tasya na bhavet iti tad phalam
atra jñāna phalasya eva mukteḥ niyata tā ucyate
prārabdha karma jasya eva viṣa bhakṣāt mṛteḥ iva
prāptasya api a nivartyasya kiñcid bhuktasya saṃvidā

original: upamarda iha prokto devādīnāṃ yathākramam // MAnuv_3,4.9 //
analyzed: upamardaḥ iha proktaḥ deva ādīnām yathākramam
