original: na brahmadarśino 'pi syāt phalahrāsastu vidyate // MAnuv_3,4.10 //
analyzed: na syāt phala hrāsaḥ tu vidyate
sarva ātmanā phala hrāsaḥ yadi na ārabdha karmaṇaḥ
syāt kāmya vidhi vaiyarthyam iti ukta niyamaḥ bhavet
evam adyā api samproktam tantrabhāgavate sphuṭam

original: tāratamyaṃ phale no ced brahmādīnāṃ kathaṃ śrutiḥ /
analyzed: tāratamyam phale no ced brahma ādīnām katham śrutiḥ
a vṛjinaḥ kāma hataḥ iti muktim nigadya ca

original: ānandatāratamyaṃ ca teṣāṃ brūyāt pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_3,4.12 //
analyzed: ānanda tāratamyam ca teṣām brūyāt pṛthak pṛthak

original: saṃsāra eva cedetat tāratamyaṃ na mukhyataḥ /
analyzed: saṃsāraḥ eva ced etat tāratamyam na mukhyatas
a kāma hata śabda arthaḥ vṛjina tvam ca naḥ bhavet
kāmasya yatra āptāḥ kāmāḥ tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi

original: iti yallakṣaṇaṃ mukteḥ śrutirāha balīyasī // MAnuv_3,4.14 //
analyzed: iti yat lakṣaṇam mukteḥ śrutiḥ āha balīyasī
kāma āhatiḥ kutas nyatra prāpta kāmasya sā bhavet
aprayatnena kāmānām avāptiḥ sā yadā bhavet
tadā eva a kāma hata tā kutas eva anyathā bhavet
cetanasya tu asuptasya kutra dṛṣṭā hi akāma tā

original: avyaktireva kāmānāṃ na nāśo mohasuptayoḥ // MAnuv_3,4.16 //
analyzed: avyaktiḥ eva kāmānām na nāśaḥ moha suptayoḥ
yad kāmaḥ svāpam āpnoti tat eva utthāpitaḥ kutas
avaśaḥ pi vyāharati kutas suptau akāma tā
sarva kāmān avāpnoti brahmaṇā saha mukti gaḥ

original: paryeti tatra jakṣaṃśca krīḍan ratimavāpnuvan // MAnuv_3,4.18 //
analyzed: paryeti tatra jakṣan ca krīḍan ratim avāpnuvan
kāma annī kāmarūpī san imān lokān ca sañcaran

original: āste gāyan sāma mukta ityādiśrutisadbalāt // MAnuv_3,4.19 //
analyzed: āste gāyan sāma muktaḥ ityādi śruti sat balāt

original: akāmaḥ syāt kathaṃ muktaḥ kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
analyzed: akāmaḥ syāt katham muktaḥ kāmāḥ ye hṛdi śritāḥ
iti antaḥkaraṇa sthānām kāmānām mokṣam eva hi

original: āha śrutirhṛdītyeva na ced vyarthaṃ viśeṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,4.20 //
analyzed: āha śrutiḥ hṛdi iti eva na ced vyartham viśeṣaṇam

original: hṛdyeṣa teṣāṃ śrayaṇamiti pakṣo na bhāsate /
analyzed: hṛdi eṣa teṣām śrayaṇam iti pakṣaḥ na bhāsate
muktānām kāmitām āha yat śrutiḥ
atas kāma hata tvam tu muktānām eva mukhyatas

original: mukhyārthasya vṛthā tyāgo māyināmeva bhūṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,4.22 //
analyzed: mukhya arthasya vṛthā tyāgaḥ māyinām eva bhūṣaṇam
apāpa tvam aduḥkha tvam ca a vṛjina tvam iha uditam

original: apriyaṃ vṛjinaṃ duḥkhamakaṃ toda itīyarte // MAnuv_3,4.23 //
analyzed: apriyam vṛjinam duḥkham akam todaḥ iti īyarte

original: tatkāraṇatvāt pāpaṃ vā vṛjinaṃ nāma kathyate /
analyzed: tad kāraṇa tvāt pāpam vā vṛjinam nāma kathyate
iti uktaḥ svayam īśena nāma arthaḥ śabda nirṇaye
apāpa tvam ca nā evā asti yāvat saṃsāram asya hi

original: ārabdhapāpamastyeva duḥkhaṃ ca jñānino 'pi hi // MAnuv_3,4.25 //
analyzed: ārabdha pāpam asti eva duḥkham ca hi
tasmāt tasmāt akāma tvam iti ca aśruta kalpanā
a kāma hataḥ iti ukteḥ śruta hāniḥ api sphuṭā

original: kutracit kāminaḥ puṃsaḥ kāmābhāvāt kvacit kvacit /
analyzed: kutracid kāminaḥ puṃsaḥ kāma abhāvāt kvacid kvacid
indra ādi sukha bhogaḥ sti iti anubhūtiḥ hi kupyati
tasmāt amukta sukha gam tāratamyam pṛthak pṛthak

original: uktvā yaśceti muktānāṃ tāratamyaṃ sukhe śrutiḥ /
analyzed: uktvā yaḥ ca iti muktānām tāratamyam sukhe śrutiḥ

original: āheti peśalaṃ tacca caśabdādeva gamyate // MAnuv_3,4.28 //
analyzed: āha iti peśalam tat ca caśabdāt eva gamyate
rāddhaḥ saṃsiddhaḥ iti eva muktaḥ eva avagamyate

original: sādhunā viṣṇunā yukto muktaḥ sādhuyuvā mataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.29 //
analyzed: sādhunā viṣṇunā yuktaḥ muktaḥ sādhu yuvā mataḥ

original: yauvanaṃ nityametasya muktasyeti yuvā sa ca /
analyzed: yauvanam nityam etasya muktasya iti yuvā sa ca
phalam adhyayanasya āptam tena adhyāyakaḥ īritaḥ
nirhrāsa ānanda samprāptyā ca āśiṣṭaḥ iti gīyate
sthitasya ananyathā prāpteḥ dṛḍhiṣṭhaḥ iti coditaḥ
baliṣṭhaḥ ca svabhāvena muktaḥ bhavati kevalam
tasya iyam pṛthivī ityādi pūrva bhāva vyapekṣayā

original: sa eka iti saṃsāragatamuktavā sukhaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ekaḥ iti saṃsāra gatam uktavā sukham punar
śrotriyasya iti vadati muktāt śataguṇa ātma tām
saṃsāragāt ca saṃsāra gatasya eva śata adhikam
muktāt muktasya yuktam syāt śruti uktam abhivīkṣitaḥ
yuktam ca sādhana ādhikyāt sādhya ādhikyam surā ādiṣu

original: nādhikyaṃ yadi sādhye syāt prayatnaḥ sādhane kutaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.35 //
analyzed: na ādhikyam yadi sādhye syāt prayatnaḥ sādhane kutas
yatnaḥ ca dṛśyate teṣām mahān eva mahātmanām
yatra sādhana bāhulyam sādhya bāhulyam atra ca

original: dṛṣṭaṃ niyamato no cenna yatnaṃ kuryarañjasā // MAnuv_3,4.36 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam niyamataḥ no ced na yatnam kuryaḥ añjasā
kṛcchreṇa sādhanāt eva na mukta vat udīryate
daśa kalpam tapaḥ cīrṇam rudreṇa lavaṇārṇave

original: tyaktavā sukhāni sarvāṇi kliṣṭena lavaṇāmbhasā // MAnuv_3,4.37 //
analyzed: tyaktavā sukhāni sarvāṇi kliṣṭena lavaṇāmbhasā
śakreṇa varṣa koṭiḥ ca dhūmaḥ ti duḥkhataḥ

original: varṣāyutaṃ ca sūryeṇa tapo 'vākchirasā kṛtam // MAnuv_3,4.38 //
analyzed: varṣa ayutam ca sūryeṇa tapaḥ vāc śirasā kṛtam
su duḥkhena sukham tyaktavā dharmeṇa ākāśa śāyinā
pītāḥ mayīcayaḥ varṣa sāhasram ati sādaram
atikṛcchreṇa kurvanti yatnam brahma vidaḥ hi
iti etat akhilam mokṣa viśeṣa abhāvataḥ katham
daivī sampad vimokṣāya nibandhāya āsurī matā
iti mokṣa viśeṣaḥ ca svayam bhagavatā uditaḥ
tam eva yūyam bhajata ātma vṛttibhiḥ manaḥ vacaḥ kāya guṇaiḥ sva karmabhiḥ
amāyinaḥ kāmadughā aṅghri paṅkajam yathā adhikārāḥ avasita artha siddhaye
akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyaḥ manaḥ javeṣu asamāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: ādaghnāsa upakakṣāsa u tve hradā iva snātvā u tve dadṛśre // MAnuv_3,4.43 //
analyzed: ādaghnāsaḥ upakakṣāsaḥ u tve hradāḥ iva snātvā u tve dadṛśre
ityādīni ca vākyāni tāratamyam vimukti gam

original: vyaktaṃ vadanti tat kena sāmyaṃ mukteṣu gamyate // MAnuv_3,4.44 //
analyzed: vyaktam vadanti tat kena sāmyam mukteṣu gamyate
duḥkha ādi abhāva sāmyam ca sāmya vākya arthaḥ īyate
bhaktayā ādi guṇa sadbhāve hi atulya tvam ca bhārate
uktam sādhana vaiśeṣyam api sarvatra kathyate
durjñeyam ghora rūpasya trailokya dhvaṃsinaḥ prabhoḥ
daivataiḥ munibhiḥ siddhaiḥ mahā yogibhiḥ eva ca
nitya yuktaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ vimukta kleśa sādhvasaiḥ
mahā utsāhaiḥ mahā dhairyaiḥ sattvasthaiḥ vyavasāyibhiḥ
atīta anāgata jñāna prabhava apyaya vedibhiḥ
śauca svādhyāya santoṣa tapaḥ satya dayā anvitaiḥ
kimu martyaiḥ bhaya bhrānti dhvaṃsa moha rujā anvitaiḥ
alpa āyuḥ vīrya dhī sattva vyavasāya śruti vrataiḥ
kaḥ tam madāmadam devam mad anyaḥ jñātum arhati

original: brahmaiva kiñcijjānāti na tadanyo hi kaścana // MAnuv_3,4.50 //
analyzed: brahma eva kiñcid jānāti na tad anyaḥ hi kaścana
muktānām api siddhānām nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ
su durlabhaḥ praśānta ātmā koṭiṣu api mahāmate

original: iyaṃ visṛṣṭiryata ā babhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na /
analyzed: iyam visṛṣṭiḥ yatas ā babhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na

original: yo asyādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman tso aṅga veda yadi vā na veda // MAnuv_3,4.52 //
analyzed: yaḥ asya adhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman tsaḥ aṅga veda yadi vā na veda

original: yaḥ svātmamāyāvibhavaṃ svayaṃ gato nāhaṃ nabhasvāṃstamathāpare kutaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sva ātma māyā vibhavam svayam gataḥ na aham nabhasvān tam atha apare kutas

original: brahmāpi yaṃ vetti naiveha samyaganye kuto devamunīndramartyāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.53 //
analyzed: brahmā api yam vetti nā evā iha samyak anye kutas deva muni indra martyāḥ
namaḥ te mita tattvāya dharma ādīnām ca sūtaye

original: nirguṇāya ca satkāṣṭhāṃ nāhaṃ vedāpare kutaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.54 //
analyzed: nirguṇāya ca satkāṣṭhām na aham veda apare kutas

original: nāhaṃ parāyur ṛṣayo na marīcimukhyā jānanti yadviracitaṃ khalu sattvasaṅgāḥ /
analyzed: na aham para āyuḥ ṛṣayaḥ na marīci mukhyāḥ jānanti yat viracitam khalu sattva saṅgāḥ

original: yanmāyayā muṣitacetasa īśadaityamartyādayaḥ kimuta śaśvadabhadravṛttāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.55 //
analyzed: yad māyayā muṣita cetasaḥ īśa daitya martya ādayaḥ kim uta śaśvat abhadra vṛttāḥ

original: ahaṃ mahendro nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ somo 'gnirīśaḥ pavano 'rko viriñcaḥ /
analyzed: aham mahā indraḥ nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ somaḥ gniḥ īśaḥ pavanaḥ rkaḥ viriñcaḥ

original: ādityaviśve vasavo 'tha sādhyā marudgaṇā rudragaṇāḥ sasiddhāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.56 //
analyzed: āditya viśve vasavaḥ tha sādhyāḥ marut gaṇāḥ rudra gaṇāḥ sa siddhāḥ
anye ca ye viśvasṛjaḥ mara īśāḥ bhṛgu ādayo spṛṣṭa rajaḥ tamaskāḥ

original: yasyehitaṃ na viduḥ spṛṣṭṛmāyāḥ sattvapradhānā api kiṃ tato 'nye // MAnuv_3,4.57 //
analyzed: yasya īhitam na viduḥ spṛṣṭṛ māyāḥ sattva pradhānāḥ api kim tatas nye
savarsī ādau smṛtaḥ brahmā tasmāt devāt anantaraḥ
jānāti deva pravaram bhūyas ca atas dhikam nṛpa
na tvām atiśayiṣyanti muktau api kathañcana
mad bhakti yogāt jñānāt ca sarvān atiśayiṣyasi
yathā bhakti viśeṣaḥ tra dṛśyate puruṣottame
tathā mukti viśeṣaḥ pi jñāninām liṅga bhedane
sāyujyam samanuprāptāḥ api deva ādayaḥ khilāḥ

original: tāratamyāddhi tiṣṭhanti tāratamyaṃ hi sādhane // MAnuv_3,4.61 //
analyzed: tāratamyāt hi tiṣṭhanti tāratamyam hi sādhane
manuṣyāṇām sahasreṣu kaścid yatati siddhaye

original: yatatāmapi siddhānāṃ kaścinmāṃ vetti tattvataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.62 //
analyzed: yatatām api siddhānām kaścid mām vetti tattvataḥ
yaḥ imam paramam guhyam mad bhakteṣu abhidhāsyati

original: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā māmevaiṣyatyasaṃśayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.63 //
analyzed: bhaktim mayi parām kṛtvā mām eva eṣyati asaṃśayaḥ
na ca tasmāt manuṣyeṣu kaścid me priya kṛttamaḥ

original: bhavitā na ca me tasmādanyaḥ priyataro bhuvi // MAnuv_3,4.64 //
analyzed: bhavitā na ca me tasmāt anyaḥ priyataraḥ bhuvi

original: adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādamāvayoḥ /
analyzed: adhyeṣyate ca yaḥ imam dharmyam saṃvādam āvayoḥ

original: jñānayajñena tenāhamiṣṭaḥ syāmiti me matiḥ // MAnuv_3,4.65 //
analyzed: jñāna yajñena tena aham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ
śraddhāvān anasūyuḥ ca śṛṇuyāt api yaḥ naraḥ

original: so 'pi muktaḥ śubhān lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām // MAnuv_3,4.66 //
analyzed: saḥ pi muktaḥ śubhān lokān prāpnuyāt puṇya karmaṇām
dhyānena ātmani paśyanti kecid ātmānam ātmanā

original: anye sāṅkhayena yogena karmayogena cāpare // MAnuv_3,4.67 //
analyzed: anye sāṅkhayena yogena karma yogena ca apare
anye tu evam a jānantaḥ śrutvā anyebhyaḥ upāsate
te ca atitaranti eva mṛtyum śruti parāyaṇāḥ
su sūkṣmaiḥ api aśeṣaiḥ ca viśeṣaiḥ saha paśyati

original: svātmānaṃ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvarūpo 'pi sarvadā // MAnuv_3,4.69 //
analyzed: sva ātmānam bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarva rūpaḥ sarvadā

original: savartra cānyadapyevaṃ tenādṛṣṭaṃ na hi kvacit /
analyzed: ca anyat api evam tena adṛṣṭam na hi kvacid

original: sarvatra sarvadaiveśaṃ paśyatyeva ramāpi tu // MAnuv_3,4.70 //
analyzed: sarvatra sarva daiva īśam paśyati eva ramā api tu
na tu sarvaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ tam paśyanti api anyatas dhikam
sva ātmānam anyat ca aśeṣam paśyati eva hi sarvadā

original: natu sarveṣu kāleṣu tathā paśyatyamuktigaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.72 //
analyzed: na tu sarveṣu kāleṣu tathā paśyati amukti gaḥ

original: muktastu sarvadā paśyet sarvagatvena cāpi tu /
analyzed: muktaḥ tu sarvadā paśyet sarvaga tvena ca api tu

original: na ramāvad viśeṣāṇāṃ darśanaṃ śaknuyāt kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.73 //
analyzed: na ramāvat viśeṣāṇām darśanam śaknuyāt kvacid
sva ātmānam anyat ca sadā viśeṣaiḥ akhilaiḥ api
paśyanti añjas tathā vāṇī viśoṣān tāvataḥ na tu

original: traiguṇyāt parataḥ paśyed vyāptaṃ śataguṇaṃ harim // MAnuv_3,4.74 //
analyzed: traiguṇyāt paratas paśyet vyāptam śataguṇam harim
giriśaḥ garuḍaḥ ca eva tamaḥ mātra gatam harim

original: paśyed viśeṣānapi hi vāṇīdṛṣṭān na paśyati // MAnuv_3,4.75 //
analyzed: paśyet viśeṣān api hi vāṇī dṛṣṭān na paśyati

original: umā suparṇī ca mahattattvaṃ yāvat prapaśyati /
analyzed: umā suparṇī ca mahat tattvam yāvat prapaśyati

original: rudradṛṣṭān viśeṣāṃśca naiva paśyet kadācana // MAnuv_3,4.76 //
analyzed: rudra dṛṣṭān viśeṣān ca na eva paśyet kadācana
sva rūpam anya rūpam ca muktāḥ devāḥ samastaśas
jānanti indraḥ ca kāmaḥ ca brahma yāvat ahaṅkṛtiḥ
paśyantaḥ manu dakṣa ādyāḥ buddhi tattva sthitam harim

original: paśyanti somasūryau tu manasthaṃ parameśvaram // MAnuv_3,4.78 //
analyzed: paśyanti soma sūryau tu mana stham parameśvaram

original: anye bhūtasthitaṃ viṣṇuṃ devāḥ paśyanti sarvadā /
analyzed: anye bhūta sthitam viṣṇum devāḥ paśyanti sarvadā
bahu sāhasra varṣeṇa mahat tattve kvacid kvacid
anye ca eva yathāyogya maṇḍa antar vartinam harim
śvetadvīpa patim ca eva hṛdi eva anye tu kecana

original: kadācideva tatrāpi kecit paśyanti keśavam // MAnuv_3,4.80 //
analyzed: kadācid eva tatra api kecid paśyanti keśavam
umā yāvat ananta aṃśān pūrva dṛṣṭebhyaḥ eva tu
viśeṣān vāsudevasya paścāt uktāḥ vicakṣate
śakra kāma ādayaḥ ca eva viśeṣān brahmaṇi sthitān
umā ādibhiḥ prabuddhebhyaḥ śata aṃśān eva cakṣate
ityādi veda smṛti ga vacanebhyaḥ yathārthataḥ

original: tāratamyaṃ vimuktānāṃ sādhanānāṃ ca dṛśyate // MAnuv_3,4.83 //
analyzed: tāratamyam vimuktānām sādhanānām ca dṛśyate
sādhya sādhana vairūpyam adṛṣṭam kena kalpyate

original: vaiṣamyaṃ nirghṛṇatvaṃ ca tena syātāṃ parasya ca /
analyzed: vaiṣamyam nirghṛṇa tvam ca tena syātām parasya ca

original: sāpekṣatvāditi ca tau vidyādhīśena vāritau // MAnuv_3,4.84 //
analyzed: sāpekṣa tvāt iti ca tau vidyādhīśena vāritau
tāratamyāt sādhanānām sādhya tādṛś tavam īśataḥ
avaiṣamya ādi hetuḥ syāt sadā eva parameśvare
svātantrye vidyamāne sādhana ādau pareśituḥ
apekṣya anādi vaicitṛyam na doṣaḥ iti tad vacaḥ
na anādi tvāt iti hi uktam upapadyate iti api
apekṣya upāya vaiṣamyam upeyasya tathā sthitiḥ

original: mayā kayā viruddhā syād rājādāvapi dṛśyate // MAnuv_3,4.87 //
analyzed: mayā kayā viruddhā syāt rāja ādau api dṛśyate
tyāgaḥ dṛṣṭasya ca adṛṣṭa kalpanā iti su duṣkarau

original: māyibhyo 'nyena kenāpi tat kimanyaiśca vādibhiḥ // MAnuv_3,4.88 //
analyzed: māyibhyaḥ nyena kena api tat kim anyaiḥ ca vādibhiḥ
tra anugamyante śruta hāni aśruta grahau

original: apyatra māyināṃ liṅge tat ke doṣāstato 'dhikāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.89 //
analyzed: api atra māyinām liṅge tat ke doṣāḥ tatas dhikāḥ
niśśeṣa gata doṣāṇām bahubhiḥ janmabhiḥ punar
syāt āparokṣyam hi hareḥ dveṣa īrṣyā ādiḥ tatas kutas

original: bhaveyuryadi cerṣyādyāḥ sameṣvapi kuto na te /
analyzed: bhaveyuḥ yadi ca īrṣyā ādyāḥ sameṣu api kutas na te
tapyamānāḥ samān dṛṣṭvā dveṣa īrṣyā ādi yutāḥ api

original: dṛśyante bahavo loke doṣā evātra kāraṇam // MAnuv_3,4.91 //
analyzed: dṛśyante bahavaḥ loke doṣāḥ eva atra kāraṇam
yadi nirdoṣa tā tatra kim ādhikyena dūṣyate
yadi anya darśana abhāvāt īrṣyā ādiḥ vinivāryate
adarśanāt arati ādiḥ katham tena nivāryate
brahmaṇaḥ pi aratiḥ dṛṣṭvā pūrvam ekākinaḥ śrutau

original: naiva reme sa caikākī tasamānna ramate kvacit /
analyzed: nā eva reme sa ca ekākī ramate kvacid
dvitīyam aicchat tena asau iti śrutayaḥ ūdire

original: yadīcchā tatra naivāstītyeva tat kalpyate mṛṣā /
analyzed: yadi icchā tatra na evā asti iti eva tat kalpyate mṛṣā
śruti ukta nirdoṣa tā eva kim nā aṅgīkriyate svayam

original: tāratamyaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca śrutamevātihāya tu /
analyzed: tāratamyam ca kāmam ca śrutam eva atihāya tu

original: aśrutā samatā kena kalpyate yuktimāninā // MAnuv_3,4.95 //
analyzed: aśrutā samatā kena kalpyate yukti māninā
kim tat mānam samatve te muktānām upalabhyate
vṛthā ayam āgrahaḥ kena śruta hāni aśruta grahe
mokṣe tāratamya itas cetana tvāt purā yathā

original: ityukta uttaraṃ kiṃ te kalpanāmātravādinaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.97 //
analyzed: iti ukte uttaram kim te kalpanā mātra vādinaḥ
na ca duḥkha ādikam kalpyam nirduḥkha tva śruteḥ balāt
śokam tarati ātma vettā tīrṇaḥ sarvān aduḥkha bhāj
yena ānandyā iva bhavati na śocati kadācana
kilbiṣa spṛt pitu ṣaṇiḥ aram hitaḥ iha īśvaraḥ
yam yam antam abhiprepsuḥ sa saṅkalpāt bhavet iha
ityādi śrutayaḥ mānam nirduḥkha tva ādi sampadi
atas duḥkha ādi anumayā labhyate
tāratamya anumā tena bhavet na ati prasaṅginī
śruti yukti balāt evam tāratamyam vibhāvyate

original: muktāvapi tataḥ ke 'tra virodhaṃ kartumīśate // MAnuv_3,4.102 //
analyzed: muktau api tatas ke tra virodham kartum īśate
anādi yogyatām ca eva kali vāṇī īśvara avadhim
kaḥ nivārayitum śaktaḥ yukta yāgama bala uddhatām
brahmaṇaḥ nyatra ādhikya yuktaḥ kālaḥ vivādavān

original: kālo hyayaṃ yathetyādi mānumāmānino bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.104 //
analyzed: kālaḥ hi ayam yathā ityādi mānumā māninaḥ bhavet
anya śabdaḥ hari śrī sva samebhyaḥ

original: prayukto naiva doṣāya rudrādiṣu ca yuktitaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.105 //
analyzed: prayuktaḥ nā eva doṣāya rudra ādiṣu ca yuktitaḥ

original: uttamatvaṃ tu muktānāmapi na brahmaṇo bhavet /
analyzed: uttama tvam tu muktānām api na brahmaṇaḥ bhavet

original: vyaktiḥ sukhasya tu bhavennatvādhikyaṃ sukhasya ca // MAnuv_3,4.106 //
analyzed: vyaktiḥ sukhasya tu bhavet na tvā ādhikyam sukhasya ca

original: balajñānādhikatvaṃ ca tebhyo hi brahmaṇaḥ sadā /
analyzed: bala jñāna adhika tvam ca tebhyaḥ hi brahmaṇaḥ sadā
ādhikyasya tu anitya tve na kiñcid mānam īyate
śṛṇve vīraḥ ugram ugram damāyan anyam anyam atinenīyamānaḥ

original: edhamānadviḷubhayasya rājā coṣkūyate viśa indro manuṣyān // MAnuv_3,4.108 //
analyzed: rājā coṣkūyate viśaḥ indraḥ manuṣyān

original: parā pūrveṣāṃ sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇo aparebhireti /
analyzed: parā pūrveṣām sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇaḥ aparebhiḥ eti
anānubhūtīḥ avadhūnvānaḥ pūrvīḥ indraḥ śaradaḥ tartarīti

original: divedive sadṛśīranyamardhaṃ kṛṣṇā asedhadapa sadmano jāḥ /
analyzed: dive dive sadṛśīḥ anyam ardham kṛṣṇāḥ asedhat apa sadmanaḥ jāḥ

original: ahan dāsā vṛṣabho vasnayantodavraje varcinaṃ śambaraṃ ca // MAnuv_3,4.110 //
analyzed: ahan dāsā vṛṣabhaḥ vasnayantā udavraje varcinam śambaram ca

original: taṃ bhūtiriti devā upāsāñcakrire te babhūvustasmāddhāpyetarhi supto bhūbhrūrityeva praśvasityabhūtirityasurāste ha parābabhūvuḥ // MAnuv_3,4.111
analyzed: tam bhūtiḥ iti devāḥ upāsāñcakrire te babhūvuḥ tasmāt ha api etarhi suptaḥ bhūbhrūḥ iti eva praśvasiti abhūtiḥ iti asurāḥ te ha parābabhūvuḥ

original: tad yathā peśaskarī peśaso mātrāmapādāyānyannavataraṃ kalyāṇataraṃ rūpaṃ tanuta evamevāyamātmedaṃ
analyzed: tat yathā peśaskarī peśasaḥ mātrām apādāya anyat navataram kalyāṇataram rūpam tanute evam eva ayam ātmā idam

original: śarīraṃ nihatyāvidyāṃ gamayitavānyannavataraṃ kalyāṇataraṃ rūpaṃ kurute pitṛyaṃ pitṛyaṃ
analyzed: śarīram nihatya avidyām gamayitavān yannavataram kalyāṇataram rūpam kurute pitṛyam pitṛyam

original: vā gāndharvaṃ vā daivaṃ vā prājāpatyaṃ vā brāhmaṃ vānyeṣāṃ vā bhūtānām // MAnuv_3,4.112 //
analyzed: vā gāndharvam vā daivam vā prājāpatyam vā brāhmam vā anyeṣām vā bhūtānām
prayānti paramām siddhim aihika āmuṣmikīm drutam
yā na prāpya asuraiḥ sarvaiḥ akṣayā kleśa varjitā

original: na tāṃ gatiṃ prapadyante vinā bhāgavatān narān // MAnuv_3,4.113 //
analyzed: na tām gatim prapadyante vinā bhāgavatān narān
avajānanti mām mūḍhāḥ mānuṣīm tanum āśritam
param bhāvam a jānantaḥ mama bhūta maheśvaram

original: rākṣasīmāsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohanīṃ śritāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.115 //
analyzed: rākṣasīm āsurīm ca eva prakṛtim mohanīm śritāḥ
mahātmānaḥ tu mām pārtha daivīm prakṛtim āśritāḥ
bhajanti an anya manasaḥ jñātvā bhūtādim avyayam
abhayam sattva saṃśuddhiḥ jñāna yoga vyavasthitiḥ

original: dānaṃ damaśca yajñaśca svādhyāyastapa ārjavam // MAnuv_3,4.117 //
analyzed: dānam damaḥ ca yajñaḥ ca svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ ārjavam
ahiṃsā satyam akrodhaḥ tyāgaḥ śāntiḥ apaiśunam
dayā mārdavam hrīḥ acāpalam
tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adrohaḥ na atimāni tā
bhavanti sampadam daivīm abhijātasya bhārata
ḍambhaḥ krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca
ajñānam ca abhijātasya pārtha sampadam āsurīm
mām ātma para deheṣu pradviṣantaḥ bhyasūyakāḥ
tān aham dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu nara adhamān
kṣipāmi ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣu eva yoniṣu
āsurīm yonim āpannāḥ mūḍhāḥ janmani janmani

original: māmaprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yāntyadhamāṃ gatim // MAnuv_3,4.122 //
analyzed: mām a prāpya eva kaunteya tatas yānti adhamām gatim

original: dvividho bhūtasargo 'tra daiva āsura eva ca /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ daivaḥ āsuraḥ eva ca
viṣṇu bhakti paraḥ daivaḥ viparītaḥ tathā āsuraḥ

original: devānāṃ paramo dharmaḥ sadā yajñādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: devānām paramaḥ dharmaḥ sadā yajña ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
svādhyāyaḥ tattva vedi tvam viṣṇu pūjā ratiḥ smṛtiḥ
daityānām bāhuṣāḷi tvam mātsaryam yuddha satkriyā
nīti śāstra pravedi tvam śiva pūjā ratiḥ smṛtiḥ
varṇa āśrama ācāravat tvam svādhyāyaḥ bhaktiḥ acyute

original: śive sūrye tathā devyāṃ svabhāvo mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.126 //
analyzed: śive sūrye tathā devyām svabhāvaḥ mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
anādi vaiṣṇavāḥ eva devatāḥ tu svabhāvataḥ
viparītāḥ tatas daityāḥ sadā eva anādi kālataḥ
mānuṣāḥ miśra matayaḥ vimiśra gatayaḥ pi ca
ityādi vākya sandarbhe jñāyate na ādi yogyatā
yadi anādiḥ viśeṣaḥ na sāmpratam katham eva saḥ
adṛṣṭāt eva ca adṛṣṭam svīkṛtam savarvādibhiḥ
ākasmikaḥ viśeṣaḥ ced adṛṣṭe kvacid iṣyate
sarvatra ākasmika tvam syāt na adṛṣṭa apekṣa tā bhavet

original: adṛṣṭāśced viśeṣo 'yamanāditvaṃ kuto na tat // MAnuv_3,4.130 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭāḥ ced viśeṣaḥ yama nādi tvam kutas na tat
na ca anya bheda vat viṣṇau bhedaḥ tad darśinām api
dṛśyate pratyabhijñā eva bahu rūpeṣu dṛśyate

original: bahutvaṃ ca viśeṣeṇa na bhedena kathañcana /
analyzed: bahu tvam ca viśeṣeṇa na bhedena kathañcana

original: pratyabhijñā ca yeṣāṃ na te 'pi tanmuṣyadṛṣṭayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.132 //
analyzed: pratyabhijñā ca yeṣām na te tad muṣya dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: bhedaṃ naiva prapaśyanti bhedamanyebhya eva ca /
analyzed: bhedam nā eva prapaśyanti bhedam anyebhyaḥ eva ca
paśyanti evam hariḥ teṣām sandarśayati nā anyathā
evam bṛhatsaṃhitāyām vacanam na purāṇa gam
loka darśana vādī eva veda rodhāya śaknuyāt
a parīkṣita dṛṣṭiḥ ca parīkṣā pūrva darśanam
niṣeddhum śaknuvādi eva veda rodhāya śaknuyāt
na ca niścita bhedasya darśane sti purāṇa gam

original: vākyaṃ kvaciddhi sammugdhadarśanaṃ tatra gamyate // MAnuv_3,4.136 //
analyzed: vākyam kvacid hi sammugdha darśanam tatra gamyate
aparīkṣitam eva atra vedha ādikam adhīśituḥ

original: parīkṣādarśane naiva dṛśyate kenacit kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.137 //
analyzed: parīkṣā darśane nā eva dṛśyate kenacid kvacid
nirdoṣam eva tam brahmā dadarśa aśeṣa rūpiṇam

original: nirdoṣameva rudro 'drāṅ nirdoṣaṃ taṃ purandaraḥ // MAnuv_3,4.138 //
analyzed: nirdoṣam eva rudraḥ drāk nirdoṣam tam purandaraḥ
nirdoṣāṇi asya rūpāṇi dṛṣṭāni evam sura uttamaiḥ
anye sa doṣāḥ sarve nirdoṣaḥ hariḥ ekalaḥ

original: iti barkuśruteścaiva sadoṣaṃ nāsya darśanam // MAnuv_3,4.139 //
analyzed: iti barku śruteḥ ca eva sa doṣam na asya darśanam
a viddhaḥ viddha vat viṣṇuḥ a jātaḥ jāta vat mṛṣā
abaddhaḥ baddha vat ca eva darśayati amita dyutiḥ

original: iti paiṅgiśrutiścaiva prāha nirdoṣatāṃ hareḥ // MAnuv_3,4.140 //
analyzed: iti paiṅgi śrutiḥ ca eva prāha nirdoṣa tām hareḥ
aparīkṣita dṛṣṭayā eva sa doṣaḥ dṛśyate hariḥ

original: parīkṣādarśane naiva dṛśyo doṣo hareḥ kvacit /
analyzed: parīkṣā darśane nā eva dṛśyaḥ doṣaḥ hareḥ kvacid

original: iti paiṅgiśrutiścāha pramāṇaṃ hi parīkṣitam // MAnuv_3,4.141 //
analyzed: iti paiṅgi śrutiḥ ca āha pramāṇam hi parīkṣitam
na parīkṣā anavasthā syāt sākṣi siddhe tu asaṃśayāt
mānase darśane doṣāḥ syuḥ na vai sākṣi darśane

original: sudṛḍho nirṇayo yatra jñeyaṃ tat sākṣidarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.142 //
analyzed: su dṛḍhaḥ nirṇayaḥ yatra jñeyam tat sākṣi darśanam
icchā jñānam sukham duḥkha bhaya abhaya kṛpā ādayaḥ

original: sākṣisiddhā na kaściddhi tatra saṃśayavān kvacit /
analyzed: sākṣi siddhāḥ na kaścid hi tatra saṃśayavān kvacid

original: yat kvacid vyabhicārī syād darśanaṃ mānasaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.143 //
analyzed: yat kvacid vyabhicārī syāt darśanam mānasam hi tat
manaḥ cakṣuḥ darśana ādeḥ api yatra eva sākṣiṇā

original: prāmāṇyaṃ sugṛhītaṃ syāt tat parīkṣitadarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.144 //
analyzed: prāmāṇyam su gṛhītam syāt tat parīkṣita darśanam
na jñāna dṛṣṭi mātreṇa prāmāṇyam tasya dṛśyate
niyamena sukha ādyeṣu prāmāṇyam sākṣi gocaram
sva prāmāṇyam sadā sākṣī paśyati eva su niścayāt
jñānasya grāhakeṇa eva sākṣiṇā māna tā miteḥ
doṣa abhāve pramāṇa tvam doṣa abhāvasya sākṣiṇā
niścita tvam kvacid ca eva svatas prāmāṇyam iṣyate

original: ato na sarvamānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: atas na sarva mānānām prāmāṇyam niścitam bhavet

original: sākṣiṇā niścitaṃ yatra tat prāmāṇyasvalakṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,4.148 //
analyzed: sākṣiṇā niścitam yatra tat prāmāṇya sva lakṣaṇam

original: na hi kaścit sukhādyeṣu saṃśayaṃ kurute janaḥ /
analyzed: na hi kaścid sukha ādyeṣu saṃśayam kurute janaḥ
na ca eva akhila mānāni niścinoti akhilaḥ janaḥ
tasmāt anubhava ārūḍham kimartham upalapyate

original: doṣābhāvādikaṃ caiva sākṣī samyak prapaśyati // MAnuv_3,4.150 //
analyzed: doṣa abhāva ādikam ca eva sākṣī samyak prapaśyati

original: tat parīkṣitamānena na doṣo viṣṇavi kvacit /
analyzed: tat parīkṣita mānena na doṣaḥ viṣṇavi kvacid
aparīkṣita dṛṣṭiḥ tu kasmin arthe na vidyate
tat pratyakṣa viruddha arthe na āgamasya api māna tā
upajīvyam akṣa jam yatra tat anyatra viparyayaḥ
laukike vyavahāre tra pratyakṣasya upajīvya tā
avatāra ādi daṣṭau syāt āgamasya upajīvya tā

original: āgamena hi viṣṇutvaṃ jñātvā doṣo 'tra kalpyate /
analyzed: āgamena hi viṣṇu tvam jñātvā kalpyate

original: na cet syāt doṣavānanyaḥ śāstrasiddhaṃ hi lakṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,4.154 //
analyzed: na ced syāt doṣavān anyaḥ śāstra siddham hi lakṣaṇam
kasyacid doṣavat tvam syāt iti mātre kṣajam bhavet

original: na viṣṇordeṣavattve hi pratyakṣaṃ vartate svataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.155 //
analyzed: na viṣṇoḥ deṣavat tve hi pratyakṣam vartate svatas
kecid paśyanti doṣān iti atra api syāt na ca akṣajam
paurāṇam vākyam evā atra tad śrutyā eva viruddhayate
purāṇasya upajīvyaḥ ca vedaḥ eva na ca aparaḥ

original: tadvirodhe kathaṃ mānaṃ tat tatra ca bhaviṣyati // MAnuv_3,4.157 //
analyzed: tad virodhe katham mānam tat tatra ca bhaviṣyati
aparīkṣita dṛṣṭiḥ ca katham evā akṣa jam bhavet

original: yadyevaṃ devadattādibhramaḥ kiṃ nākṣajaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.158 //
analyzed: yadi evam devadatta ādi bhramaḥ kim nā akṣa jam bhavet
yāvacchakti parīkṣāyām upajīvyasya bādhane
doṣaḥ na a śodhite doṣaḥ upajīvya tvam asu alam
bhrame sti tad mātram upajīvya hi
bādhaka jñāna vṛttiḥ syāt na ca evam su parīkṣite

original: sarvaṃ tadupajīvyaiva pramāṇaṃ vartate yataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.160 //
analyzed: sarvam tat upajīvya eva pramāṇam vartate yatas
katham brahma iti tat jñeyam sarvajña tva ādi lakṣaṇam

original: vihāya yasmātkasmāccit svarūpasyaiva ced yadi // MAnuv_3,4.161 //
analyzed: vihāya yasmāt kasmāt cit svarūpasya eva ced yadi
upajīvya tvam etasmāt vyāvṛttam yāvatā bhavet
tāvatā eva upajīvya tvam svarapasya eva na kvacid
sarva lakṣaṇa yuktam tu svarūpam yadi bhaṇyate

original: astu no naiva hāniḥ syāt svapakṣaścāyamañjasā // MAnuv_3,4.163 //
analyzed: astu naḥ nā eva hāniḥ syāt sva pakṣaḥ ca ayam añjasā
yasmāt anvitaḥ eva arthaḥ śabdānām api sarvaśas
viśeṣa sāmanya tayā svarūpam akhilam bhavet
purovarti tva pūrvāṇi devadatta ādika bhrame

original: vyāvartayanti tadrūpaṃ caitramātrad vinaiva hi // MAnuv_3,4.165 //
analyzed: vyāvartayanti tad rūpam vinā eva hi
brahmaṇaḥ nirviśeṣa tvāt vyāvartayati kim punar
yasmāt kasmāccid api arthāt tāvat ced siddha sādhanam
cit mātra tvam ca na eva iṣyam aviśeṣa tva vādinaḥ

original: tāvanmātraṃ yadīṣyaṃ syāt sarvajñatvaṃ kuto na tat // MAnuv_3,4.167 //
analyzed: tāvanmātram yadi iṣyam syāt sarvajña tvam kutas na tat
cit mātra abheda sādhye siddham tat prativādinaḥ
sva abheda aṅgīkṛteḥ eva cit tvam svasya api yat matam
sarva apekṣa tayā sarvajña tvam iti eva tat na hi

original: iti ceccetanatvaṃ ca jñatvaṃ na jñeyavarjitam // MAnuv_3,4.169 //
analyzed: iti ced cetana tvam ca jña tvam na jñeya varjitam
sva jñeya tvam ca nā eva asau manyate sa viśeṣataḥ
sva śabdaḥ pi para apekṣaḥ tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva hi

original: svaśabdārtha iti proktaḥ svarūpaṃ nāma kiṃ na cet // MAnuv_3,4.170 //
analyzed: sva śabda arthaḥ iti proktaḥ svarūpam nāma kim na ced
rūpa śabdena pūrṇa tvāt tat ca sāmānya tā vacaḥ

original: na svarūpābhidhāyi syād vaiyarthyaṃ svaravasya yat // MAnuv_3,4.171 //
analyzed: na sva rūpa abhidhāyi syāt vaiyarthyam sva ravasya yat
cetanasya svabhāvaḥ hi caitanyam iti gīyate
tasmāt viśeṣa bāhulyam caitanyasya viśeṣataḥ

original: na jñeyajñātṛhīnaṃ hi jñānaṃ nāma kvacid bhavet /
analyzed: na jñeya jñātṛ hīnam hi jñānam nāma kvacid bhavet

original: jñeyajñānavihīnaśca jña ityatra ca na pramā // MAnuv_3,4.173 //
analyzed: jñeya jñāna vihīnaḥ ca jñaḥ iti atra ca na pramā
jñātṛ jñeya vihīnam ca jñānam ced bhoktṛ bhojyataḥ

original: hīnaṃ bhojanameva syāt tāḍanaṃ kartṛtāḍyataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.174 //
analyzed: hīnam bhojanam eva syāt tāḍanam kartṛ tāḍyataḥ
nitya tvāt tādṛśam ca syāt iti ced nitya vāc api

original: vācyavaktṛvihīnā syānnahi sā caiva tādṛśī // MAnuv_3,4.175 //
analyzed: vācya vaktṛ vihīnā syāt na hi sā ca eva tādṛśī

original: draṣṭāro vedavāco hi santi vācyāni cāñjasā /
analyzed: draṣṭāraḥ veda vācaḥ hi santi vācyāni ca añjasā

original: nityo draṣṭā ca vācyaśca bhagavāneva ca svayam // MAnuv_3,4.176 //
analyzed: nityaḥ draṣṭā ca vācyaḥ ca bhagavān eva ca svayam

original: na hi vaktṛvihīnā ca vācyahīnāpi vāk kvacit /
analyzed: na hi vaktṛ vihīnā ca vācya hīnā api vāc kvacid

original: jñātṛjñeyavihīnaṃ ca jñānamevaṃ na tad bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.177 //
analyzed: jñātṛ jñeya vihīnam ca jñānam evam na tat bhavet
na hi vaktā asti vākya vācya vivarjitaḥ
jñāna jñeya vihīnaḥ ca pi evam na eva vidyate
kiñca sarva vilopaḥ ca kena mānena gamyate

original: sarveṇa saha tad vākyāmarthaśca yadi gṛhyate /
analyzed: sarveṇa saha tat vākyām arthaḥ ca yadi gṛhyate

original: tadabhāvena sarvasya nāpalāpo bhavet tadā // MAnuv_3,4.179 //
analyzed: tad abhāvena sarvasya na apalāpaḥ bhavet tadā

original: na gṛhyate ced tannyāyādapalāpo na hi kvacit /
analyzed: na gṛhyate ced tad nyāyāt apalāpaḥ na hi kvacid
upapatti vihīnasya vākyasya arthaḥ na gamyate
upakrama ādi liṅgānām balīyaḥ hi uttarottaram
śruti ādau pūrva pūrvam ca brahma tarka vinirṇayāt
pratyakṣam upapattiḥ ca bahavaḥ ca āgamāḥ yadā
viruddha yante na ca arthaḥ sti yatra liṅga virodhi tā
saḥ eva arthaḥ katham grāhyaḥ upapanne virodhinī

original: mukhyārthe vidyamāne tu kva sāvarjñyaṃ niṣiddhayate // MAnuv_3,4.183 //
analyzed: mukhya arthe vidyamāne tu kva sāvarjñyam
atas sarva guṇaiḥ yuktam brahma aṅgīkā yarma eva hi

original: apalāpo 'pi sarvasya na kathañcana yujyate // MAnuv_3,4.184 //
analyzed: apalāpaḥ pi sarvasya na kathañcana yujyate
anādi yogyatā ca uktā tena grāhyā eva sarvathā

original: muktānāṃ tāratamyaṃ ca mānairuktairna cālyate // MAnuv_3,4.185 //
analyzed: muktānām tāratamyam ca mānaiḥ uktaiḥ na cālyate

original: jñānino 'pi yato nityaṃ kurvanti śubhameva hi /
analyzed: jñāninaḥ yatas nityam kurvanti śubham eva hi

original: tāratamyaṃ tu muktau ca tenaivādhyavasīyate // MAnuv_3,4.186 //
analyzed: tāratamyam tu muktau ca tena eva adhyavasīyate

original: tāratamyaṃ na cenmuktau kutaḥ kuryuḥ śubhaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: tāratamyam na ced muktau kutas kuryuḥ śubham punar

original: kṛcchreṇāpi tapo jñānaṃ karmāpyete caranti hi // MAnuv_3,4.187 //
analyzed: kṛcchreṇa api tapaḥ jñānam karma api ete caranti hi
bibhyati sma aśubhāt nityam sa kāmāḥ ca śubhe sadā
na ca svabhāvaḥ eva ayam bhaya pūrva pravṛttitaḥ
kṛcchreṇa ācaraṇāt ca eva śubhasya eva punar punar
svabhāvaḥ ced ajñasya api bhavet tathā

original: phalavattve pramāṇaṃ cet tatra jñasya samaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.189 //
analyzed: phalavat tve pramāṇam ced tatra jñasya samam hi tat
niṣkāmam jñāna pūrvam ca nivṛttam iha ca ucyate
nivṛttam sevamānaḥ tu brahma abhyeti sanātanam
syāt ghrāsaḥ ca eva aśubhena hi

original: jñānino 'pi yatastena kartavyaṃ śubhameva taiḥ // MAnuv_3,4.191 //
analyzed: yatas tena kartavyam śubham eva taiḥ

original: upāste sa ya ātmānaṃ kṣīyate nāsya karma ha /
analyzed: upāste sa yaḥ ātmānam kṣīyate na asya karma ha

original: asmāddhayevātmano yadyat kāmayet sṛjate ca tat // MAnuv_3,4.192 //
analyzed: asmāt ha yā iva ātmanaḥ yat yat kāmayet sṛjate ca tat
a vidvān bahu karmā api hi antavat phalam āpnuyāt
yat eva vidyayā kuryāt tat eva hi ati vīryavat
ityādi vākya sāmarthyāt tāratamyam vimukti gam
na ca atra upāsakasya eva phalam akṣayam ucyate

original: na hi jñānaṃ vinā kvāpi phalasyākṣayatā bhavet /
analyzed: na hi jñānam vinā kvāpi phalasya akṣaya tā bhavet
jñāna dvāreṇa ced tasya na asmad pakṣa pratīpa tā
jñāna uttarasya evam api hi akṣaya tvam na ca anyathā
pūrva bhāvi śubhānām hi jñānena eva kṛtārtha tā
prārabdhānām tu bhogena tad jñāna uttara karmaṇām
muktau anupraveśaḥ syāt anyathā tad kṛtiḥ na hi
jñānāt pūrvāṇi sarvāṇi śubhāni jñāna siddhaye
akāmyāni niṣiddhāni jñāna rodhāya bhuktaye
yogya tāyāḥ balāt yat ca śubha bāhulyam āditas
jñāna bāhulyam eva etat kuryāt na anyasya kāraṇam
jñānasya bhakti bhāga tvāt bhaktiḥ jñānam iti īryate
jñānasya eva viśeṣaḥ yat bhaktiḥ iti abhidhīyate
parokṣa tva aparokṣa tve viśeṣau jñāna gau yathā

original: snehayogo 'pi tadvat syād viśeṣo jñānagocaraḥ // MAnuv_3,4.200 //
analyzed: sneha yogaḥ pi tadvat syāt viśeṣaḥ jñāna gocaraḥ
ityā abhiprāyataḥ prāyas jñānam eva vimuktaye

original: vadanti śrutayaḥ so 'yaṃ viśeṣo 'pi hyudīryate // MAnuv_3,4.201 //
analyzed: vadanti śrutayaḥ saḥ yam hi udīryate

original: bhaktirjñānamiti kvāpi na hi dveṣayutā dṛśiḥ /
analyzed: bhaktiḥ jñānam iti kvāpi na hi dveṣa yutā dṛśiḥ
puruṣa arthāya bhavati sarva śruti virodhataḥ

original: cetanasya dvayaṃ bhogyaṃ saṃsāro muktireva ca /
analyzed: cetanasya dvayam bhogyam saṃsāraḥ muktiḥ eva ca
saṃsāraḥ trividhaḥ tatra svargaḥ madhyam adhas tathā

original: muktiśca dvividhā tatra sukhaṃ nityaṃ tathāparam /
analyzed: muktiḥ ca dvividhā tatra sukham nityam tathā aparam
nitya duḥkham iti jñeyam sādhanam saṃsṛtau api

original: kāmyaṃ karma niṣiddhaṃ ca sājñānamiti niścayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.204 //
analyzed: kāmyam karma niṣiddham ca sa ajñānam iti niścayaḥ
dveṣaḥ bhaktiḥ ca muktau tu mukti dvaya vidhāyakam
iti paiṅgi śruteḥ dveṣaḥ nā eva sat mukti kāraṇam
asat mukteḥ kāraṇam ca muktau iti atra keśavaḥ

original: muktiśabdodito mokṣaṃ svabhaktānāṃ karoti yat // MAnuv_3,4.206 //
analyzed: mukti śabda uditaḥ mokṣam sva bhaktānām karoti yat
vimuktiḥ ced mahā tātparya rodhanam
bhaktayā prasannataḥ devāt muktiḥ iti eva tad guṇān

original: vadanti śrutayaḥ sarvāḥ purāṇānyāgamā api // MAnuv_3,4.207 //
analyzed: vadanti śrutayaḥ sarvāḥ purāṇāni āgamāḥ api

original: yadi dveṣeṇa muktiḥ syād vaktavyo doṣasañcayaḥ /
analyzed: yadi dveṣeṇa muktiḥ syāt vaktavyaḥ doṣa sañcayaḥ
smartavyaḥ bhagavān nityam iti arthena eva hi kvacid
dveṣāt iva guṇān āha purāṇe kruddha vākya vat
yathā kruddhaḥ pitā putram mara iti ākṣepa pūrvakam
proktasya anyasya kṛti artham vadati evam purāṇa gam
vākyam śruti virodhena sva virodhena ca añjasā
bahu āgama virodhāt ca na dveṣāt mukti vācakam

original: tamo dveṣeṇa saṃyānti bhaktayā muktiṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: tamaḥ dveṣeṇa saṃyānti bhaktayā muktim tathā eva ca
viṣṇau viṣṇu prasādena viloma tvena ca añjasā
iti ṣāḍguṇya vacanam api ukta artha niyāmakam
mahā tātparya rodhe ca katham vākyam pramāṇa tām
yāti sarva artha rūpam hi mahā tātparyam iṣyate

original: vācakatvaṃ hi tātparyaṃ yadarthā akhilā ravāḥ /
analyzed: vācaka tvam hi tātparyam yad arthāḥ akhilāḥ ravāḥ
saḥ ṛthaḥ katham parityājyaḥ eka śabdasya saṃśaye

original: ato vijñānabhaktibhyāṃ puruṣārthaḥ paro bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.213 //
analyzed: atas vijñāna bhaktibhyām puruṣa arthaḥ paraḥ bhavet

original: yasya deve parā bhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau /
analyzed: yasya deve parā bhaktiḥ yathā deve tathā gurau

original: tasyaite kathitā hyarthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.214 //
analyzed: tasya ete kathitāḥ hi arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ

original: bhaktyā jñānaṃ tato bhaktistato dṛṣṭistataśca sā /
analyzed: bhaktyā jñānam tatas bhaktiḥ tatas dṛṣṭiḥ tatas ca sā

original: tato muktistato bhaktiḥ saiva syāt sukharūpiṇī // MAnuv_3,4.215//
analyzed: tatas muktiḥ tatas bhaktiḥ sā eva syāt sukha rūpiṇī
bhaktayā prasannaḥ bhagavān dadyāt jñānam an ākulam
tayā eva darśanam yātaḥ pradadyāt muktim etayā

original: nāhaṃ vedairna tapasā na dānena nacejyayā /
analyzed: na aham vedaiḥ na tapasā na dānena na ca ijyayā
śakyaḥ evaṃvidhaḥ draṣṭum pradadyāt muktim etayā
bhaktayā tu ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidhaḥ rjuna

original: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣyuṃ ca parantapa // MAnuv_3,4.218 //
analyzed: jñātum draṣṭum ca tattvena praveṣyum ca parantapa
ityādi vākyataḥ ca eva saḥ yam ukta arthaḥ īyate

original: na ca prasādamāpnoti dveṣād bhaktyā tamāpnuyāt /
analyzed: na ca prasādam āpnoti dveṣāt bhaktyā tam āpnuyāt
iti dṛṣṭa anusāri tvam api asmin arthe īyate

original: ye pṛthag vihitā viṣṇorguṇā vedena sādaram /
analyzed: ye pṛthak vihitāḥ viṣṇoḥ guṇāḥ vedena sādaram
te eva dṛṣṭa vailomyāt aṅgīkāryāḥ na ca aparam
anyat dṛṣṭa anusāreṇa vāsudeve gṛhyate

original: doṣābhāvāśca ye vedairuditā avihāya tān // MAnuv_3,4.221 //
analyzed: doṣa abhāvāḥ ca ye vedaiḥ uditāḥ a vihāya tān
anuktāḥ api ca grāhyāḥ mahā tātparya śaktitaḥ

original: evaṃ bṛhatsaṃhitāvāk siddhānto hi tadīritaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.222 //
analyzed: evam bṛhat saṃhitā vāc siddhāntaḥ hi tad īritaḥ
tāratamyena tad bhakteṣu api bhaktiḥ viniścayāt
kartavyā eṣā api tad bhaktiḥ loka veda anusārataḥ

original: yo hi bhaktaḥ pradhāne syāt tadīyeṣvapi bhaktimān /
analyzed: yaḥ hi bhaktaḥ pradhāne syāt tadīyeṣu api bhaktimān
dṛśyate sau niyamataḥ viparītaḥ viparyaye
vyabhicāraḥ yadi kvāpi kalpyate

original: bhaktidoṣo hyasau yanna tadbhakteṣvapi bhaktimān // MAnuv_3,4.225 //
analyzed: bhakti doṣaḥ hi asau yat na tad bhakteṣu api bhaktimān
tāratamyena teṣu addhā bhaktiḥ dṛṣṭa anusārataḥ
viṣṇu prasāda anusārāt kāryā doṣaḥ tad anyathā
sva prīti anusṛtau prītiḥ loke dṛśyate
tāratamya parijñānam api etena eva sādhanam
sūrya ādayaḥ ca kramaśas bhagavat prīti gocarāḥ

original: teṣu bhaktiḥ krameṇaiva kāryā nityaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ /
analyzed: teṣu bhaktiḥ krameṇa eva kāryā nityam mumukṣubhiḥ

original: sarve 'pi guravaścaite puruṣasya sadaiva hi // MAnuv_3,4.229 //
analyzed: sarve guravaḥ ca ete puruṣasya sadā eva hi

original: tasmāt pūjyāśca namyāśca dhyeyāśca parito harim /
analyzed: tasmāt pūjyāḥ ca namyāḥ ca dhyeyāḥ ca paritas harim
iti ṣāḍguṇya vacanāt api eṣaḥ rthaḥ vasīyate
hari bhaktiḥ krameṇa eva tadīyeṣu hari smṛtiḥ
hari stutiḥ tad smṛtiḥ ca tad stutiḥ hari pūjanam
tad pūjā vihita tyāgaḥ iti mukteḥ krameṇa hi
niyamāt sādhanāni eva nitya sādhyāni ca akhilaiḥ
iti pravṛtta vacanam sādhanasya vinirṇaye
pravṛtte pañcarātre hi sādhanasya ati niścayaḥ
hari dveṣaḥ na śubha da
sat dveṣa tvāt yathā guroḥ

original: bhaktiryato yathā svasminnityādyā yuktiratra ca // MAnuv_3,4.234 //
analyzed: bhaktiḥ yatas yathā svasmin nitya ādyā yuktiḥ atra ca
prādhānya tāratamya anusāriṇī bhaktiḥ uttamā

original: prītidaiva hareryasmād bhaktiḥ sā svopagā yathā // MAnuv_3,4.235 //
analyzed: prīti dā eva hareḥ yasmāt bhaktiḥ sā sva upagā yathā
iti vā jñāna karma ādi phalam ca eṣu krama upagam

original: svātantryatāratamyena phalaṃ hi phalināṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.236 //
analyzed: svātantrya tāratamyena phalam hi phalinām bhavet
aśubham tu aśubhe pi eṣām svātantryāt prītitaḥ hareḥ

original: ājñayā cānyagaṃ naiva bhogāya bhavati kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.237 //
analyzed: ājñayā ca anya gam nā eva bhogāya bhavati kvacid
puṇyam eva amum āpānoti na devān pāpam āpnuyāt
ityādi śrutayaḥ māna mukte rthe parāḥ
upāsanā dharma phalam yatas deha antare sthitiḥ
vāsudeva ājñayā ca eva pūrva karma anusārataḥ

original: prerayanti hi te jīvān puṇyapāpeṣu nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: prerayanti hi te jīvān puṇya pāpeṣu nityaśas
arāga dveṣataḥ ca eva katham doṣān avāpnuyuḥ
hari ājñā karaṇāt eva puṇyam ebhiḥ avāpyate

original: haripūjeti coddeśāt kathaṃ na śubhamāpnuyuḥ // MAnuv_3,4.241 //
analyzed: hari pūjā iti ca uddeśāt katham na śubham āpnuyuḥ
atas yathākramam dharma jñānayoḥ phalam añjasā
sarva prāṇi gatam devāḥ prāpnuvantyāḥ viriñcataḥ

original: devā eva hi devānāṃ viśiṣṭā viniyāmakāḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ eva hi devānām viśiṣṭāḥ viniyāmakāḥ
brahmā tu akhila devānām narāṇām ca niyāmakaḥ
atas sarva guṇān eṣa prāpanoti adhikam anyatas
dravya svātantrya vijñāna prayatnaiḥ adhikam phalam

original: devānāmanyagaṃ cāpi teṣu yad brahmaṇo hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.244 //
analyzed: devānām anya gam ca api teṣu yat brahmaṇaḥ hi tat
bṛhat tantra uditam vākyam hariṇā phala nirṇaye
loke pi etādṛśa guṇaiḥ phala ādhikyam hi dṛśyate
evam ca kali pūrvāṇām asurāṇām mahat phalam
aśubheṣu sadā eva syāt mithyā jñāna ādikeṣu hi
śubha aśubha phalam devāḥ asurāḥ ca samāpnuyuḥ

original: krameṇaiva yathāśakti yathā ye ye prayojakāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.247 //
analyzed: krameṇa eva yathāśakti yathā ye ye prayojakāḥ

original: prerakā api pāpānāṃ na devāḥ pāpamāpnuyuḥ /
analyzed: prerakāḥ api pāpānām na devāḥ pāpam āpnuyuḥ

original: iti prakāśikāyāṃ hi provāca harirañjasā // MAnuv_3,4.248 //
analyzed: iti prakāśikāyām hi provāca hariḥ añjasā

original: yadyapyevaṃ surāṇāṃ ca daityānāṃ ca mahat phalam /
analyzed: yadi api evam surāṇām ca daityānām ca mahat phalam

original: śubhāśubhebhya evañca kartuśca syād yathoditam // MAnuv_3,4.249 //
analyzed: śubha aśubhebhyaḥ evam ca kartuḥ ca syāt yathā uditam
tasmāt niraya mānuṣya svarga mukti upabhoginaḥ
mānuṣottamam ārabhya devāḥ tu nirayam vinā
asurāḥ tu vinā muktim tamaḥ ndham api ca āpnuyuḥ

original: iti tattvavivekoktaṃ svayaṃ bhagavatā vacaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.251 //
analyzed: iti tattva viveka uktam svayam bhagavatā vacaḥ
jñāna dāḥ api ca ācāryāḥ viśeṣāt phalam āpnuyuḥ
muktau aṣṭaguṇam śiṣyāt guruḥ āpanoti śobhanam
tad guruḥ dviguṇam tasmāt sārdham tāvat pare

original: devāḥ sahasraguṇitaṃ kramāt tasmād yathottaram // MAnuv_3,4.253 //
analyzed: devāḥ sahasra guṇitam kramāt tasmāt yathottaram
brahmā mahā ogha guṇitam evam phala vinirṇayaḥ
iti āha bhagavān śāstre guruvṛtta abhidhe svayam

original: yuktaṃ ca tanna godātā gomātraphalamāpnuyāt // MAnuv_3,4.254 //
analyzed: yuktam ca tat na go dātā go mātra phalam āpnuyāt
yaḥ imam paramam guhyam mad bhakteṣu abhidhāsyati

original: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā māmevaiṣyatyasaṃśayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.255 //
analyzed: bhaktim mayi parām kṛtvā mām eva eṣyati asaṃśayaḥ
na ca tasmāt manuṣyeṣu kaścid me priya kṛttamaḥ

original: bhavitā na ca me tasmādanyaḥ priyataro bhuvi /
analyzed: bhavitā na ca me tasmāt anyaḥ priyataraḥ bhuvi
iti āha bhagavān evam api pātram apekṣyate
evam eva avirodhena prārabdhasya eva karmaṇaḥ

original: jñānaṃ dṛṣṭaphalaṃ proktaṃ muktiścehaiva labhyate // MAnuv_3,4.257 //
analyzed: jñānam dṛṣṭa phalam proktam muktiḥ ca iha eva labhyate
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
samanvaya avirodhābhyām siddhe vastuni sādhane
vicāriteṣu aśeṣeṣu sādhaneṣu viśeṣataḥ
nityaśas kāryam atyantam avaśyam bhāvi sādhanam
cintyate prathamam tatra śravaṇa ādi sakṛtkriyā
āvṛttiḥ vā iti sandehe kartavyā āvṛttiḥ eva hi
tat tvam asi ityādiḥ hi asakṛt eva yat
liṅgāt lātavyataḥ pūrvam ṛjobarrahmatvataḥ śatāt

original: śuśrāvogratapā nāma yogyo rudrapadasya yaḥ // MAnuv_4,1.4 //
analyzed: śuśrāva ugratapāḥ nāma yogyaḥ rudrapadasya yaḥ

original: sārddhaṃ parārddhaṃ viṣṇostu guṇān bhaktayā sadodyataḥ /
analyzed: sārddham parārddham viṣṇoḥ tu guṇān bhaktayā sadā udyataḥ
tad tri bhāgam upāsām ca cakre sambhṛta mānasaḥ
daśa manvantaram śakra pada yogyaḥ garutmataḥ
pada yogyāt sumanasaḥ sunandaḥ nāma ca aśṛṇot
upāsām cakre udyuktaḥ manvantara catuṣyayam
sūryācandramasoḥ ca eva pada yogyau su tejasau
surūpaḥ śānta rūpaḥ ca manvantara catuṣyayam
a śṛṇvatām sumanasaḥ manvantaram upāsatām
tatas proktāḥ tu te sarve bhaktayā ugra tapaḥ ādayaḥ
apaśyan paramam viṣṇum tad prasāda edhitāḥ sadā

original: ityuktaṃ viṣṇunā sākṣād granthe sattatvasañjñite // MAnuv_4,1.8 //
analyzed: iti uktam viṣṇunā sākṣāt granthe satta tva sañjñite
ātmā iti nāma kathitam sākṣāt nārāyaṇasya hi

original: ātmā brahma mahāṃstāraḥ parameśaḥ śuciśravāḥ // MAnuv_4,1.9 //
analyzed: ātmā brahma mahān tāraḥ parameśaḥ śuciśravāḥ
viṣṇuḥ nārāyaṇaḥ nantaḥ iti śrīpatiḥ īryate
iti piṅga śrutiḥ ca eva tathā eva parama śrutiḥ
om ātmā bhagavān viṣṇuḥ ātmā ānandaḥ kṣaraḥ svarāj
viśvatrātā nṛsiṃhaḥ jaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ urukramaḥ
anasūyā tathā eva atreḥ jajñe putrān akalmaṣān
dattam durvāsasam somam ātma īśa brahma sambhavān
iti bhāgavate ca eva tasmāt ātmā janārdanaḥ

original: tasmādupāsyo viṣṇuriti jñātavyaḥ sajjanaiḥ sadā // MAnuv_4,1.13 //
analyzed: tasmāt upāsyaḥ viṣṇuḥ iti jñātavyaḥ sat janaiḥ sadā
tathā eva upāsate santaḥ tathā eva upadiśanti ca
ādāna artha tvataḥ ca ayam ātma śabdaḥ patim vadet
svāmī me viṣṇuḥ iti eva nityadā upāsyam añjasā
svāmī viṣṇuḥ iti dhyānam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyataḥ
kartavyam sarvathā eva etat na kathaṃcana vismaret
iti sat tattva vacanam ṣāḍguṇya vacanam param

original: mama svāmī harirnityaṃ sarvasya patireva ca /
analyzed: mama svāmī hariḥ nityam sarvasya patiḥ eva ca

original: iti dhyeyaḥ sarvadaiva bhagavān viṣṇuravyayaḥ // MAnuv_4,1.16 //
analyzed: iti dhyeyaḥ sarvadā eva bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ
pratīka viṣaya tvena na kāryā viṣṇu bhāvanā
pratīkam na eva viṣṇuḥ yat mithyā upāsā hi anathardā
yaḥ nyathā santam ātma īśam anyathā pratipadyate

original: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇātmāpahāriṇā // MAnuv_4,1.18 //
analyzed: kim tena na kṛtam pāpam coreṇa ātma apahāriṇā
yaḥ nyathā santam ātmānam anyathā pratipadyate

original: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇeśāpahāriṇā // MAnuv_4,1.19 //
analyzed: kim tena na kṛtam pāpam coreṇa īśa apahāriṇā
yaḥ nyathā eva sthitam viṣṇum anyathā pratipadyate

original: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇa brahmacāriṇā // MAnuv_4,1.20 //
analyzed: kim tena na kṛtam pāpam coreṇa brahmacāriṇā
sva ātmānam pratimām vā api devatā antaram eva vā
cetana acetanam vā anyat dhyāyet yaḥ keśavaḥ tu iti

original: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ cāreṇeśāpahāriṇā // MAnuv_4,1.21 //
analyzed: kim tena na kṛtam pāpam cāreṇa īśa apahāriṇā

original: yo 'nyad viṣṇuriti dhyāyejjānīyād vā hariṃ tathā /
analyzed: yaḥ viṣṇuḥ iti dhyāyet jānīyāt vā harim tathā

original: andhe tamasi majjet sa yatra naivotthitiḥ kvacit // MAnuv_4,1.22 //
analyzed: andhe tamasi majjet sa yatra nā evā utthitiḥ kvacid

original: yo 'nyad viṣṇuriti dhyāyed viṣṇuranyaditi sma vā /
analyzed: yaḥ nyat viṣṇuḥ iti dhyāyet viṣṇuḥ anyat iti sma vā
anyathā dhyāna doṣeṇa mahā tamasi majjati

original: yo 'nyad viṣṇuriti dhyāyed viṣṇuranyaditi sma vā /
analyzed: yaḥ nyat viṣṇuḥ iti dhyāyet viṣṇuḥ anyat iti sma vā

original: mahātamasi magnasya tasya naivotthitiḥ kvacit // MAnuv_4,1.24 //
analyzed: mahā tamasi magnasya tasya nā evā utthitiḥ kvacid
yat kiñcid anyathā saṃstham anyathā dhyātam añjasā

mahā doṣa karam viṣṇuḥ kimu sarva īśvara īśvaraḥ
yat kiñcid anyathā saṃstham anyathā jñātam añjasā
anartha kāraṇam loke kimu sarva īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: na kiñcidanyathā jñeyaṃ dhyeyaṃ vā tena kutracit /
analyzed: na kiñcid anyathā jñeyam dhyeyam vā tena kutracid

original: kimu sarvottamo viṣṇurjñeyo nīcatayā kvacit // MAnuv_4,1.28 //
analyzed: kimu sarva uttamaḥ viṣṇuḥ jñeyaḥ nīcatayā kvacid

original: tasmād vastu yathārūpaṃ jñeyaṃ dhyeyaṃ ca sarvadā /
analyzed: tasmāt vastu yathārūpam jñeyam dhyeyam ca sarvadā

original: kāraṇaṃ puruṣārthasya nānyathā bhavati kvacit // MAnuv_4,1.29 //
analyzed: kāraṇam puruṣa arthasya na anyathā bhavati kvacid
iti śruti purāṇa ukti balataḥ na pratīka tā
dhyeyāḥ viṣṇoḥ kvacid yasmāt mithyā jñānam anartha dam

original: ityabhipretya na hi sa ityāha bhagavān prabhuḥ /
analyzed: iti abhipretya na hi saḥ iti āha bhagavān prabhuḥ
pratīka saṃsthita tvena dhyeyaḥ viṣṇuḥ na ca anyathā

original: brahmeti ca sadā dhyeyo bhagavān viṣṇurañjasā /
analyzed: brahma iti ca sadā dhyeyaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ añjasā

original: utkṛṣṭo brahmaśabdārthaḥ pūrṇatvaṃ brahmatā yataḥ // MAnuv_4,1.32 //
analyzed: utkṛṣṭaḥ brahma śabda arthaḥ pūrṇa tvam brahma tā yatas
ādhi vyādhi nimittena tu
dhyeyā eva brahma tā nityam viṣṇoḥ bhaktayā nirantaram

original: iti prakāśikāyāṃ ca vacanaṃ viṣṇuneritam // MAnuv_4,1.33 //
analyzed: iti prakāśikāyām ca vacanam viṣṇunā īritam
na ātmā iti sūtram īśasya jīva tva pratipādakam

original: ātmaśabdaṃ yato hetuṃ kṛtvā jīvaṃ nyavārayat /
analyzed: ātma śabdam yatas hetum kṛtvā jīvam nyavārayat

original: svaśabdāt prāṇabhṛccaiva nokta ityeva vedarāṭ // MAnuv_4,1.34 //
analyzed: sva śabdāt prāṇabhṛt ca eva na uktaḥ iti eva vedarāj
yadi ātma śabdaḥ jīve katham sa vinivārayet
ātma śabda uditaḥ tasmāt viṣṇuḥ eva na ca aparaḥ
ātma brahma ādayaḥ śabdāḥ tam ṛte viṣṇum avyayam

original: na vadanti yato nāptā kvāpi tairguṇapūrṇatā /
analyzed: na vadanti yatas na āptā kvāpi taiḥ guṇa pūrṇa tā
nārāyaṇa adhyātma gatam iti yat vaiṣṇavam vacaḥ
yadi jīva īśayoḥ vedapatiḥ aikyam ca manyate
ātma śabdam katham tasmāt nivārayati yuktitaḥ

original: bhedasya vyapadeśaṃ ca sthitiṃ cādanameva ca /
analyzed: bhedasya vyapadeśam ca sthitim ca adanam eva ca
bheda dārḍhye hetum āha sa tātparyam jagatpatiḥ
vyāvahārika bhedaḥ ced kva asau avyāvahārikaḥ
vyāvahārikam iti eva vacanam vyāvahārikam

original: uta neti vikalpe tu yadi syād vyāvahārikam /
analyzed: uta nā iti vikalpe tu yadi syāt vyāvahārikam

original: tasyāpi bādhyatā cet syād bhedaḥ syāt pāramārthikaḥ // MAnuv_4,1.40 //
analyzed: tasya api bādhya tā ced syāt bhedaḥ syāt pāramārthikaḥ
avyāvahārika tvam ced bhedaḥ yam satya tām gataḥ
ekasya asatya tāyām hi dvayoḥ eva viruddhayoḥ

original: anyasya satyataiva syāditi kena nivāryate // MAnuv_4,1.41 //
analyzed: anyasya satya tā eva syāt iti kena nivāryate
asatyam na uktam iti ukte satyam uktam iti prajāḥ
jānanti uktam tu no satyam iti ukte satyatām api

original: na svapne 'pi dvayaṃ mithyā tatraikaṃ satyameva hi /
analyzed: na svapne dvayam mithyā tatra ekam satyam eva hi

original: bhāvābhāvāvubhau tatra kathaṃ mithyā bhaviṣyataḥ // MAnuv_4,1.43 //
analyzed: bhāva abhāvau ubhau tatra katham mithyā bhaviṣyataḥ

original: bhāvasya hi niṣedhe tu nābhāvasya niṣedhanam /
analyzed: bhāvasya hi niṣedhe tu na abhāvasya niṣedhanam

original: svavāco 'satyatā cet syāt tasmād bhedasya satyatā // MAnuv_4,1.44 //
analyzed: sva vācaḥ satya tā ced syāt tasmāt bhedasya satya tā
tasmāt jīva īśayoḥ bhedaḥ ukta nyāyena gamyate
etasmāt ātma śabdaḥ yam paramātma abhidhā bhavet
pratīka viṣaya tvena viṣṇu dṛṣṭiḥ na tat bhavet

original: pratīke viṣṇurityeva tasmāt kāryā hyupāsanā // MAnuv_4,1.46 //
analyzed: pratīke viṣṇuḥ iti eva tasmāt kāryā hi upāsanā

original: na ca viṣṇuḥ pratīkaṃ yat tasmānnātmetyupāsanā /
analyzed: na ca viṣṇuḥ pratīkam yat tasmāt na ātmā iti upāsanā
iti pakṣaḥ yadā brahma dṛṣṭiḥ ca atra viruddhayate
sa nā iti yuktiḥ tatra api samā iti ukta viruddha tā
yadi api utkarṣa mātreṇa hi a tad bhave pi upāsanā
utkarṣaḥ ātmanaḥ u pi syāt cetana tvāt acetanāt
na upāsyam iti veda vidaḥ matam
utkarṣāt brahma tā dhyāne yadi syāt phalam añjasā

original: brahmaṇo nīcatādhyānādanarthaḥ kiṃ na jāyate // MAnuv_4,1.49 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ nīca tā dhyānāt anarthaḥ kim na jāyate
acetanasya brahmatva dhyāne tuṣyiḥ na hi kvacid

original: nīcasya svātmatādhyāne kupyati brahma lokavat // MAnuv_4,1.50 //
analyzed: nīcasya svātmatā dhyāne kupyati brahma loka vat
caṇḍālaḥ nṛpaḥ iti ukte nṛpaḥ caṇḍālaḥ iti api

original: ko viśeṣaḥ parijñāte nṛpeṇa syāt kathañcana // MAnuv_4,1.51 //
analyzed: kaḥ viśeṣaḥ parijñāte nṛpeṇa syāt kathañcana
puratas naradevasya caṇḍālaḥ yadi pūjyate

original: rājavat kiṃ na kopaḥ syād rājño loke hi paśyati // MAnuv_4,1.52 //
analyzed: rāja vat kim na kopaḥ syāt rājñaḥ loke hi paśyati

original: rājñastu purataḥ prokte caṇḍālaṃ nṛpa ityapi /
analyzed: rājñaḥ tu puratas prokte caṇḍālam nṛpaḥ iti api

original: ātmānaṃ sa iti proktamitivaddhayeva kupyati // MAnuv_4,1.53 //
analyzed: ātmānam saḥ iti proktam itivat hayā iva kupyati
abhede nā etayoḥ dhyāne kaḥ viśeṣaḥ vacasi api

original: ayaṃ rājā tvamityukte caṇḍāle 'tha nṛpe 'pi ca /
analyzed: ayam rājā tvam iti ukte caṇḍāle nṛpe ca

original: caṇḍāla iti tu prokte samameva hi dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_4,1.54 //
analyzed: caṇḍālaḥ iti tu prokte samam eva hi dūṣaṇam

original: dhyāte tvekasya tadbhāve tadbhāvo 'nyasya kiṃ na tat /

na ca eva tat avijñātam sarvajña brahmaṇā kvacid
tasmāt apeśalam sarvam anyasya brahma tā vacaḥ
tasmāt yathā ukta mārgeṇa brahma upāsyam mumukṣubhiḥ

original: tathopāsyāñjasā dṛṣṭaṃ brahma pāpaṃ ca bhasmasāt /
analyzed: tathā upāsya añjasā dṛṣṭam brahma pāpam ca bhasmasāt
karoti nikhilam pūrvam pāścāttyasya api asaṅga tām
karoti tad dviṣaḥ ca evam puṇya nāśaḥ u pi asaṅga tā
yat eva vidyayā iti atra pūrva uktāt hi viśiṣṭate
pūrvam svarga ādi labdhi artham vīryavat tvena ca uditam

original: karma vidyāyutaṃ paścānmokṣe vīryapradaṃ tviti // MAnuv_4,1.58 //
analyzed: karma vidyā yutam paścāt mokṣe vīrya pradam tu iti

original: tato bhogena puṇyaṃ ca kṣapayitvetarat tathā /
analyzed: tatas bhogena puṇyam ca kṣapayitvā itarat tathā
brahma dviṣ brahma darśī ca tamaḥ mokṣau avāpnutaḥ
brahmāṇam śata kālāt tu pūrvam ārabdha saṅkṣayaḥ
brahmaṇaḥ tu eva tāvat tvam pañcāśat brahmaṇaḥ tathā
rudrasya viṃśat eva syāt indrasya arka ādike daśa
anyeṣām brahma mātrasya tu antaḥ ārabdha saṅkṣayaḥ
brahmaṇā eva saha atas ca param nārāyaṇam vrajet
iti sat tattva vacanam svayam bhagavatā uditam
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne caturtha adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ
devānām ca manuṣyāṇām etāvat samam eva hi

original: utkrāntimārgau devānāṃ na prāyeṇa bhaviṣyataḥ // MAnuv_4,2.1 //
analyzed: utkrānti mārgau devānām na prāyeṇa bhaviṣyataḥ
karma kṣaya sa tathā utkrāntiḥ mārgaḥ bhogaḥ catuṣi ayam

original: phalaṃ mokṣa iti proktaḥ kramāt pādeṣu coditaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.2 //
analyzed: phalam mokṣaḥ iti proktaḥ kramāt pādeṣu ca uditaḥ

original: sraṣṭṛṣveva tu sṛjyānāṃ praveśo brahmaṇo laye /
analyzed: sraṣṭṛṣu eva tu sṛjyānām praveśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ laye
devānām mārgaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ na arciḥ ādiḥ na ca utkramaḥ

original: yataḥ sṛjyasya devasya naivotkrāntistato bhavet // MAnuv_4,2.4 //
analyzed: yatas sṛjyasya devasya nā evā utkrāntiḥ tatas bhavet

original: kathaṃ mārgo bhavet teṣāṃ viśatāmuttamaṃ svataḥ // MAnuv_4,2.5 //
analyzed: katham mārgaḥ bhavet teṣām viśatām uttamam svatas

original: jātānāṃ mānuṣe loke devānāṃ ca kadācana /

original: utkrāntimārgau bhavato na tadā muktiriṣyate // MAnuv_4,2.6 //

original: anyeṣāmapi sākṣāttu muktiḥ prāpyāpi taṃ harim /

original: sahaiva brahmaṇā bhūyāditi śāstrasya nirṇayaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.7 //
analyzed: saha eva brahmaṇā bhūyāt iti śāstrasya nirṇayaḥ
kṣmā ambhaḥ nala anila viyat mana indriyārtha bhūta ādibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ pratisañjighṛkṣuḥ

original: avyākṛtaṃ viśati yarhi guṇatrayātmā kālaṃ paraṃ svamanubhūya paraḥ svayambhūḥ // MAnuv_4,2.8 //
analyzed: avyākṛtam viśati yarhi guṇa traya ātmā kālam param svam anubhūya paraḥ svayambhūḥ

original: evaṃ paretya bhagavantamanupraviṣṭā ye yogino jitamarunmanaso virāgāḥ /
analyzed: evam paretya bhagavantam anupraviṣṭāḥ ye yoginaḥ jita marut manasaḥ virāgāḥ

original: tenaiva sākamamṛtaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ brahma pradhānamupayāntyagatābhimānāḥ // MAnuv_4,2.9 //
analyzed: tena eva sākam amṛtam puruṣam purāṇam brahma pradhānam upayānti agata abhimānāḥ
bhagavantam anuprāptāḥ api tu brahmaṇā saha
paramam mokṣam āyānti liṅga bhaṅgena yoginaḥ

original: prāptā api paraṃ devaṃ sahaiva brahmaṇā punaḥ /
analyzed: prāptāḥ api param devam saha eva brahmaṇā punar
ānanda vyaktiyā āyānti pūrṇām liṅgasya bhaṅgataḥ
iti śruti purāṇa ukti balāt vijñāyate ca tat

original: bhogastu sarvadevānāṃ narādīnāṃ ca vidyate // MAnuv_4,2.12 //
analyzed: bhogaḥ tu sarva devānām nara ādīnām ca vidyate

original: ucyate dehagānāṃ ca vṛttīnāmevameva tu // MAnuv_4,2.13 //
analyzed: ucyate deha gānām ca vṛttīnām evam eva tu
tatra mokṣa svarūpam tu vādinaḥ pratibhā āśrayāt

original: nānā vadanti puṃsāṃ hi matayo guṇabhedataḥ /
analyzed: nānā vadanti puṃsām hi matayaḥ guṇa bhedataḥ
pṛthak pṛthak prajāyante tamasā eva anyathāmatiḥ
rajasā miśra buddhi tvam sattvena eva yathā matiḥ
guṇa atītā vimuktānām matiḥ śuddha citiḥ yatas
sāmyak eva atha nityā ca tad tad māhātmya yogataḥ

original: bahaḷā cātiviśadā spaṣṭā caiva śriyo matiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.16 //
analyzed: bahaḷā ca ati viśadā spaṣṭā ca eva śriyaḥ matiḥ
mahāśuddhaciti tvena
aśeṣa ūru viśeṣāṇām ati spaṣṭa tayā dṛśiḥ
nityam eka prakārā ca nārāyaṇa matiḥ parā
sūrya prabhāvat akhilam bhāsayanti nirantarā
nirlepā vīta doṣā ca nityam evā avikāriṇī
viśeṣān a tad gatān tyaktavā prāyas tad lakṣaṇā śriyaḥ
tathā eva spaṣṭa tā bhāvāt tad tantra tvāt ca kevalam

original: na tādṛśī brahmaṇastu prāya eva śriyo yathā // MAnuv_4,2.19 //
analyzed: na tādṛśī brahmaṇaḥ tu prāyas eva śriyaḥ yathā

original: agnijvālāvadeva syāt smṛtigānāṃ dṛśo bhavaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.20 //
analyzed: agni jvālā vat eva syāt smṛti gānām dṛśaḥ bhavaḥ
evaṃvidheṣu jñāneṣu tamasā muṣya dṛṣṭayaḥ
khadyota sadṛśa ati alpa jñāna tvāt anyathādṛśaḥ
vadanti vādinaḥ mokṣam nānā mata samāśrayāt
āśritya pratibhām āha jinaḥ tatra ati tāmasīm
jñānāt karma kṣayāt mokṣaḥ bhavet deha ākhya pañjarāt
nityam ūrdhvam vrajati eva pudgalaḥ hasta pādavān

original: iti tat kena mānena mokṣarūpaṃ pradṛśyate /
analyzed: iti tat kena mānena mokṣa rūpam pradṛśyate
gatiḥ ūrdhvā ca duḥkha itā gati tvāt laukikī yathā
iti ukte ca anumāna eka śaraṇasya kim uttaram
