original: dūrordhvagamane duḥkhamiti sādhyānugo na saḥ // MAnuv_4,2.25 //
analyzed: dūra ūrdhva gamane duḥkham iti sādhya anugaḥ na saḥ
pratisādhana rūpasya na anumānasya dūṣaṇam

original: upādhiḥ pratirūpaṃ hi sādhanaṃ tannacāparam // MAnuv_4,2.26 //
analyzed: upādhiḥ pratirūpam hi sādhanam tat na ca aparam
athā api sa śarīra tvam ca atrā upādhiḥ na vai bhavet

original: gatitvaṃ yatra dehitvamiti yat sādhanānugam // MAnuv_4,2.27 //
analyzed: gati tvam yatra dehi tvam iti yat sādhana anugam
āgama ananusāri tve prasaṅgaḥ yam yatas tatas

original: nāpasiddhāntatā doṣaḥ prasaṅge yadi sā bhavet /
analyzed: na apasiddhānta tā doṣaḥ prasaṅge yadi sā bhavet

original: tadaivātiprasaṅgaḥ syānna pasaṅgaḥ kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_4,2.28 //
analyzed: tadā eva atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt na kvacid bhavet
loka ākāśa gati tvam ced upādhiḥ sādhana anugaḥ

original: so 'pītyukte vadet kiṃ sa tasmād vedodito bhavet // MAnuv_4,2.29 //
analyzed: saḥ pi iti ukte vadet kim sa tasmāt veda uditaḥ bhavet
mokṣaḥ evam svayam viṣṇuḥ yadi api īśaḥ hi aśeṣa vid

original: cakāra saugatamataṃ mohāyaiva cakāra yat // MAnuv_4,2.30 //
analyzed: cakāra saugata matam mohāya eva cakāra yat
asurāṇām ayogyānām veda mārge pravartatām
atas surā adhikāra tvāt na grāhyam tat matam kvacid
catuṣprakāram tat ca uktam śūnyam vijñānam ekalam
anumeya bahis tattvam tathā pratyakṣa bāhya gam

original: iti tatra tu ye śūnyaṃ vadantyajñānamohitaḥ /
analyzed: iti tatra tu ye śūnyam vadanti ajñāna mohitaḥ

original: te mokṣaṃ tādṛśaṃ brūyurniśśaṅkaṃ māyino yathā // MAnuv_4,2.33 //
analyzed: te mokṣam tādṛśam brūyuḥ niśśaṅkam māyinaḥ yathā
ātma ātmīyam atha api vā
ekasmin saṃsṛteḥ mukte na kiñcid avaśiṣyate
tat saṃvṛtya eva bhedaḥ yam cetana acetana ātmakaḥ
dṛśyate saṃvṛteḥ dhvaṃse nirviśeṣā eva śūnyatā

original: na sattvaṃ naiva cāsattvaṃ śūnyatattvasya vidyate /
analyzed: na sattvam nā eva ca asattvam śūnya tattvasya vidyate

original: na sukhatvaṃ na duḥkhatvaṃ na viśeṣo 'pi kaścana // MAnuv_4,2.36 //
analyzed: na sukha tvam na duḥkha tvam na viśeṣaḥ u pi kaścana
nirviśeṣam nirlepam ajara amaram
śūnyam tattvam asambādham nānā saṃvṛti varjitam
aśeṣa doṣa rahitam manaḥ vācām agocaram
mokṣaḥ iti ucyate sadbhiḥ nānā saṃvṛti dūṣitam
saṃsṛti avastham vijñeyam saṃvṛtyā eva viśeṣyate

original: sthitayā dhvastayā caiva saṃsṛtirmokṣa ityapi // MAnuv_4,2.39 //
analyzed: sthitayā dhvastayā ca eva saṃsṛtiḥ mokṣaḥ iti api
kecid teṣu anyathā prāhuḥ saṃvṛtya eva tu anekadhā
avacchinnam mahāśūnyam nānā na pudgala śabditam
yasya śūnya eka rasa tā jñānāt sā tu apagacchati
sa pudgala tva nirmuktaḥ mahāśūnyatvam eṣyati
saṃvṛtya anyaḥ tu avacchinnaḥ duḥkhāni anubhavati alam
iti evam māyinaḥ ca āhuḥ eka jīva tva vādinaḥ
bahu jīva matāḥ ca iti māyā teṣām tu saṃvṛtiḥ

original: nirviśeṣatvavācaiva śūnyaṃ brahmaiva no bhidā // MAnuv_4,2.43 //
analyzed: nirviśeṣa tva vācā eva śūnyam brahma eva naḥ bhidā
saccit sukha ādikam ca eva kim kutas khaṇḍa vādinaḥ
vyāvartya mātra bhedaḥ tu vidyate śūnyavādinaḥ
anṛta ādeḥ apoham tu svayam eva hi manyate
nirviśeṣa tvataḥ nā eva viśeṣaḥ brahma śūnyayoḥ

original: prāmāṇyādi ca vedasya phalataḥ samameva hi /
analyzed: prāmāṇya ādi ca vedasya phalataḥ samam eva hi
a tattva āvedakam yasmāt pramāṇam tena kathyate
atattva āvedaka tvam yat aprāmāṇyam satām matam
dīrgha bhrānti karī ced syāt a tattva āvedaka pramā
rajju sarpa ādi vijñānāt api ādhikyāt amāna tā
syāt āgamasya a nivartya mahā moha prada tvataḥ
tala nailya ādi vijñānam ākāśe māna tām vrajet
chatra ākāra tva vijñānam candra prādeśa tā matiḥ
nirbheda tvam tu śūnyasya tena api aṅgīkṛtam sadā
sattva asattva ādi dharmāṇām abhāvaḥ ubhayoḥ mataḥ

original: na hi satpratiyogitvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tena ceṣyate /
analyzed: na hi sat pratiyogi tvam śūnyatvam tena ca iṣyate
na ca duḥkha virodhi tvāt anyā hi ānanda tā iṣyate
māyinā śūnya pakṣe jñānam jāḍya virodhi ca

original: dharmaste 'pi na santyeva ko viśeṣastatastayoḥ // MAnuv_4,2.51 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ te na santi eva kaḥ viśeṣaḥ tatas tayoḥ
etādṛśānām pakṣāṇām dūṣaṇam prabhurā kṛtam
sva pakṣa sādanena eva na abhāvaḥ iti ca uktitaḥ
ātma abhāve pumarthaḥ kaḥ iṣṭasya ātma avadhiḥ yatas
yadi na ātma avadhiḥ mokṣaḥ mokṣaḥ syāt ghaṭa śūnyatā

original: kalpitatvād viśeṣāṇāṃ māyino 'pi samaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_4,2.53 //
analyzed: kalpita tvāt viśeṣāṇām samam hi tat
dṛśyamāne viśeṣe yadi ced aviśeṣa tā
ghaṭa abhāvaḥ viśeṣaḥ syāt pāścātyaḥ ced anāgataḥ
na mokṣaḥ vimataḥ yasmāt adehaḥ ghaṭa śūnyatā

original: yathetyukte vadet kiṃ sa yo 'numāmātramānakaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.55 //
analyzed: yathā iti ukte vadet kim sa yaḥ nu mā mātra mānakaḥ

original: na ca māyī vadet tatra pūrvoktenaiva vartmanā /
analyzed: na ca māyī vadet tatra pūrva uktena eva vartmanā
amāna tvāt śruteḥ tasya na ca adeha tva vādinī
śrutiḥ kācid adeha tvam aprākṛta śarīra gā

original: mokṣe bhogaṃ yato brūte jakṣan krīḍanniti śrutiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.57 //
analyzed: mokṣe bhogam yatas brūte jakṣan krīḍan iti śrutiḥ
nirduḥkha tvāt na tat mokṣaḥ pratipannam yathā iti ca

original: anumādūṣaṇaṃ kiṃ syād vādinoḥ śūnyamāyinoḥ // MAnuv_4,2.58 //
analyzed: anumā dūṣaṇam kim syāt vādinoḥ śūnya māyinoḥ
duḥkham duḥkhāt abhinna tvāt syāt asaṃśayam
bhede sat vaita tā eva syāt ityādi amita doṣataḥ

original: heyaṃ māyāmatenaiva saha śūnyamataṃ budhaiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.59 //
analyzed: heyam māyā matena eva saha śūnya matam budhaiḥ
evam vijñāna vādaḥ pi jñāna mātra viśeṣataḥ
tasya api bhaṅgura tva ādi viśeṣam apahāya hi
advaita tā matam sākṣāt ukta doṣaḥ tatas bhavet
kālaḥ na kevala jñānī kāla tvāt pratipanna vat
etayā anumayā rodhāt na tādṛś mokṣa rūpa tā

original: yadi kālo 'pi netyāha kadeti praśna uttaram /
analyzed: yadi na iti āha kadā iti praśnaḥ uttaram

original: kiṃ vakṣyati yadāvasthāṃ vadet sā pakṣatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_4,2.62 //
analyzed: kim vakṣyati yadā avasthām vadet sā pakṣatām vrajet

original: avasthātvāditi hyeva hetuḥ sāpi kadeti ca /
analyzed: avasthā tvāt iti hi eva hetuḥ sā api kadā iti ca

original: pṛṣṭe kālaśca vaktavyo nākālatvaṃ tato bhavet // MAnuv_4,2.63 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭe kālaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ na akāla tvam tatas bhavet
na kālaḥ iti sāmānya niṣedhe kāla ga pramā

original: niruṇaddhi vaktavyo nākālatvaṃ tato bhavet // MAnuv_4,2.64 //
analyzed: niruṇaddhi vaktavyaḥ na akāla tvam tatas bhavet
eka jīva tva pakṣe tu kāla abhāvāt iyam pramā
kupitā kālam ādāya dvaitam eva upapādayet
vimataḥ prapañcavān kālaḥ kāla tvāt pratipanna vat
iti ca anya anumā ekatvam jīvasya vinivārayet
kāla śabda īśvara eka tva matāni api evam eva hi

original: nirākṛtāni teṣāṃ ca samatvāt pakṣadoṣayoḥ // MAnuv_4,2.67 //
analyzed: nirākṛtāni teṣām ca sama tvāt pakṣa doṣayoḥ
jñānam sva rasa bhaṅgayā iva nitya santām iṣyate
bauddhābhyām aparābhyām tu tatra api uktā anumā ripuḥ
mokṣaḥ na śuddhavijñāna santānī kālaga tvataḥ
pratipannaḥ yathā iti etat anumānam tat uttaram
anumānāni sarvāṇi pratisādhana yogataḥ
niṣiddhāni ukta bhaṅgayā eva śrutayaḥ ca asmad ukti gāḥ
sāṅkhaya naiyāyika ādyāḥ ca prāhuḥ mokṣam tu nissukham
icchā dveṣa prayatna ādeḥ api sarva ātmanā layam
tatra āhuḥ na etat api atra śobhanam śrutayaḥ yatas

original: mahānandaṃ ca bhogaṃ ca niyamena vadanti hi // MAnuv_4,2.72 //
analyzed: mahā ānandam ca bhogam ca niyamena vadanti hi
prākṛta priya hāniḥ tu priyā spṛṣṭiḥ iti īryate
apriyam pratikūlam tad aviśeṣeṇa śabditam

original: nāsti hyaprākṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ sato jīvasya kutracit /
analyzed: na asti hi aprākṛtam duḥkham sataḥ jīvasya kutracid
priyam sva rūpam eva asya bala ānanda ādi vākyataḥ
heya tvāt apapriyasya eva priya hāneḥ aniṣṭhataḥ

original: na samastapriyābhāvo mokṣe prokte tu yujyate // MAnuv_4,2.75 //
analyzed: na samasta priya abhāvaḥ mokṣe prokte tu yujyate
apriyasya sva rūpa tvam asureṣu eva hi śrutam
asurāḥ na evam evam ca na evam ca akhila mānuṣāḥ

original: ityātmapriyahānāya ko yateta ca buddhimān // MAnuv_4,2.76 //
analyzed: iti ātma priya hānāya kaḥ yateta ca buddhimān
sañjñā nā asti iti api hi asya na amukta jñeya tā iti hi
dharma anucchittim eva asya yatas vaktī uttara śrutiḥ
āśaṅkayā asya jñāna hānim maitreyyāḥ moham āha mām

original: bhavānityuktavatyā hi nāhaṃ mohaṃ vadāmi te /
analyzed: bhavān iti uktavatyā hi na aham moham vadāmi te
iti uktavā yājñavalkyaḥ hi sva rūpa anāśam ūcivān
jñāna rūpasya vijñāna anāśaḥ tad nāśaḥ eva yat
iti śūnya mata ucchittyai punar ānanda pūrvakān
dharmān āha api anucchinnān tārkikaiḥ vinivāritān
mātrā saṃsargam api āha tathā mādhyandina śrutiḥ

original: ācikṣepa mataṃ tacca yasmin na viṣayādanam /
analyzed: ācikṣepa matam tat ca yasmin na viṣaya adanam
ghrāṇa ādi bhoga abhāvasya tu aniṣṭa tva hṛdā śrutiḥ
yena idam akhilam veda vijñātāram svam eva ca

original: kena taṃ ca vijānīyādityaniṣṭaṃ hi sarvathā // MAnuv_4,2.81 //
analyzed: kena tam ca vijānīyāt iti aniṣṭam hi sarvathā
na akhila jñāpakaḥ viṣṇuḥ ajñeyaḥ niyamena hi
tad jñāna artham hi vedānām akhilānām pravartanam
pratyakṣa āgama ātma vijñāna avirodha anubhavāt api

original: na svavijñānitāyāṃ ca virodhaḥ kaścaneyate // MAnuv_4,2.83 //
analyzed: na sva vijñāni tāyām ca virodhaḥ kaścana iyate
kartṛ karma virodhaḥ ca nitya anubhava virodhataḥ

original: kathameva padaṃ gacched virodho dṛṣṭabādhanam // MAnuv_4,2.84 //
analyzed: katham eva padam gacchet virodhaḥ dṛṣṭa bādhanam
sā u śnute sarva kāman ca kāmānnī kāmarūpī atha
ityādi śrutayaḥ ca uktam artham eva vadanti hi
asvātantryāt iva iti uktam na dvaita abhāvataḥ kvacid
ātmā eva abhūt iti hi asmāt aviśeṣa prasaṅgataḥ
asvātantrya upamā bheda bhedeṣu iva udīritaḥ

original: śabdatattva iti proktaṃ maitreyyuktottaraṃ ca kim // MAnuv_4,2.87 //
analyzed: śabda tattve iti proktam maitreyī ukta uttaram ca kim
sukha ādi dharma hānau tu mukteḥ kiñca prayojanam
yadi arthaḥ duḥkha hāniḥ syāt anarthaḥ sukha nāśanam
tayoḥ ca duḥkha hānāt hi sukha nāśaḥ dhikaḥ bhavet
prāpya api duḥkham su mahat sukha leśa āptaye janaḥ

original: yatate sukhahānau hi ko mokṣāya yatet pumān // MAnuv_4,2.89 //
analyzed: yatate sukha hānau hi kaḥ mokṣāya yatet pumān
alpāt ca sukha anāśāt hi bibheti atitarām janaḥ
mahat ca duḥkham āpnoti sukha nāśa nivṛttaye

original: na ca rāganimittaṃ tad vītarāgā api sphuṭam /
analyzed: na ca rāga nimittam tat vīta rāgāḥ api sphuṭam
nārada ādyāḥ sukha arthāya sahante duḥkham añjasā
yuddha ādi darśanam yasmāt su duḥkhena api
yadā indra vairocanayoḥ brahmāstrābhyām su tāpitāḥ
api nā evā ājahuḥ yuddha rasāt te nārada ādayaḥ

original: iti skāndavacastasmāt sukhābhāvasya ko yatet // MAnuv_4,2.92 //
analyzed: iti skānda vacaḥ tasmāt sukha abhāvasya kaḥ yatet
vimataḥ duḥkha yuj yasmāt cetanaḥ san sukha ujkhitaḥ

original: pratipanno yathetyeva cānumā kena vāryate // MAnuv_4,2.93 //
analyzed: pratipannaḥ yathā iti eva ca anumā kena vāryate
sarva śruti purāṇeṣu sukha bhāva uktitaḥ tathā

original: muktau na grāhyamevaitat sukhābhāvamataṃ budhaiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.94 //
analyzed: muktau na grāhyam eva etat sukha abhāva matam budhaiḥ
saḥ na ānandāt vimuktaḥ san ānandī bhavati sphuṭam

original: nirguṇe brahmaṇi mayi dhārayan viśadaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: nirguṇe brahmaṇi mayi dhārayan viśadam manaḥ
parama ānandam āpnoti yatra kāmaḥ vasīyate

original: na viṣṇusadṛśaṃ daivaṃ na mokṣasadṛśaṃ sukham /
analyzed: na viṣṇu sadṛśam daivam na mokṣa sadṛśam sukham

original: na vedasadṛśaṃ vākyaṃ na varṇo 'kārasammitaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.96 //
analyzed: na veda sadṛśam vākyam na kāra sammitaḥ
yatra ānandāḥ ca modāḥ ca mudaḥ pramudaḥ āsate

original: kāmasya yatrāptāḥ kāmāstatra māmamṛtaṃ kṛdhi // MAnuv_4,2.97 //
analyzed: kāmasya yatra āptāḥ kāmāḥ tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi
iti śruti purāṇāni tatra tatra vadanti hi

original: ato mokṣe sukhābhāva iti yatkiñcideva hi // MAnuv_4,2.98 //
analyzed: atas mokṣe sukha abhāvaḥ iti yat kiñcid eva hi
śiraḥ kara ādi abhāvaḥ ca na muktasya bhavet kvacid

original: śrutayaśca purāṇāni mānamatra bahūni ca // MAnuv_4,2.99 //
analyzed: śrutayaḥ ca purāṇāni mānam atra bahūni ca

original: na vartate yatra rajastamastayoḥ sattvaṃ ca miśraṃ na ca kālavikramaḥ /
analyzed: na vartate yatra rajaḥ tamaḥ tayoḥ sattvam ca miśram na ca kāla vikramaḥ

original: na yatra māyā kimutāpare hareranuvratā yatra surāsurārcitāḥ // MAnuv_4,2.100 //
analyzed: na yatra māyā kim uta apare hareḥ anuvratāḥ yatra sura asura arcitāḥ
śyāma avadātāḥ śatapatra locanāḥ piśaṅga vastrāḥ su rucaḥ supeśasaḥ
sarve catur bāhavaḥ unmiṣat maṇi praveka niṣka ābharaṇāḥ su varcasaḥ
pravāḷa vaiḍūrya mṛṇāḷa varcasām parisphurat kuṇḍala mauli mālinām
bhrājiṣṇubhiḥ yaḥ paritas virājate lasat vimāna āvalibhiḥ mahātmanām
vidyotamāna pramadā uttamābhiḥ sa vidyut abhra āvalibhiḥ yathā nabhaḥ

original: śrīryatra rūpiṇyurugāyapādayoḥ karoti mānaṃ bahudhā vibhūtibhiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.103 //
analyzed: śrīḥ yatra rūpiṇī uru gāya pādayoḥ karoti mānam bahudhā vibhūtibhiḥ

original: ṛcāṃ tvaḥ poṣamāste pupuṣvān gāyatraṃ tvo gāyati śakvarīṣu /
analyzed: ṛcām tvaḥ poṣam āste pupuṣvān gāyatram tvaḥ gāyati śakvarīṣu

original: brahmā tvo vadati jātavidyāṃ yajñasya mātraṃ vimibhīta u tvaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.104 //
analyzed: brahmā tvaḥ vadati jāta vidyām yajñasya mātram vimibhīte u tvaḥ
kāma anna rūpī carati iti pūrva śrutyā purāṇa uktibhiḥ api adoṣaḥ

original: dehaḥ svarūpātmaka eva teṣāṃ muktiṃ gatānāmapi ceyate hi // MAnuv_4,2.105 //
analyzed: dehaḥ sva rūpa ātmakaḥ eva teṣām muktim gatānām api ca iyate hi

original: śiraḥkarādyairapi muktibhājo yuktā yataste puruṣā idānīm /
analyzed: śiraḥ kara ādyaiḥ api mukti bhājaḥ yuktāḥ yatas te puruṣāḥ idānīm
yathā iti pūrvāḥ anumāḥ ca jīva sva rūpam aṅga ādi yugāpayanti

original: na brahmarūpatvamamuṣya dehino muktāvapi syāt pramayā kathañcit /
analyzed: na brahma rūpa tvam amuṣya dehinaḥ muktau api syāt pramayā kathañcid

original: sa brahmaṇā sahito 'śeṣabhogān bhuṅkte tathopetya sukhārṇavaṃ tam // MAnuv_4,2.107 //
analyzed: sa brahmaṇā śeṣa bhogān bhuṅkte tathā upetya sukha arṇavam tam

original: yattat paraṃ jyotirupetya jīvo nijasvarapūtvamavāpya kāmān /
analyzed: yat tat param jyotiḥ upetya jīvaḥ nija svara pū tvam avāpya kāmān

original: bhuṅkte sa daivaṃ puruṣottamo 'ja ātmeti cokto guṇapūrtihetoḥ // MAnuv_4,2.108 //
analyzed: bhuṅkte sa daivam puruṣottamaḥ jaḥ ātmā iti ca uktaḥ guṇa pūrti hetoḥ
setuḥ sa khila mukti bhāgā muta amṛtasya iṣyaḥ iha īśitā yat

original: ityādivākyairbhagavadvaśaḥ san bhuṅkte'khilān muktigato 'pi bhogān // MAnuv_4,2.109 //
analyzed: ityādi vākyaiḥ bhagavat vaśaḥ san bhuṅkte akhilān mukti gataḥ pi bhogān

original: kālo 'pyasau naikyayutaḥ pareṇa jīvasya kālo yata eṣa yadvat /
analyzed: pi asau na aikya yutaḥ pareṇa jīvasya kālaḥ yatas eṣa yadvat

original: ityādikā apyanumāḥ pramāṇaṃ muktau ca jīvasya paratvarodhe // MAnuv_4,2.110 //
analyzed: iti ādikāḥ api anumāḥ pramāṇam muktau ca jīvasya paratva rodhe

original: kathaṃ ca yaḥ pūrvamasau na paścād bhavet sa evetyapi yuktimeti /
analyzed: katham ca yaḥ pūrvam asau na paścāt bhavet saḥ evā iti api yuktim eti

original: yato na dṛṣṭaṃ yadabhūnna pūrvaṃ paścāt tadāseti kutaśca kiñcit // MAnuv_4,2.111 //
analyzed: yatas na dṛṣṭam yat abhūt na pūrvam paścāt tat āsa iti kutas ca kiñcid

original: nacaiva muktau tu hareḥ pṛthaktavamaikyaṃ tathā syāditi yuktimeti /
analyzed: na ca eva muktau tu hareḥ pṛthak tavam aikyam tathā syāt iti yuktim eti

original: yato na kutrāpi bhidābhidā ca dṛṣṭā citaścetanayā kutaścit // MAnuv_4,2.112 //
analyzed: yatas na kutra api bhidā abhidā ca dṛṣṭā citaḥ cetanayā kutaścid

original: itthaṃ matāni bhramajāni yasmānmokṣaṃ samuddeśyamapi bhrameṇa /
analyzed: ittham matāni bhrama jāni yasmāt mokṣam samuddeśyam api bhrameṇa

original: vidurna samyag yadapīha laukikāḥ sukhaṃ mama syācca sadeti jānate // MAnuv_4,2.113 //
analyzed: viduḥ na samyak yat api iha laukikāḥ sukham mama syāt ca sadā iti jānate
audāryam uccāvaca śaktiḥ ātma svara pū dārḍhyam ca nija svabhāvaḥ
svātantryam āpūrṇa viśeṣa yogya tā virodha hāniḥ ca caturtha pāde
vyavasthitiḥ tu aviśeṣaḥ sthitiḥ ca niṣedha sāmānya vidhi kriyāṇām
vibhakta tā ca atvarayā eva siddhiḥ vipakṣa samprāpti viruddha hetavaḥ
su śakya tā śaśvat ati prasiddhi viveka vinyāsa vicāra sañjñāḥ

original: nānāpravṛttiḥ kṛtakṛtyatā ca vipakṣatarkāḥ samatītapāde // MAnuv_4,2.116 //
analyzed: nānā pravṛttiḥ kṛtakṛtya tā ca vipakṣa tarkāḥ samatīta pāde
mahā phala tvam pravivikta tā ca sandhi grahaḥ sādhanam āpta kṛtyam

original: viśeṣakāryaṃ kṛtisaṃsthitiśca suyuktayo nirṇayagāḥ svapakṣe // MAnuv_4,2.117 //
analyzed: viśeṣa kāryam kṛti saṃsthitiḥ ca su yuktayaḥ nirṇaya gāḥ sva pakṣe
vyāmiśra tā kārya kara tvam artha kḷptiḥ su dārḍhyam paratantra tā ca

original: samānadharmaḥ kṛtaśeṣatā ca lokopamā pūrvamatānusārāḥ // MAnuv_4,2.118 //
analyzed: samāna dharmaḥ kṛta śeṣa tā ca lokopamā pūrva mata anusārāḥ
viśeṣa sāmya śrutiḥ āḍhya tā ca samāna lopaḥ mahimā viśeṣaḥ
kṛtārtha tā śaśvat anupravṛttiḥ siddhānta nirṇīti viśiṣṭa hetavaḥ
pradhāna vāyuḥ tu iha vāyu nāmā yuktayā

original: yasmācchrutau pavate ceti bhūri prokto yato bhūtamānī ca so 'pi /
analyzed: yasmāt śrutau pavate ca iti bhūri proktaḥ yatas bhūta mānī ca saḥ

original: mahāmānī tvalpamānī ca yasmāt tacchabdenāpyucyate tena so 'pi // MAnuv_4,2.120 //
analyzed: mahā mānī tu alpa mānī ca yasmāt tad śabdena api ucyate tena

original: tasmin layaṃ yānti bhūtānyaśeṣakramāvirodhena sa eva viṣṇau /
analyzed: tasmin layam yānti bhūtāni aśeṣa krama avirodhena saḥ eva viṣṇau

original: indrādīnāṃ tatra layaḥ kramaṃ tu proktaṃ viśeṣādanusṛtya nānyat // MAnuv_4,2.121 //
analyzed: indra ādīnām tatra layaḥ kramam tu proktam viśeṣāt anusṛtya na anyat

original: tasmādaśeṣā girijāṃ praviśya tayaiva rudraṃ saha tena vāṇīm /
analyzed: tasmāt aśeṣāḥ girijām praviśya tayā eva rudram saha tena vāṇīm

original: tayā patiṃ prāpya sahaiva tena layaṃ harau yānti samastajīvāḥ // MAnuv_4,2.122 //
analyzed: tayā patim prāpya saha eva tena layam harau yānti samasta jīvāḥ

original: somastu vārīśayuto 'niruddhaṃ viśatyasau kāmamasau ca vāruṇīm /
analyzed: somaḥ tu vārīśa yutaḥ niruddham viśati asau kāmam asau ca vāruṇīm

original: sā śeṣadevaṃ sa giraṃ ca saiva vāyuṃ viśatyañja itīha nirṇayaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.123 //
analyzed: sā śeṣa devam sa giram ca sā eva vāyum viśati añjas iti iha nirṇayaḥ

original: umāgirīśāvapi bhāratīrāviti sma vāg vedagatā bravīti /
analyzed: umā giri īśau api bhārata irau iti sma vāc veda gatā bravīti

original: ahīndrapatnīmahipaṃ viriñcapatnīṃ viriñcaṃ ca vimuktikāle // MAnuv_4,2.124 //
analyzed: ahi indra patnīm ahipam viriñca patnīm viriñcam ca vimukti kāle

original: ta eva yat tatpadamāpnuvanti tatkāla etān samupāsya jīvāḥ /
analyzed: te eva yat tat padam āpnuvanti tad kāle etān samupāsya jīvāḥ

original: brahmatvakāle praviśanti caitānīti sma vāk tādṛśatāmupaiti // MAnuv_4,2.125 //
analyzed: brahmatva kāle praviśanti ca etāni iti sma vāc tādṛśa tām upaiti

original: sūryo 'gniyukto gurumāpya tena śakraṃ sahainena suparṇapatnīm /
analyzed: sūryaḥ gni yuktaḥ gurum āpya tena śakram saha enena suparṇa patnīm

original: tayā suparṇaṃ saha tena vāṇīṃ brahmāṇametadgata eva yāti // MAnuv_4,2.126 //
analyzed: tayā suparṇam saha tena vāṇīm brahmāṇam etad gataḥ eva yāti
indra praveśaḥ tu yadā ucyate tadā hi umā iti eva suparṇa patnī

original: uktā suparṇaśca girīśanāmnā tato virodhaśca na kaścanātra // MAnuv_4,2.127 //
analyzed: uktā suparṇaḥ ca girīśa nāmnā tatas virodhaḥ ca na kaścana atra
bhṛgu ādayaḥ dakṣam avāpya tena prāpya indram etena suparṇa patnīm

original: viśanti ye manavo rājamukhyā manuṃ praviśyātra gatā mahendram // MAnuv_4,2.128 //
analyzed: viśanti ye manavaḥ rāja mukhyāḥ manum praviśya atra gatāḥ mahā indram

original: ākāśa urvī ca guruṃ praviśya tenaiva yātaḥ puruhūtadevam /
analyzed: ākāśe urvī ca gurum praviśya tena eva yātaḥ puruhūta devam

original: sanādayo yatayaḥ kāmameva viśanti śiṣṭā api havyavāham // MAnuv_4,2.129 //
analyzed: sana ādayaḥ yatayaḥ kāmam eva viśanti śiṣṭāḥ api havyavāham

original: varṇāśramācāraratā manuṣyā dharmaṃ manuṃ so 'pi sameti kāle /
analyzed: varṇa āśrama ācāra ratāḥ manuṣyāḥ dharmam manum saḥ u pi sameti kāle

original: tameva sarve pitaraḥ surānugāḥ sarve kuberaṃ sa ca somameva // MAnuv_4,2.130 //
analyzed: tam eva sarve pitaraḥ sura anugāḥ sarve kuberam sa ca somam eva
vimukti kāle praviśanti abhīkṣṇam bhogān ca tad deha gatāḥ prabhuñjate
ānanda su vyaktiḥ amutra teṣām bhavati atas ca iṣyataḥ eva nirgatāḥ

original: krīḍanti bhūyaśca samāviśanti tāneva sāyujyamidaṃ vadanti // MAnuv_4,2.131 //
analyzed: krīḍanti bhūyas ca samāviśanti tān eva sāyujyam idam vadanti

original: sāyujyahīnāśca laye tu sarve proktena mārgeṇa viśanti sṛṣṭau /
analyzed: sāyujya hīnāḥ ca laye tu sarve proktena mārgeṇa viśanti sṛṣṭau

original: bahiśca niryānti tato 'nyadāpi sāyujyabhājāṃ bhavati praveśaḥ // MAnuv_4,2.132 //
analyzed: bahis ca niryānti tatas nyadā api sāyujya bhājām bhavati praveśaḥ

original: uktaṃ samastaṃ paramaśrutau hi proktaṃ tu sargakramato viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: uktam samastam parama śrutau hi proktam tu sarga kramataḥ viparyayaḥ

original: muktau laye yadvadatho layaśca viparyayeṇetyavadad girāṃ patiḥ // MAnuv_4,2.133 //
analyzed: muktau laye yadvat atho layaḥ ca viparyayeṇa iti avadat girām patiḥ

original: layo yato muktiriyaṃ surāṇāṃ bhogo viśeṣeṇa ca yaṃ vadiṣyati /
analyzed: layaḥ yatas muktiḥ iyam surāṇām bhogaḥ viśeṣeṇa ca yam vadiṣyati
uktaḥ ca bimba pratibimba bhāvaḥ piṅga śrutau ukta laya anusārataḥ

original: bimbe layo yanniyataśca muktau cidātmanāṃ tadvaśatā ca sarvadā /
analyzed: bimbe layaḥ yat niyataḥ ca muktau cit ātmanām tad vaśa tā ca sarvadā

original: tejo 'bhidhāṃ tu śriyamāpya viṣṇumagre tataḥ putratayaiva vāyuḥ /
analyzed: tejaḥ bhidhām tu śriyam āpya viṣṇum agre tatas putra tayā eva vāyuḥ

original: āptaḥ prasūtaḥ punareva viṣṇuṃ praviśya muktaḥ praḷaye 'tra tiṣṭhati // MAnuv_4,2.135 //
analyzed: āptaḥ prasūtaḥ punar eva viṣṇum praviśya muktaḥ praḷaye tra tiṣṭhati
sarve pi te mukta gaṇāḥ amanda sāndram nija ānandam aśeṣatas

original: bhuñjanta evāsata īśadehe laye 'tha sarge bahireva yānti // MAnuv_4,2.136 //
analyzed: bhuñjantaḥ eva asataḥ īśa dehe laye sarge bahis eva yānti

original: prayāti dharmaṃ nirṛtistu śakraṃ marudgaṇāḥ pārṣadāstathaiva /
analyzed: prayāti dharmam nirṛtiḥ tu śakram marut gaṇāḥ pārṣadāḥ tathā eva
sarve niruddham pṛtanādhipa ādya astuḥ aśrutiḥ hi ittham iyam vimuktiḥ
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyane caturtha adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
utkrānta mārgaḥ ca vimukta gamyam pāda uditam sukrama vikramau ca

original: sāntānikaṃ prāptirabhīṣyatā ca saukayarmityanyamatasya tarkāḥ // MAnuv_4,3.1 //
analyzed: sāntānikam prāptiḥ abhīṣya tā ca saukayarmiti anya matasya tarkāḥ
viśeṣa samprāptiḥ uru tvam āptiḥ krama anurāgaḥ kathita anuvṛttiḥ

original: siddhāntanirṇītikarāḥ pratīkaṃ dehādikaṃ tadgatameva ye narāḥ // MAnuv_4,3.2 //
analyzed: siddhānta nirṇīti karāḥ pratīkam deha ādikam tad gatam eva ye narāḥ
upāsate te puratas samāpnuyuḥ brahmāṇam asmāt matim āpya viṣṇum

original: prāpsyantyato 'nye 'pi tamāpya tasmāddhariṃ gatā muktibhājaḥ parānte // MAnuv_4,3.3 //
analyzed: prāpsyanti atas nye tam āpya tasmāt harim gatāḥ mukti bhājaḥ parānte
śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyane caturtha adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
atikrama uktiḥ kṛtiḥ artha lābhaḥ parā gatiḥ pāra gatiḥ tat okaḥ

original: samastakāryaṃ vaśitā ca viśvasambhāvanā yuktayastvanyapakṣe // MAnuv_4,4.1 //
analyzed: samasta kāryam vaśitā ca viśva sambhāvanā yuktayaḥ tu anya pakṣe
sāmānya rūpam pratibhāna muktiḥ āścarya tā a kṛtrima tā asta doṣaḥ
viśeṣa kḷptiḥ kṛta niḥśramaḥ ca māhātmyam iti eva su nirṇaya arthāḥ
ananya bhṛtya tvam iha udita bhyastu anyasya bhṛtya tva nivāraṇāya

original: patiṃ yadeṣāmapi viṣṇumāha hyutāmṛtatvasya patitvavāgdhareḥ // MAnuv_4,4.3 //
analyzed: patim yat eṣām api viṣṇum āha hi uta amṛta tvasya patitva vāc hareḥ
ete viṣṇu anya cit tvena yathā pumāṃsaḥ

original: prasiddhibhājastviti cānumaiva hyabhīṣyasiddhayai bhavatīha niścayāt // MAnuv_4,4.4 //
analyzed: prasiddhi bhājaḥ tu iti ca anumā eva hi abhīṣya siddhayai bhavati iha niścayāt
mukta svakīya avara yantṛ tā asti muktau api brahma purassarāṇām

original: anena devena tathāmunā ca hīṣye parārvāktanalokināmiti // MAnuv_4,4.5 //
analyzed: anena devena tathā amunā ca hi iṣye para arvāktana lokinām iti
phalam śrutiḥ jñānataḥ āha muktau etat ca sarva aśubha nāśa liṅgāt
loka ādhipatyam ca vidhātuḥ eva sarva ātmanā iti āha turaśrutiḥ ca

original: sarve baliṃ devagaṇā vahantītyetacca nānyasya hi yuktimeti // MAnuv_4,4.6 //
analyzed: sarve balim deva gaṇāḥ vahanti iti etat ca na anyasya hi yuktim eti

original: lokā itīhāpi tu lokināṃ vaco lokā iti hyeva ravaḥ prajāsu /
analyzed: lokāḥ iti iha api tu lokinām vacaḥ lokāḥ iti hi eva ravaḥ prajāsu

original: prayujyate sarvajanaiḥ sadaiva tanmānino lokapadena coktāḥ /
analyzed: prayujyate sarva janaiḥ sadā eva tad māninaḥ loka padena ca uktāḥ

original: tadgāstu muktā iha lokaśabdā anyonyanāthā iti paiṅgināṃ śrutiḥ // MAnuv_4,4.7 //
analyzed: tadgāḥ tu muktāḥ iha loka śabdāḥ anyonya nāthāḥ iti paiṅginām śrutiḥ

original: alokaśabdena vimuktibhājo vācyāḥ padaṃ tādṛgapīha yuktam /
analyzed: aloka śabdena vimukti bhājaḥ vācyāḥ padam tādṛś api iha yuktam

original: lokābhidhāścāpi yato hi muktāḥ prakāśarūpāḥ satataṃ ca sarve /
analyzed: loka abhidhāḥ ca api yatas hi muktāḥ prakāśa rūpāḥ satatam ca sarve

original: brahmaiva lokādhipatirvimukto bhavediti prāha turaśrutiśca // MAnuv_4,4.8 //
analyzed: brahmā eva loka adhipatiḥ vimuktaḥ bhavet iti prāha turaśrutiḥ ca

original: naceha vijñānaphalaṃ samuktaṃ lokādhipatyaṃ ravibimbato harau /
analyzed: na ca iha vijñāna phalam samuktam loka ādhipatyam ravi bimbataḥ harau

original: uktaṃ pṛthak tacca puraiva yasmād bhedo 'munetyādi ca samyaguktaḥ // MAnuv_4,4.9 //
analyzed: uktam pṛthak tat ca purā eva yasmāt bhedaḥ munā ityādi ca samyak uktaḥ

original: tvapratyayaṃ cāpyatihāya naiva rūpeṇa teneti bhavedihārthaḥ /
analyzed: tu apratyayam ca api atihāya na eva rūpeṇa tena iti bhavet iha arthaḥ

original: bhavatyasāvityaṇuśabdamatra vihāya vākyāni bahūni doṣaḥ // MAnuv_4,4.10 //
analyzed: bhavati asau iti aṇu śabdam atra vihāya vākyāni bahūni doṣaḥ

original: ato jagadvayāpṛtimanta eva brahmādayaḥ pūrṇaguṇāḥ krameṇa /
analyzed: atas jagat vayāpṛtimantaḥ eva brahma ādayaḥ pūrṇa guṇāḥ krameṇa
amandam ānandam ajasram eva bhuñjantaḥ ātmīyam ajāt samāsate
namaḥ namo śeṣa viśeṣa pūrṇa guṇa eka dhāmne puruṣottamāya
bhakta anukampāt ati śuddha saṃvid dātre n upādhi priya sat guṇa ātmane

original: yasya trīṇyuditāni vedavacane rūpāṇi divyānalaṃ baṭ tad darśatamitthameva nihitaṃ devasya bhargo mahat /
analyzed: yasya trīṇi uditāni veda vacane rūpāṇi divya analam baṭ tat darśatam ittham eva nihitam devasya bhargaḥ mahat

original: vāyo rāmavaconayaṃ prathamakaṃ pṛkṣo dvitīyaṃ vapurmadhvo yattu tṛtīyametadanumā granthaḥ kṛtaḥ keśave // MAnuv_4,4.13 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ rāma vacaḥ nayam prathamakam pṛkṣaḥ dvitīyam vapuḥ madhvaḥ yat tu tṛtīyam etat anumā granthaḥ kṛtaḥ keśave

original: bhūtisvayambhuśarvādivandyaṃ tvāṃ naumi me priyam // MAnuv_4,4.14 //
analyzed: bhūti svayambhu śarva ādi vandyam tvām naumi me priyam
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ
